name: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
address: 467 Hai Ba Trung, Cẩm Châu, Hội An, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm cách Bãi biển An Bàng và trung tâm thành phố Hội An 5 phút lái xe, Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa có phòng nghỉ giá cả phải chăng với TV màn hình phẳng. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp miễn phí cả WiFi lẫn chỗ đỗ xe.

Nhìn ra đường chân trời của thành phố Hội An, phòng nghỉ hiện đại tại Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa được trang bị TV truyền hình vệ tinh, két an toàn, ấm đun nước điện và minibar. Phòng tắm riêng đi kèm đồ vệ sinh cá nhân và máy sấy tóc.

Du khách có thể thư giãn bên hồ bơi ngoài trời. Nhân viên tại quầy lễ tân 24 giờ có thể cung cấp dịch vụ cho thuê xe hơi và dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay. Bàn đặt tour với dịch vụ đặt vé có thể giúp du khách sắp xếp việc đi tham quan.

Nhà hàng của Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa phục vụ một loạt đặc sản địa phương, các món ăn Châu Âu - Châu Á.

Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa nằm trong bán kính 35 km từ sân bay quốc tế Đà Nẵng.

review.comment_positive: I Washington a great hippy experience. The recepcionist in special ams dzung resolved  all our doubts  . We Will come back the next years.10 overa 10

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Amazing hotel facilities, our room was spacious and clean. The breakfast had a large variety of buffet style plus the cook to order counter. The staff were friendly and extremely attentive. We used the free bikes to bike to the beach. The only note is that it is a wee walk to the old town centre, however it wasn't a problem for us.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Das Personal war sehr bemüht und freundlich, besonders Ms. Kim. Sehr sauber, schöne Anlage, schöner Pool. Die Lage ist nicht direkt in der Altstadt, aber es gibt gute Cafés, Restaurants etc. in unmittelbarer Umgebung und außerdem kostenlose Fahrräder mit denen man zur Altstadt und zum Strand fahren kann. Das Frühstück wird offiziell nur bis 9 Uhr angeboten, wir sind jedoch jeden Tag erst später gekommen und es war nie ein Problem.
review.comment_negative: Das Frühstück könnte umfangreicher sein, liegt aber für Vietnam im guten Durchschnitt.

review.comment_positive: Loved everything! We had a very warm welcome from the staff. The room was clean and spacious, the bathroom with a closet was huge. The pool area is well looked after. Buffer breakfast deserves a special mention: huge variety of dishes, everything was delicious, better than 4-star hotels, nice seating area. The best hotel experience in our whole Vietnam trip! Walking distance to old quarter, even faster with free bikes.
review.comment_negative: Gym equipment is a bit old. Some free bikes have squeaky breaks. Everything else was perfect!

review.comment_positive: La gentillesse du personnel, la chambre de luxe était magnifique 60 m2 pour un prix très abordable. Un des meilleurs petit déjeuner de notre séjour.

review.room_type: Suite 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Besonders Mrs Kim konnte uns viele nützliche und wertvolle Tipps zu unserem Aufenthalt in Hoi An geben. Die Zimmer waren sehr grosszügig und schön, auch der Balkon war praktisch. Die Betten waren bequem, wir haben gut geschlafen. Die Lage des Hotels war für uns ideal, nicht direkt im Trubel und doch ist die Altstadt in einer gemütlichen Gehdistanst von ca 20min zu erreichen. Frühstück war grosszügig und lecker.
review.comment_negative:
Leider wurden während unserem Aufenthalt leichte Bauarbeiten am Hotel vorgenomme, somit war es am Morgen schon früh etwas lärmig... 
Auch war die Konstruktion der Dusche etwas schwierig  man konnte kaum Duschen ohne eine Überschwemmung zu verursachem. Dadurch ergab sich auch erhöhte Rutschgefahr und wir benötigten alle Handtücher zum trocknen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Big enough to offer a restaurant & bar (happy hour), 12 metre pool, an air conditioned gym and free push bikes, small enough to offer intimate friendly service. The staff were amazing, they couldn’t have done more for us from check in to check out. The breakfast buffet was awesome, so much choice and topped up constantly. Our Deluxe Double room with Balcony over looking the pool was ideal. Plenty of room, big double bed, air conditioning, fridge, TV, safe, wardrobe, desk, electric jug, tea & coffee, outdoor patio table & chairs and daily complimentary water. Location was also great, being ~ 1.5km easy walk from the old towns history by day bright lights by night meant it was quiet and then ~ 3.3km in the opposite direction an easy flat cycle (mostly on a cycle way) to the south end of China Beach for a swim in the sea or the seafront restaurants and bars. The staff really care about their hotel and in turn really care about their guests, next time we are in Vietnam we will be staying again, highly recommended.

Die Zimmer waren geräumig und das Bett sehr bequem. Das Frühstück war sehr lecker und es werden unter anderem Omlette und Pancake frisch zubereitet.

Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Das Personal war ausgesprochen hilfsbereit, die Zimmer sehr sauber und groß. Leider ist die anliegende Straße nach vorne, sehr laut. Daher unbedingt ein Zimmer zum Pool wählen. Mit dem Fahrrad ist man sehr schnell in der Stadt und auch am Strand. Das Frühstück war sehr gut.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: La amabilidad  del personal ,te ayudan en todo ,el desayuno espectacular , la piscina fantástica, te dejan bici gratis,tiene gimnasio, la cama súper cómoda.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.comment_positive: Great breakfast, rooms are very comfortable and the staff have been fantastic, in particular Ms Dzung who has done everything to help me have a comfortable stay. Free bikes are also excellent for getting around.
review.comment_negative: The location is about a 5 min cycle from the old town which is very manageable, but if you’re not comfortable cycling then its around a 10-15 minute walk.

review.rating: Perfekter Aufenthalt in sehr schönem Hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt im Hotel! Super Frühstück mit viel Auswahl (Vietnamesich/westlich). Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und extrem hilfsbereit - wir haben bspw. Unseren Shuttle vom Hotel organisieren lassen und alles hat perfekt geklappt. Man kann aber sonst auch direkt und spontan einige Touren vom Hotel organisieren lassen. Ansonsten konnten wir alles über WhatsApp mit dem Personal abstimmen, was für uns wirklich optimal war. Auch die angebotenen Massagen haben wir getestet, es war perfekt! Die Räume und auch das gesamte Hotel sind sehr sauber und auch die Lage ist perfekt mit vielen tollen Restaurants und 10 Minuten Fußweg in die Altstadt. Wir können das Hotel nur weiter empfehlen, wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt und kommen gerne wieder. :)

review.rating: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. It was the perfect place for a relaxing trip to Hoi An (which was exactly what I need

La posizione è ottima, perché è a walking distance dalla città vecchia e si trova sulla strada per la spiaggia, che si può raggiungere comodamente con le bici offerte dall'hotel. Given we were travelling with kids we didn’t use all facilities, but those we used (restaurant and spa) were really good. The pool area also looked very nice.  My entire family enjoyed the stay in this place.

review.rating: Enjoyable Stay off the great with attentive personell
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The Staff was great, they had to help me multiple times with my door and such and were always attentive. Especially Kim and Thuy were trying to do everything to accomodate me. The Buffet was actually quite good as well. And while the Gym is tiny, baerly space for 1 person, it is surprisingly versitaile, e.g. a Full Body workout is entirely possible and nobody except me ever used it during my stay.
review.comment_negative: The internet/wifi is absolutely terrible, it lags, disconnects and if you are lucky you can use it to check your mails. At least it works to enough to plan the next part of the travel. Other than that, everything was perfect and the staff made more than up for that little discomfort.

review.comment_positive: Exceptional! We stayed here for a few days after travelling northern vietnam, and this was the best place to relax. Nice room, good location (by foot to city centre, by bike to the beach), massages and pool, extraordinary breakfast and the kindest staff that helped us with everything. 100% recommended 👍🏻

- Cocktail Happy Hour
- Frühstücksbuffet reichhaltig und sehr gut!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The interior design of this hotel is unique, calming and beautiful. The host, Ms Sue is also unique, calming and beautiful. 

Loved everything about my room, from the colours to the tasteful vintage furniture. The style is in-keeping with Hoi An’s asthetic. 

The staff really are amazing, and sincere. And the breakfast is the best I’ve come across. I’ll be back Ms Sue!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The hotel was gorgeous. Our room was lovely and spacious and the pool was well maintained. The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. In particular, they gave us a lot of information about Hoi An and things to do when we checked in. They also helped us send a package home. The breakfast was delicious with a great range of choices. The location of the hotel was convenient as the Old Town was only a 15mins walk away. The hotel offered free use of their bikes which we used to get to the beach within 20mins. I would highly recommend staying here.

review.comment_positive: Very nice hotel and the staff were all amazing! The breakfast is the best we have had in Vietnam! The staff are extremely helpful and booked us the memories show as well as gave us lots of advice on where else to visit while in Hoi An!

review.rating: Golden Holiday delivers a golden Holiday.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
We loved lounging by the pool after breakfast (pool towels provided), and exploring the immediate vicinity around the hotel. Hoi An old quarter was a little too busy for us, so the hotel was a great relief. 
Staff went above and beyond, every day;  Huge shout out to Dung and Selena - both were attentive, helpful and friendly. 
Push bikes were available and we would recommend for quicker movement in the heat. We opted to hire a scooter for the day, which hotel staff helped organise, and it was perfect for us and not too expensive.
We were upgraded to a Deluxe Suit which felt bigger than our house back home. The bed was huge and comfortable, the fridge cooled drinks quickly, There was air-conditioning and a fan which met our needs. 
We had morning sun, and our balcony had a wonderful view of Hoi Än which was in the shade in the afternoon/evening.
This was by far the best accommodation we have ever stayed in - anywhere in the world - and we were sorry we had to leave.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người
review.comment_positive: We were warmly welcomed as soon as we arrived at the Golden Holiday – the staff team are very friendly and incredibly helpful. The receptionists speak perfect English, offer useful tourist advice and can help you plan your stay in Hoi An. We enjoyed all interactions with hotel staff. The facilities were also of high quality – the pool is a beautiful relaxing space, the spa is enjoyable, and the breakfast offered diverse and delicious options for everyone. The hotel is in a good location, about a 15 minute walk from Hoi An Old Town – close, but far enough away to offer some peace. The hotel is beautiful inside and out; very clean with charming décor. We were a family of 5 staying in two connecting rooms, and we had ample space. Overall, we enjoyed our stay here immensely, and would recommend to everyone!
review.comment_negative: Everything the hotel offered was perfect, so there was nothing we did not like.

review.rating: Great value for money in Hoi An

review.comment_positive: Amazing room, super friendly staff, delicious breakfast! My girlfriend was quite sick and the people here went above and beyond to help her

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Amazing hotel, would highly recommend! All the staff were super attentive and helpful from the moment I walked in. I booked this hotel after a busy three weeks backpacking and I wanted to stay somewhere comfortable with great customer service and a gym for the last two nights of my trip before flying home...I was not disappointed!! The gym is great (for hotel standards). The breakfast buffet was very good as well. There was even a spa in the hotel with really reasonable prices (30% off for the month). There were plenty of free bikes to use and one day I cycled to the nearby An Bang beach which was a lovely 15 minute cycle through rice fields. It's a good distance from Hoi An - walkable (about 25 mins) but away from the hussle and bussle. The bed was super comfy and nice big room.

review.comment_positive:
- Lovely staff that gave me a room upgrade & an early check in for free and supported me with a tour to Ba Na Hills and a bus to Hue.

review.comment_negative: I was reminded 10 times to give the hotel a good review and they even wanted to watch me writing the review to make sure I give them a 10. felt very pushy and invading my privacy.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Miss Sue and all of the staff were super friendly and helpful. Rooms were huge, bed very comfortable and exceptionally clean. 
The breakfast was fantastic. Couldn’t fault this wonderful hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
We stayed 17 nights here & can vouch that this is a comfortable, clean and caring hotel, we could happily live here. If I could give them more than 10 stars I would. 
It’s strategically located, about 15 minute walk to old town & a 10 minute bike ride to the beach in a bike lane along the road. The hotel bikes are free.
Their amazing staff is led by the helpful & charming customer relations expert, Miss Sue, who really deserves a raise for her professionalism & personality. She gives great advice, books show tickets & whatever else you need, and is generally helpful.
The beds are comfy. The air con is cold. The showers are hot. The breakfast buffet is varied, delicious & nutritious. The pool is very nice & big enough for swimming laps; the small gym is a bonus and never seemed busy. There’s lots of restaurants & shops nearby for whatever you need. The food and cleaning staff are equally cheerful and charming. We will miss all the comforts of this home away from home. I can’t imagine how to top it considering the high comfort level & value for the money.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: De geweldige aardige stafleden die je overal bij helpen. Ms Sue  en  Ms Thuy waren zeer gastvrij en zagen we elke dag. We mochten badlakens van zwembad meenemen naar het strand. De handdoeken zijn erg groot dat is heel fijn. Ontbijt was volledig en konden ook eitje laten bakken of noodle soep
review.comment_negative:
Als ik iets moet bedenken en dat us doorgegeven er us weinig licht bij kledingkast. 
Vonden ze hele goede tip.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Das Frühstück war aufgrund der Cooking-Station sehr gut. Es gab eine reichhaltige Auswahl an frischen Eierspeisen und vietnamesischen Essen welches zuzüglich zum Buffet bereitet wurde. 
Der Service und die Freundlichkeit der Angestellten.
review.comment_negative:
Das Hotel ist sehr in die Jahre gekommen. Das Mobiliar muss dringend erneuert werden. Unser Bett war einfach nur durchgelegen und auch das Sofa hatte bessere Tage gesehen. Die Stühle und der Tisch auf dem Balkon waren eine Zumutung.
Grundsätzlich wird das Zimmer nicht gut gereinigt. Übermäßig viele schwarze Haare, die überall zu finden waren (im Bett, auf dem Boden, in der Wanne...). Wir haben beide keine schwarzen Haare, demnach waren es nicht unsere.
Obwohl das Zimmer im 5 Stock war, hatten wir 2x Besuch von Kakerlaken.
Die kostenlosen Leihfahrräder sind eine tolle Möglichkeit zur Altstadt zu kommen, oder auch zum Strand zu fahren. Leider sind die Räder aber nicht wirklich funktionsfähig ((Ketten) verrostet, Tretlager ausgelutscht, Achten in den Vorderrädern, teilweise kein Licht). Die Bremsen sind quasi nicht vorhanden und gerade in der Regenzeit wird es somit gefährlich auf den Straßen. 
Um das Hotel herum ist es laut, da die Restaurants gerne mal, zwischen 7h und 22h, die Musik aufdrehen. Da kann das Hotel nichts für, aber man sollte es wissen.
Die Bilder bei booking zeigen ein Tablet mit Chips etc. die angeblich 'complementary' sind, das entspricht nicht der Realität. Es sind 'nur' 2 Flaschen Wasser pro Tag.
Am Ende unseres Aufenthaltes wurden wir befragt, welche Bewertung wir bei booking.com abgeben werden. Als wir unseren Unmut äußerten und sagten, dass es wohl keine 10 wird, wurde uns eine Preisminderung angeboten und zuzüglich wurden wir 10 Minuten psychisch über Druck gesetzt. U. a., dass sie sehr viel Ärger bekommen würden, wenn wir keine 10 geben und dass wir das doch wohl nicht wollen würden...
Wenn man als Hotel eine 10 möchte, dann muss man auch was dafür tun und auch mal investieren. Dass die Zeiten für alle hart sind, ist klar, aber andere Hotels haben eine gute Bewertung einfach mehr verdient.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: We liked a lot our stay in Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa. The staff was very kind and helpful all the time. Excelent breakfast with both continental and asian meals. It is possible to book various trips through the reception. They can also arrange the renting of a scooter. We highly recommend.

review.rating: Decant Hotel with Great Value of money
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Excellent property and very convenient to dowtwon. There are free byclcle to borrow and its a big help for wondering in hoi an old town . Front desk staff is extremely efficient, pleasant and helpful. Property is clean and has a fantastic old time charm. The room was wonderful, clean, and the bed is very confortable ,its perfect gateway for a  weekend...  Overall, I had a great experience with the GOLD Holiday Hotel .highly recomend it
review.comment_negative: The fridge isn't cold enogh to keep our drinks cold even we have put to the lowest temp

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: The staff were very friendly, very helpful in booking  tours and transport, (especially Ms Kim) The hotel was very well located and clean, great breakfast.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: Klasse Hotel mit super aufmerksamen Personal
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Unser Zimmer war riesig und mit allem ausgestattet, was man so benötigt. Lediglich der Fön könnte dringend ein upgrade gebrauchen. Das Frühstück war gut, es gab eine Auswahl an westlichen und asiatischen Speisen sowie eine Theke, an welcher Eierspeisen und lokale Gerichte bestellt werden konnten. 

Das Personal war sehr engaiert und gab hilfreiche Tipps für Ausflüge. Wir haben auch den Wäscheservice genutzt. Innerhalb eines Tages hatten wir unsere Kleidung wieder und das zu einem günstigen Preis. 

Die Lage ist gut, etwa 20min zu Fuß zur Altstadt. Das fanden wir besser, da wir so nicht in der touristischen Hochburg waren. Direkt gegenüber gibt es auch eine Bank an der ohne Gebühren Geld abgehoben werden kann. In der näheren Umgebung befinden sich auch 2-3 gute Restaurants, einfach Google auschecken. 

Im Hotel stehen kostenfrei Fahrräder zur Verfügung. Wir haben es uns jedoch bei der Verkehrslage nicht getraut und sind lieber gelaufen. 

Das Hotel empfiehlt 2 Schneider in der Stadt. Wir waren bei dem etwas preiswerterem Thu45 und waren begeistert von der Freundlichkeit und Effizienz vor Ort. Wir haben uns ein Kleid kopieren (65$) und eine Leinenhose ($55) schneidern lassen. Insgesamt eine tolle Erfahrung, danke für den Tipp! 

Außerdem empfehlen wir das Taxi zum Flughafen im Hotel zu buchen, es war 70.000 dong günstiger als in der Grab App.
review.comment_negative: Leider hat ein Hund an mehreren Nächten für über eine Stunde durchgebellt. Ich hatte Ohrstöpsel drin und konnte ihn dennoch hören. Dafür kann das Hotel natürlich nichts! Aber die Information ist für leicht Schläfer (wie ich auch einer bin) vielleicht wichtig.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nádherný hotel v docházkové vzdálenosti od centra města. Pokoje velice čisté, stejně jako celý hotel. Úžasná snídaně s velkým výběrem. Personál byl opravdu milý a vždy připraven poradit. Určitě se sem za pár let vrátíme.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: It was all great! People (so caring, helpful and friendly), pool, food (very good breakfast!) , room, free bikes, location... We loved it 🩷

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We received a warm welcome from Ms. Dzung alongside all the necessary information to make the best of our vacation in Hoi An. Thanks to her recommendations, we rented a motorcycle to explore the town's scenic surroundings, recharged energy during excellent massages and booked a very affordable transfer to the airport. The hotel is located some distance from the old town, however, their free bicycles allowed us to be there in no time.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

The breakfast was included and it has been the best so far in our trip!!

Sa, Selena, Kim, Dung en Thuy hielpen ons bij het organiseren van de pick up en drop off van het vliegveld, gaven ons fantastische tips over goede restaurants en andere faciliteiten. Ze zorgen ervoor dat alles naar ons zin was. Ook was de kamer heel schoon en van fijn formaat.

Room is comfortable and breakfast is tasty. Free bikes are available to guests. We like the hotel and Hoi An so much that we extended one more night! Thank you for the hospitality!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: Komfortables, sauberes Hotel mit guter Ausstattung und außergewöhnlichem Service
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive:
- außergewöhnlich aufmerksames, zuvorkommendes Personal, insbesondere Ms. Thuy und alle Kollegen und Kolleginnen der Rezeption, des Concierge und Frühstücksservice sowie der Reinigung waren zu jeder Zeit sehr herzlich, proaktiv und hilfsbereit
- ausführliche Beratung zu Sehenswürdigkeiten, Ausflugszielen, Food & Coffee Spots, guten Schneidern, Altstadt, Tickets, Transfers und Übernahme der Buchung, sogar von unterwegs per Anruf/WhatsApp und anderen Messenger Diensten
- extrem komfortable, saubere Zimmer
- Wäscheservice innerhalb von 24h
- ansprechender Eingangsbereich
- zuvorkommende Portiers
- kostenloser Fahrradverleih
- sehr gute asiatische & kontinentale Frühstücksauswahl
- es gibt einen schönen Pool Bereich, Gym und Spa, welche wir aufgrund mangelnder Zeit nicht genutzt haben
review.comment_negative:
- Die Duschwand/-vorhangkonstruktion war etwas ungünstig, sodass das Wasser beim Duschen trotzdem vom Badewannenrand raus auf den Boden lief. Dies störte aber den sonst sehr guten Eindruck und Komfort nicht sonderlich.
- Die Klimaanlage war in unserem Zimmer aufs Bett gerichtet, sodass man direkt angeblasen wird. Für unser Empfinden war das zum Schlafen ein bisschen unangenehm, aber das ist sicherlich auch relativ individuell.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The property was so clean and all the facilities were amazing. The staff couldn’t do enough to help; in explaining what there was to see, helping to arrange tickets and tours. We loved it so much we extended our stay by 2 days. There were also free bikes which enabled us to cycle to both the beach and the old town multiple times - which was brilliant.
review.comment_negative: There were some very temporary works ongoing (fire door installation) which was completed at respectable times and the hotel staff forewarned us and compensated us for the disruption (only disrupted us as we were unwell on 1 day so spent time in our room during the day).

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: Breakfast was excellent. Staff were phenomenal. Location was great. We would definitely be staying here again on our next visit to Hoi An.

review.rating: Hoogste prijs kwaliteit verhouding met super uitgebreid ontbijt.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Zonder overdrijven het beste ontbijt ooit. Super mooie en hygiënische Spa. Zeer bekwaam, behulpzaam en super vriendelijk personeel. Ook veel personeel aanwezig dus geen wachttijden. Super locatie. Halverwege tussen strand en oude stad.

review.rating: Muy comfortable. Buen ubicado. Buena atención.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Reservamos dos habitaciones. Una era igual a las fotos del anuncio, la otra era bastante más pequeña, ero igualmente era cómoda. El desayuno es bueno. Hay bicicletas gratuitas disponibles. Nos ayudaron también a encotnrar un transporte para una visita en Da Nang, y los traslados a/desde el aeropuerto. La piscina es muy agradable, y se agradece en tiempos de mucho calor.
review.comment_negative: En el checkout, antes de pagar, me insistieron mucho en que les valorara en ese momento, con un 10 en Booking y se quedaron esperando a que lo hiciera allí delante, con mi teléfono móvil. No me pareció nada correcta esta forma de proceder. Les recomiendo que dejen de hacer eso porque desmerece la experiencia en el hotel, y precisamente por eso, mi valoración es inferior a la que podría haber sido. Por lo demás, la estancia fue muy bien.

review.rating: We felt at home in Hoi An thanks this hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Wow, there's so much love at this hotel, and they're not afraid to show it. The warm and genuine welcome we received from the staff carried all the way through our entire stay. They took care of everything to make us happy and comfortable, and always treated us with kindness and respect.

The room and property are well appointed. We had a clean and private room with a balcony and spacious bathroom. The ceiling fan and A/C kept things cool at night, and there was no issue with noise.

Each morning at the restaurant is a delicious breakfast buffet with fresh fruit (including mango — I have say this), pastries, juices, Vietnamese and Western dishes, coffee, and a respectable selection of vegetarian foods.

Things quiet down in the afternoon, and the pool and restaurant areas are ideal for relaxing or getting some work done (internet speeds are good).

The hotel is ideally located, too: walking distance to the Old Town and countless restaurants/coffee, but also walking distance to the rice fields, and biking distance to the beach. Since we're runners, we got to enjoy morning runs in the stunning rice fields of Hoi An. The rice fields are huge, so you could run for miles and miles. 

Of course, the reason our stay was so wonderful is because of all the people who work here: Mr. Ha, Ms. Sue, Ms. Dzung, Ms. Thuy, Ms. Sa, Ms. Thao, and the entire housekeeping, bell, and restaurant staff. These are wholehearted people who will make you feel at home in Hoi An!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
La chambre est spacieuse, vue sur la piscine. La piscine est propre, serviette est à dispo.
Personnels sont agréables

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

Das Personal war sehr aufmerksam und extrem freundlich. Sie haben uns geholfen ein preiswertes Moped zu mieten, haben den Flughafen Transfer organisiert und uns auch bei der Planung von einem Ausflug geholfen.  Das Frühstück war top! 
Die Lage des Hotels war super. Es gibt gratis Fahrräder mit denen man problemlos in die Stadt fahren kann. Wir haben sogar unseren Aufenthalt um 4 Tage verlängert.

Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen. Ich kann dieses Hotel absolut weiterempfehlen.
Danke für die tolle Zeit

review.rating: Fantastic boutique hotel in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic hotel with attentive staff, good facilities & good location. 

The hotel is about 1.5kms from the ancient town but the hotel has bicycles that you can utilise free of charge. It makes access a breeze. Additionally, the ride to An Ban beach is 3.5kms away, all flat terrain and very easy to get to. 

We fully utilised the pool area and also the spa (which was excellent). Breakfast is complimentary and had a good selection of Vietnamese & Western options.

Our room was gorgeous, spacious, had a lovely terrace & exquisite bathroom.

Truly a joy to stay at for our 5 day duration.
review.comment_negative: My wife and I are cocktail drinkers and I have to say that the expertise at the bar was sub-standard. Whilst this was the only fault with the property I think it somewhat poor to charge for drinks that are either not properly made or not poured to international standards. This area needs to be improved.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
The hotel staff were so friendly and very attentive.
The hotel itself was beautiful and very clean and tidy.
There was free bike rental at the hotel which was perfect for exploring Hoi An and the food was really good too.
We extended our stay by an additional day as we really liked this hotel.

When I catched a flu, they gave me a late check-out and offered me a face mask, which also shows how much they care about their customers. The room was beautiful and very clean, and the pool area was great. Laundry service was fast and my clothes came back perfect. And breakfast had a good variety of dishes.

review.comment_positive: Great hotel with large rooms outside of the tourist center (a good thing!), but with plenty of amenities nearby.  Free bikes are great for easy pedal into the center or through the fields to the beach.  Nice breakfast buffet and fantastic staff.  On site remodeling during the day and construction in the neighborhood was a slight inconvenience but only on the rainy day when we lingered at the hotel.  Overall, a comfortable place.

review.rating: A good choice in Hoi An
review.room_type: Suite 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: Nice big room, comfortable beds, good size warm pool, good breakfast selection, close to rice fields for bicycling. A bit of a walk to the old town but not too far and there are plenty of restaurants nearby anyway so you don’t need to go to the old town to eat. Room on the pool side was quiet.
review.comment_negative: Gym was a bit small and stationary bike didn’t work (same as at every other hotel we’ve stayed at in Vietnam!) but they said they’d fix it.

review.comment_positive: Staff are friendly and helpful.  Good room.  Good restaurant for dinner and breakfast.  Good location to begin walk on Hai Ba Trung down to Hoi Ann old town.

review.rating: Well done Golden Holiday – 10 out of 10 for that beautiful stay 😊
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: If there is one thing I look for in a hotel, then it's the bed and its pillows. Relaxation is the key factor when I go on any holiday. Their beds and pillows are getting it on the spot, almost that you won't come out of it ;-) Next was the service: directly while checking in we got plenty of great tips, ideas and addresses for what to do, eat or shop. Also, here they did a fantastic job, which became very evident going to other places, having a direct comparison to the recommendations. We can only highly recommend this place, which is also close to the center, 5 min by taxi or 15 by feet – or you take their free bicycles and be there in 8 min. Thanks Golden Holiday for organising a great trip and stay! We also took their offer from being picked up from the airport (350.000 Dong or $15), which is also the same price if you do it via Grab. Therefore, we took that service getting back to the airport as well, because peace of mind is also invaluable to us.

Die guten Bewertungen rechtfertigen die gebotenen Gelder beim Check-out, um möglichst einheitlichen Bewertungszuwachs zu erhalten. Der Kaffee beim Frühstück kostet extra, sofern man nicht den vorgebrühten haben möchte.

review.comment_positive: What an excellent stay! The staff here were so wonderful and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable. Breakfast options were delicious and varied (for vegetarians as well), rooms were large, clean and very comfortable. We used the pool and gym which were great additions. About a 15-20 minute walk to the ancient town. We used the airport transfer service with them as well which was punctual and comfortable. The staff were so friendly in the way they greeted us each day and gave us advice about walking the streets and what to be careful of and where to find the best Bahn Mi! They spoke excellent English and even the cleaners were lovely! A super easy, relaxing stay, would definitely come again!

review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing. Very friendly and accomodating. They helped us book day trips and gave recommendations on things to do and places to eat which were all excellent recommendations. The spa was great and relaxing. They were accomodating of our late flights- our flight was delayed coming into Hoi An and we arrived well past midnight but there was no issues with check in, after checking out they kept our luggage and let us use the pool and the facilities until our evening flight once again. The staff were fabulous and seemed interested in our experience, prior to arriving they messaged asking if there were any special requests etc and during our stay they knew which room we were in and what day trips we were going to etc so it felt personal. Breakfast had a nice selection.

review.rating: excellent all-around stay at this hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
We stayed at Golden Holiday for a few days, in a total of 3 rooms. I'm going to give you lots of details about our stay, so you can see if it is right for you. Short story - we really enjoyed it!

First the rooms - rooms are quite large, with very nice sheets, towels, pillows - and a large bathroom with good showers. We're not talking super high-end, but for the price the rooms are great. Some rooms have a small sofa - ask if your room has one, or request one. Wi-fi worked great> Toilets worked well, with nice bidets attached. If you want a large, comfortable room - I don't think you can go wrong here.

Staff - staff are great. This place is well staffed, there are usually 2 or 3 receptionsts at the front desk, always willing to go out of their way for you. Especially Thuy and Ms. Kim - they are fantastic and will help make your stay very enjoyable. They often called "electric shuttles" for us, which worked well for transporting 5 people from 1 - 3km away.

Breakfast - there is a large breakfast buffet available every day from 7 to 10AM. Ours was included in the room rates. There was great coffee, also fruits, salads, asian, and some western items. Some days there were bacon and chocolate crossaints. You could always get eggs cooked anyway you liked. No pancakes or waffles, but I don't think these are very common in Vietnam. It was easy to grab some pastries to go from the breakfast buffet so you had some snacks for later on.

Pool - there was a medium sized pool outside. It was nice, clean - not super huge but large enough to do laps in it.

Location - it is located right on a semi-busy street, but we never heard noise from our rooms, as it is set back a bit from the road. There are plenty of spas and restaurants in the area - but you are outside of the super busy, noisy "old town" tourist area. It is a quick 5 min electric shuttle ride ($2 usd) or a 22 minute walk to the main "old town" walking areas.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Abbiamo scelto di stare ad Hoi An 4 notti per goderci qlc ora al mare e visitare le zone circostanti 

Il vero valore aggiunto dell'hotel è stata quindi la posizione.

Un km dalla città vecchia, circa 10-15 minuti a piedi e 4 km dal mare raggiungibile con le biciclette messe gratuitamente a disposizione dell'hotel.

Nonostante la guida vietnamita e le temperature il tragitto è assolutamente percorribile facilmente tramite la ciclabile o attraversando i campi e immergendosi in paesaggi bucolici.

Per il resto abbiamo apprezzato tutti i comfort di in hotel 4 stelle.

Buona e varia la colazione.

Apprezzatissima la piscina aperta fino alle 2130.

Personale gentile e disponibile per ogni tipo di supporto.
review.comment_negative:
Abbiamo avuto un problema col bagno, che si è allagato dopo una doccia e qualche problema con l'aria condizionata, ma ci è stata prontamente cambiata camera.

Il frigo non refrigerava l'acqua, impedendoci di avere acqua fresca.

Per il resto abbiamo trovato uno scarafaggio nel bagno e visto un topo 'correre' al lato della piscina di sera, ma probabilmente ciò non dipende dall'hotel.

review.rating: Fantastic Stay at Golden Holiday Hotel

review.comment_positive: All of the staff were extremely helpful and attentive especially Kim, Dung and Thauy. The location is not too far from the old town, an easy 10 mins walk or bike ride. There are some great coffee shops near by (Butter Oven & Kay Coffee House). The Hotel and room were clean, spacious and modern. Had everything we needed and would 100% stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Lo mejor del hotel la atención de Kim, Thuy y Dzung. Nuestra llegada coincidía con el paso de un tifón y nos estuvieron actualizando la situación por WhatsApp. Además te ayudan en todo momento con cualquier información o lo que sea que necesitéis! En cuanto al hotel, instalaciones y habitación, todo genial. Buena relación calidad-precio y una buena ubicación, a 20 minutos andando de la ciudad antigua, el hotel tiene servicio de bicis gratuito que se agradece. Lo único a comentar, en el desayuno. El desayuno es tipo buffet, es muy completo...además del buffet tenéis la posibilidad de elegir entre varios platos más que se cocinan a demanda... nosotras el primer día esto no lo sabíamos y tampoco nos informaron. Es una tontería, solo lo comento a modo de información para que lo sepáis ;) Sin dudar repetiríamos si volviésemos a Hoi An.

review.comment_negative: Das Personal ist zwar sehr hilfsbereit und unterstützt einem bei allen Anliegen, aber sie sind schon eher aufdringlich, weil sie bei jedem Vorbeigehen an der Reception fragen, wo man hingeht und was man vorhat. Auch beim Morgenessen werden alle angesprochen, was der Plan für den Tag ist und es werden gleich ungefragt mehrere Tipps gegeben. Beim letzten Morgenessen und Checkout wird mehrmals darum gebeten, das Hotel mit einer 10 zu bewerten. Verbesserungsvorschlag: weniger ist mehr, mehr Zurückhaltung und erst auf Nachfrage Tipps geben.

review.rating: Lovely hotel and staff, in a great location.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive:
My wife and I had a lovely 15 day stay at the Golden Holiday, in a deluxe room with balcony overlooking the pool.  Staff were all super friendly; a special mention to Nga, Kim & Dzung,  and our room was clean and spacious with comfy double bed, CNN TV channel for the latest news, and a nice bathroom with shower and constant hot water supply. The initial fridge wasn't cold enough for our liking, but was promptly replaced with one with a freezer compartment.
The buffet breakfast was good with a variety of hot foods, juices, pastries, bread, desserts, salads etc, as well as an egg/pancake/pho station. Offerings varied daily, but it would have been nice to have sausages occasionally, instead of the regular hot dogs. The dining room itself was clean and spacious, and closely monitored by the dining staff to ensure replenishment of food and clearing of tables. Great pool area with plenty of lounges & small gym with work station, free weights, exercise bike etc. Free bikes which were great to get around town and to the beach. Good location about a 15 min walk to the old town and 10 min ride to An Bang beach. Several good restaurants and mini marts nearby.

部屋は落ち着いたインテリアでシャワールームのアメニティもしっかり揃っておりとても快適に過ごせた。
このクオリティでこの値段はホイアンに来たら必ず泊まるべき。

She even helped book tickets to the Hoi An Memory Land Show. The hotel accommodated my early arrival and I got a triple room instead of the double I booked. The room and bathroom was very spacious and clean, bed was comfortable and the breakfast had a good variety of western and local food. This hotel is also located less than 2km from Hoi An Ancient Town and you can borrow and bike from the hotel to get there.

review.comment_positive: Excellent hotel and very reasonably priced. Well located in easy reach by foot or bike to the old town. The most attentive staff we have had whilst in Vietnam. Dung in particular was extremely helpful, provided plenty of recommendations to keep us busy during our stay. So pleased with the hotel booked an extra night. Room very spacious with balcony. Bed amazingly comfortable. Breakfast was plentiful, lots of choice for both western and local foods. The bread some of the best we have had. Pool decent size, plenty of sun loungers. All in all brilliant stay and highly recommend.

review.rating: A spectacular hotel at the crossroad of old town and the beach!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: What an exceptional hotel situated at the intersection of old town and the beach! During our four-night stay at the Golden Holiday, we were enchanted by the staff's exceptional service, going above and beyond to ensure our family's comfort with genuine warmth. The breakfast buffet boasted an extensive array of local and Western delicacies, featuring something uniquely delightful every day. Whether indoors or on the outdoor patio overlooking the street, there was a serene ambiance perfect for starting the day with a fresh cup of coffee. Accessing the beach was a breeze with complimentary bikes provided by the hotel, just a 15-minute ride away, allowing guests to bask in the breathtaking ocean views and invigorating sea breeze. Exploring the old town was equally convenient, either by a pleasant 15-minute stroll or via a Grab taxi for VND 20,000 (USD 1), readily available upon request. Our evenings spent in the old town were filled with joy, and we are immensely grateful to the entire staff for their exceptional hospitality. Without a doubt, we will be returning to this remarkable location on our next visit!

review.comment_positive: All of it, best smiling staff, Kim was charming, and very pleasant. Highly recommend!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
- Muy buena relación calidad-precio
- El hotel está muy bien y es tal cual aparece en las fotos. Pero no es un 4 estrellas, ni se sabe cuántas estrellas tiene. 
- Desayuno muy bueno, opciones occidentales principalmente.
- A 15 minutos andando del inicio del centro.
review.comment_negative:
- Mucha presión para ponerles una buena puntuación en booking. Esto explica la puntuación de este hotel y desgraciadamente, nos ocurrió en un par de sitios más en un viaje de 3 semanas por Vietnam. Te preguntan qué puntuación les vas a poner y te intentan regalar cosas para que les pongas un 10. 
- Cobran una comisión por pagar con tarjeta, pero cuando les dije que no estaba de acuerdo y que se la reclamaría al hotel a través de booking, decidieron no cobrármela. 
-Preguntamos precio de taxi para ir a Danang y nos dieron un precio muchísimo más alto que el que podías conseguir en cualquier lugar de la ciudad y en esta misma web. 
- Las excursiones a My Son también son más caras que en otros lugares y no por eso mejores. Recomiendo ir por tu cuenta y contratar audioguía para disponer de más tiempo allí.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Good welcome in our arrival - transfer from the airport to the hotel, the information conveyed by the receptionist about the hotel and about the city (map, main points of interest, best restaurants in old town). The location was excellent - near the old town, the rice fields and the An Bang beach. Bicycles are available. The best breakfast in Vietnam was in Hoi An Golden Holiday - fresh and tasty, with great diversity, local produce (delicious fruit and fruit juices). The room was big size and clean, with all comodities, the bed was comfortable. We really enjoyed the pool and the area around it. The staff was always very friendly and helpful. Booking tours services. Everything was perfect.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Big and  clean room.
Very nice and friendly and helpfull staff.
Tours you can book true hotel reception. Very easy. 
Great breakfast. A lot of choice. 
Bar, restaurant, pool and spa were great!
The distance to old town is good. 
Ms Dzung and the women with glasses from the reception are friendly and helpful.
Also the doorman (somewhat older man), and the long woman and man, and the pragnant lady at the restaurant who were serving the breakfast. Very nice and friendly. I didn't get their names! 
Recommending this hotel to other travelers.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Very clean, very good breakfast.
Staff are very nice and helpful 
A little bit far from the centre

review.rating: Empfehlung für ruhiges Hotel in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Das aufmerksame Personal. English Kenntnisse waren im Vergleich zu anderen Hotels unserer Rundreise gut. Viele Tipps zu Ausflügen und Möglichkeit über das Hotel zu buchen. Lage etwas außerhalb der Altstadt, was wir gut fanden = ruhig. "Echter" Kaffee zum Frühstück. Riesiges und gemütliches Bett. Wir hatten ein wirklich großes geräumiges Zimmer mit Blick/ Balkon zum Pool.
review.comment_negative: Badewanne mit Duschvorhang anstatt Dusche für meinen Geschmack nicht mehr ganz zeitgemäß. Dafür war der Duschvorhang sauber. Dielen am Pool sind lose und sollten überarbeitet werden.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Very friendly and helpful stuff. They booked a half day taxi for us with excellent driver and car. They offered a take away breakfast box as we had to go on a tour earlier than the breakfast time. Very good massage facilities.

Everything was perfect, I wish we had a few more days to spend in Hoi An and especially in this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: We had a great stay at this hotel. From the first moment we were warmly welcomed at reception by Ms. Kim and Ms. Dzung. We were given advice on what to do in the area and tips for tourists. The staff at the hotel always had a smile on their face. The rooms are very nice and clean and facilities were great. The pool area is lovely with towels provided. Free bike hire to get easily to the Old Town or beach. I’d highly recommend staying here when visiting Hoi An!

review.rating: Voortreffelijke ligging en uitgangspositie voor een bezoek aan Hoi An

review.comment_positive: Amazing staff, super friendly and very helpful with everything we asked. Comfiest bed and pillows ever, no joke. Decent breakfast with lots of choices. Right between the beach and Hoi An old town, plus you get bikes for free!
review.comment_negative: Nothing wrong with this hotel, simply a great stay!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive:
We stayed 3 nights at this hotel.  The room was clean, spacious and very well designed.  There was plenty of space for our luggage, many hangers, a nice seating area.  

The service was excellent.  The staff at the reception desk were efficient, friendly, helpful and always greeted us with smiles.  We didn’t have any communication problems.  Special thank you to Ms. Thuy who allowed us to check-in a little early and check-out a little later.  

We enjoyed the breakfast.  There were Vietnamese and Western dishes to choose from.  There was also a good selection of fruit.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Einfach unglaublich! alle Mitarbeiter insbesondere Frau thuy, Dzung & Kim waren unglaublich freundlich. sie haben uns bei allem gut beraten und standen uns immer zur Seite. ich hatte auch eine Massage bei Lan, die war auch einfach nur super und zu einem fairen Preis. besonders gut gefallen hat uns das Hotel und die Ausstattung. die Lage ist perfekt. Zum Frühstück habe es entweder a la cart oder Buffet, immer abhängig davon wie viele Gäste dort waren. Ich finde es super, wenn dadurch vermieden wird, das zu viel essen weggeschmissen wird. beide Varianten waren sehr lecker und ausreichend :) es gab immer frisches Obst und Säfte, Kaffee und Tee. Sehr zu empfehlen ist das Hausgetränk, welches man immer bekommt (sogar die Gäste), die in der Lobby auf z.B. ein Taxi warten. Rundum einfach nur perfekt, vor allem die kostenfreien Fahrräder vor dem Hotel. wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder!! Danke an das tolle Team!!

review.comment_negative: However, this is definetely not a 9.8 hotel, as currently advertised. The facilities looked outdated and the décor is old-fashioned.  Breakfast is average, at best. The restaurant is very modest. It is located a little far from the city center (around 15-20min walk). In sum, it is a good hotel, but it does not have that next-level quality that you might expect from such a well-reviewed place.

The rooms were quite large, updated and comfortable and were cleaned daily. We were very happy with our stay here.

review.comment_positive: The location and staff were great Ms. Dzung was very helpful with organising an airport transfer and also helping out with an issue with a tour I had booked. I would come back again next time I’m in Hoi An.

review.room_type: Suite 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Hồ bơi
Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Super netter Empfang, wir haben ein Begrüßungsgetränk bekommen, uns wurde unser Gepäck abgenommen und erst mal ein paar Tipps zu Hoi An und der Umgebung gegeben. Alles sehr nett und freundlich.
Wir waren vor der offiziellen Check-In Zeit dort, unser Zimmer wurde jedoch priorisiert hergerichtet, sodass wir nach einer kurzen Wartezeit am Pool rein konnten.
Das Zimmer war super geräumig, sehr ordentlich und schick eingerichtet. Wir hatten einen kleinen Balkon mit Blick auf den Pool und haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt.
Die Lage des Hotels ist unserer Meinung nach optimal. Innerhalb von 10 Minuten zu Fuß erreicht man die Altstadt und somit das Zentrum. 
Es gibt kostenlose Fahrräder und es ist ebenfalls möglich einen Roller für kleines Geld pro Tag zu leihen.
Spa Behandlungen zu fairen Preisen und sehr angenehm. Leider haben es einige andere Gäste noch nicht verstanden, dass man im Spa Bereich mit gesenkter Stimme spricht.
review.comment_negative:
Einziger Kritikpunkt ist der Föhn. Hier handelt es sich um einen sehr leistungsschwachen Föhn, der noch dazu mit einem festen, geringelten Kabel/Station an der Wand befestigt ist, welche noch dazu sehr kurz ist. 
Habe ich allerdings beim Check-Out angesprochen und es hieß, dass man sich darum kümmern würde.

review.rating: Ma Kim so nice , thank you .
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Un hotel perfecto para estar en Hoi An, las instalaciones del hotel son muy buenas, el personal del hotel es muy querido y desde la llegada te brindan todo la información necesaria,  en nuestro caso nos hicieron early checkin y nos hicieron upgrade de habitación.  La habitación súper amplia y con todo lo necesario.  El hotel tiene piscina con una zona muy agradable.  Los desayunos muy completos y ricos,  desde frutas hasta platos tradicionales vietnamitas, huevos, tea, cafe etc.
El hotel cuenta con bicicletas que te las prestan para salir a dar un paseo por la ciudad.
Excelente ubicación, muy recomendable.
El personal del hotel siempre estuvo en contacto con nosotros y nos ayudaron a coordinar los traslados desde el aeropuerto de Da Nang hasta el hotel y al regreso también.
Muchas gracias a todo el equipo del hotel por hacer que nuestra estadía fuera muy agradable.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Our stay was very pleasant. The welcome Ginger tea was the best we’ve had in Vietnam. 

Above all, the staff are the highlight of our stay! We had to check out early in the morning 5 am to catch a flight, so we couldn’t catch the breakfast and we mentioned this to the hotel staff (Trang and Sa) and they were very kind to prepare a to go breakfast from scratch for us and made exactly the dishes we said we’d like. 

Cannot recommend this place enough, what makes a hotel stay a special one is always lovely and amazing staff. Thank you Trang and Sa!

review.comment_positive:
Unser Aufenthalt im Golden Holoday Hotel war super. Das Frühstücksbuffet hat eine grosse Auswahl und ist sehr sauber. Man kann auch verschiedene Speisen bestellen, die frisch zubereitet werden.
Das Hotelpersonal ist sehr nett und äusserst hilfsbereit.
Mit dem Velo des Hotels fährt man in wenigen Minuten ins Zentrum der Stadt. (Kostenlos)
Besonders hervorzuheben ist der Zimmerservice: Als wir zu früh zurück ins Zimmer kamen & der Raum noch nicht gereinigt wurde, haben Sie uns angerufen und nachgefragt, ob sie den Raum noch reinigen sollen. Wir haben dann eine Zeit abgemacht & der Zimmerservice ist noch vorbei gekommen.

review.comment_positive: We absolutely loved our stay at this property. The hotel is very clean and tidy and well decorated. The room was well sized and was very comfortable, we slept very well here. The hotel is very close to the old town and you can easily walk around. The hotel offers bicycles to use as well or you can get a taxi to drop you off. The staff are incredibly attentive and friendly from the moment you get to the hotel and we’re incredibly helpful at when it came to booking day trips and offering any recommendations. If you had any questions it was never a hassle and they were always happy to help.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: We had an amazing stay in this hotel. The hotel team is unbelievably kind and helpful - always trying to make the best of our holidays. They helped us with our pick-up and drop-off at the airport, with booking a private driver for our day trips to My Son and other locations, and organized everything else for us. The room had everything we needed. It was clean, comfortable and the bath room was huge. We can definitely recommend this hotel and would always come back.
review.comment_negative: The only minor thing that could be improved is making the windows on the street side more soundproof. We know you can't have both: a centrally located hotel and no noise from the outside. But investing into better windows would definitely help those people who are more sensitive to noise. Anyway, we slept very well. So, nothing to complain from our side.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Amazing hotel. I arrived in the morning after a long trip and was able to check into my room earlier. The room is very spacious with a lot of natural light and a very comfortable bed. The staff is great. Swimming pool and breakfast are also very good. I definitely recommend this place.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: La atención del personal del hotel fue excelente. Está un poco alejado del centro, pero la zona es mucho más tranquila y ofrecen bicis gratis, por lo que se puede llegar enseguida.

review.rating: Excellent Customer Service from entire team.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Everything

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
I dont even know where to begin, so let me just get this of my chest - this hotel is the best value for money you could ever get. We wanted to stay for two nights, ended up staying for almost a week. We didn’t make it easy for the hotel crew either (sorry!! :)) 
last minute notice +1days became almost a trademark. However, the stoical patience of Ms.Kim and Ms.Thuy turned a booking chore it into a fun breakfast banter. Always with a simile, and so so helpful, they truly are amazing! We changed rooms 3 times! (high season - mid-autum festival) They recommended the best option available! 

Got carried away, and ended up drinking Larue (local beer) till 1am? Ms.Sa and Ms.Selena got you covered - ready to greet you back and always considerate - ‚so what would you like to eat tomorrow morning?’ - the words to end the day by. 

Wanna book a last second tour to My Son? Sure - Ms. Lam is on it - few phone calls later, a bus is ready to pick you up! 

Backpacking and your clothes are all in Mekong mud? gotcha! Leave for a quick stroll through Hoi An and you’ll find your stuff washed and waiting in your room. 
Need a motorbike? 5 minutes - waiting outside! 

Want to get recommendations for local tailors? Google maps already fired up. 

Lastly, special thanks to Ms. Dzung - she saved my ass when my scooter broke down in the middle of nowhere 60km outside of Hoi An. 

Whatsapp communication - sure!

Airport transfers - got you covered (at a bargain, might I add)

All in all, couldn’t have asked for a better experience! 

Highly recommended!!
review.comment_negative: Not a thing :) wish we could stay longer.

review.rating: Very good hotel with lovely stuff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Lovely stuff. The photos are exactly the same as what you get.
Kim the manager was super nice and advise as to go to the best tailor Tuong and the breakfast was super great.
Very recommend!

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel in an ideal location in Hoi An. The staff of Ms Kim, Ms Sa and Ms Lee we’re incredibly helpful and made our stay very enjoyable. They helped us extend our stay as well as providing us with recommendations for a cooking class and a tailor. Couldn’t recommend the hotel any more. Free bikes to get to the old town were very convenient.

review.rating: Apartment sized room in a classy hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
What more could you ask for in Hoi An? The superior room we stayed in was HUGE. I mean, like bigger than an apartment. Really classy furnishings, impossibly quiet, and just overall a really nice place to stay. The staff here though are the real highlight. Not only do you get to stay in such a nice room, but you get the sweetest staff who are so helpful and kind.

It's a short walk to the Old Town, but there's also nice places nearby to the hotel which you should check out too for lunch and so on. It's also nice to not be in the hustle and bustle of Old Town all the time. 

Also... TWO balconies? Wow!

Thank you so much to Dung, Kim & Sa for your hospitality. I would love to return to Golden Holiday!
review.comment_negative: The road outside the hotel had a bit of construction going on, so it was a bit hard to walk around. Really minor though.

review.rating: Enjoyable stay at well-situated and friendly hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Breakfast selections for hot and cold options were all very good.  Food was tasty whether Vietnamese or Western.  We used the free bike rentals a few times to go into Old Town as well as outside to the rice paddies and An Bang Beach outside of Hoi An.  The bikes have built-in locks which are a convenient feature.  We love the big bathroom of our room.  The location of the hotel was close enough to Old Town to walk but far enough from all the noise of Old Town. The staff were all super friendly.  Booked a few tours at the front desk.  Also had a massage at their spa, which was also very good.  Overall, this hotel is of great value with nice facilities close to Old Town.  I highly recommend them.

review.rating: Brilliant. Hotel superb. Staff great and location perfect.

Everything. Can book events at hotel.

review.comment_positive:
Stayed in a triple room.  Good variety of options for buffet breakfast.
Nice pool area.  We had a massage at the spa which was very nice. 
Free bikes available but we didn't use them. 15-20 min walk to the centre of old town. There are some nice family run restaurants close to the hotel for dinner which are much cheaper than the old town.

review.rating: חופשה מדהימה נהנו בעיקר מהשירות הטוב והאדיב
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: המלון היה מדהים, חדרים נקיים, בריכה גדולה ונקייה. השירות שנתנו לנו מעולה. קים פקידה הקבלה מדהימה עוזרת בכל מה שצריך, נותנת לנו המלצות על מקומות, חייכנית ואדיבה. המלון פינק אותנו במסאז לרגל ירח הדבש. האוכל היה טוב, התחשבו בנו שאנחנו אוכלים כשר , והכינו דברים לפי שביקשנו.
review.comment_negative:
הכל היה מושלם, המיקום טיפה רחוק מהעיר העתיקה, משהו כמו 10 דקות הליכה.
אך יש להם שירותי אופניים בחינם וזה פותר את העניין הזה.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Das Personal hervorragend!!
Zimmer bald renovationsbedürftig. Kleine Verbesserung würden schon viel bewirken.
Frühstück sollte verkleinert werden. Die A La Carte Angebote und das Gebäck würden eine wunderbares Angebot bilden und umweltfreundlicher sein.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: La piscine , le petit déjeuner très varié, la grande chambre, et l emplacement .

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
We stayed five nights, and absolutely loved this hotel.  The staff is wonderful, the hotel and rooms are very clean, and the breakfast is excellent.  They also provide complimentary bikes to explore the area.  The pool/poolside is very nice. 
 Our daughter got sick, and they arranged for a doctor to come to the room. (note.- The doctor charges a flat $100 fee -FYI). All in all, a wonderful experience.

review.rating: Overall it was fantastic service, a bed to die for, and convenient location to get around all the attractions in Hoi An.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The property is very convenient to go to the ancient town of Hoi An, the hotel provided free bicycles to get around as on when you like, which was a bonus, the man that helped us to get the bikes was very sweet; making sure the seat was at the right level for us to sit.

Our room had lovely Vietnamese decor and a clean feel, plus the bed was very big and comfy. 
The staff at the reception was very attentive and welcoming. Any adjustments that I wanted to be done for my stay and help with tour booking and advice on where to go to, they were superb and got to it straight away. 

The breakfast is done is a smart way, you eat as and when you wake up and they will prepare it, unlike other hotels where you have a time frame to eat. 

We also went to the spa that belongs to the hotel, had great discount and good authentic massage.
review.comment_negative:
The bathroom shower was not considered when it was built in. The bath was a little too far to collect all the water from the shower head, causing the water to fall onto the tiles around the bath and then onto the floor. We also stayed in a different room on the top floor, the water pressure was weak. 
Also for a nice hotel like this, it should of provide an iron.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpful staff. Excellent breakfast buffet. Very good hotel.

Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who visits. Special thanks to Dung, Kim, Thuy, Sa and Selena for their help planning what to do during our stay.

review.comment_positive: ottima struttura, le camere sono molto belle e spaziose. Personale gentile, ti aiuta ad organizzare transfert per aeroporto e tour nella zona. Dista circa 15 min a piedi dalle vie del centro antico. Colazione presenta molte alternative. Avendo fatto ceck out molto presto, ci hanno fatto trovare due box con colazione d’asporto. Servizio lavanderia ottimo
review.comment_negative: C’era un rumore di autoclave che si sentiva di notte ma credo fosse un problema momentaneo dovuto ad un difetto (stanza al 5 piano)

review.comment_positive: Great hotel, make guests feel  special,  food excellent,  comfy bed,, great location , a special thank you to miss sue( guest relations  officer) for making my stay special.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Pool area was fantastic. I loved the room, great size and good natural light. Staff were also very helpful in helping us to book tours and transfers that were good value!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: This is the best hotel I've stayed at during a few months travelling around Asia. All of the staff are so friendly and helpful, everything is very clean and nicely designed around the hotel, the rooms are very comfortable and spacious, and the food at breakfast was always delicious with lots of different options. Hoi An's Ancient Town is only about a 10-15 minute walk away too, so it's a good location. A great hotel overall and such good value for money.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Warm friendly staff always happy to help and make stay more comfortable. Lovely relaxing pool area. Room was absolutely beautiful. We stayed in a premium room with balcony. It was very spacious and the bed was super comfy. Location of the hotel was perfect plenty of restaurants and coffee shops right next to the hotel. About a 15/20 minute stroll into the old town or a 4 minute drive in a grab. Great breakfast included something different every morning and plentiful. There is also a restaurant and bar at the hotel......serves the best vietnamese iced coffee.The jewel of the hotel is Ms Sue who always had a huge smile and welcoming hello she is a credit to the hotel works extremely hard and always makes every guest feel special and welcome. 
Thank you to each and every staff member at the hotel who made our stay special. We would definitely stay at the golden holiday hotel and spa again

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Friendly and helpful staff. Great location and easy transport to old town

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Great little hotel. Exceptional value for money. Not far from the old town. Nice little pool and gym. Great breakfast.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Schönes Zimmer, gutes Frühstück, sehr gute Lage zu den Busverbindungen, sehr hilfreiches Personal, das uns die Fahrt nach Hue gebucht hat.

review.rating: Comfortable stay about 10mins drive from main HoiAn Markets
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Great service by staff and quite a good facility with large room / bathroom and good breakfast options.
review.comment_negative: The shower leaked water outside the bathtub which made the floors wet and was a safety issue, but was well acknowledged.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Such a wonderful stay with Golden  Holiday - rooms were clean and nicely decorated, pool and free bikes were  terrific which we used extensively,, conveniently 15 mins to the beach and town. Spa was good value and just downstairs. Having 2 lifts on the property was also a great benefits as was travelling with my 75 yo elderly mother 

Spacious rooms, comfortable beds and having a sofa to lounge was a bonus. We had an issue with the ac on the first evening and they went above and beyond, transferring us to another room making sure guests had a good night's sleep. 

Ms Dzung and Ms Sue were absolutely amazing -  so welcoming, helpful and friendly, always checking in one the guests well being. 

My only suggestion is to offer a water refilling station in the lobby to minimise plastic (small bottles in the rooms were insufficient and very wasteful). 

Thanks again for a wonderful stay! Happy memories of Hoi An
review.comment_negative: Too much plastic water bottles wastage - as per suggestion above, refillable cold water station would be better.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công

review.comment_positive:
I really liked my room and especially the bathroom. It was big and spacious. The room was very clean and beatifully designed.
The staff was nice and helpful with hoi an tourist information. The breakfast was also really nice and the pool is very fun.
review.comment_negative: I liked the gym but i think that some facilities are missing and the room is a bit cramped.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Staff muy eficiente empático y colaborador  . Instalaciones cómodas y con muy buen gusto. Cama comodísima, desayuno abundante con mucha variedad y calidad. Piscina y zona de relax perfectos. Gimnasio para entrenamiento completo
Aunque está a quince minutos andando de la ciudad antigua,está equidistante del centro y de la playa. Te dejan bicicletas para circular por la ciudad
Dund, Kim,Thuy, Sa,Selene, todo el personal de limpieza,cocina, restaurante son personas y profesionales invaluables.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
I don't even know how to start this review to reflect how wonderful the stay at this hotel was.  We planned to stay here two nights, but extended our stay to 7 days because we felt so good here.  The most important thing is the people who work here.  Mr. Kim, Sa, Dung, Selena, Lam and Thuj helped us at every step and in every matter.  They were caring, patient and always ready to help.  They helped us book trips, but also when our scooter broke down in the middle of nowhere, they did everything to save us.

Apart from that, the rooms were beautiful, nothing was a challenge for the service, the breakfasts were delicious, and we felt taken care of every step of the way.  After returning to Poland, we will remember this magical place with longing.

PS.  Massage was awesome as well!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
- Staff was super friendly and helped us with everything we needed/asked for. Also gave us many recommendations which was invaluable.
- Breakfast was phenomenal.
- Bikes are available at the hotel for free to move around the city. Locationwise the hotel is a bit of a walk from the Old Town, but the bikes compensate for it.

Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Wij hadden echt een fantastische kamer met 2 balkons, een bad en aparte douche. Lekker ruim, veel kastruimte, een lekkere bank, bureau, alles wat je thuis zou willen. 
Het zwembad is zo lekker, heerlijke ligbedden en super grote handdoeken. Ontbijt lekker en gevarieerd met eieren, pancakes en soep op bestelling. De gratis fietsen waren perfect om naar het strand of de stad te gaan, alles op korte afstand. Rondom hotel ook genoeg plekjes om te eten,maar in de stad ook lekker. 
Happy hour van 4 tot 6 met lekkere cocktails!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ

review.comment_positive: L'hôtel est bien situé à environ 15 minutes de marche à pied du vieux centre. Nos chambres étaient spacieux avec balcon et douche à l'italienne. Le lit est très confortable et la chambre bien insonorisée. Le petit déjeuner buffet est très varié pour tous les goûts. Le staff est très aimable et les excursions proposés bien organisées. Merci pour tout !

review.room_type: Suite 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: We have had the best time ever together in Hoi An. My parents like all things in Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa, and thought that we would choose this excellent accommodation if we have chance to come back Hoi An. Thanks to all staff, especially the reception- and bike-team. Hope to see your smiling faces again. :)

However saying all of that, the staff here were the best part of our stay here. They’re very attentive to all of the customers and guests needs. They’re helpful and so kind. We were only supposed to stay here 3 nights, but we loved it so much we cancelled our other hotel and extended our stay in this hotel for the rest of our time in Hoi An.

Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilft gerne bei allen Fragen und Anliegen weiter. Sie bieten auch Rundreisen und Touren an. Das Frühstücksbuffet ist umfangreich von lokal über westlicher Küche. Unser Zimmer war groß, gut ausgestattet und sehr sauber! Können es nur empfehlen!

Le personnel est aux petit soin et le petit dej est incroyable !! 
N’hésitez pas à aller voir le Bamboo Show (spectacle recommandé par l’hôtel) c’est absolument génial !!

review.comment_positive: The hotel is just off the main road but it wasn't noisy when we stayed there. It is a pleasant neighbourhood. We had a good rest at night. We had 2 connecting rooms with our adult children in the other room. Our room had a sitting area with no balcony whereas the children's room was the other way round. A leasure stroll of 15 mins to one direction (should be less than 1.5 km) will lead you to the ancient town, along the way you will find local shops. and eateries. The other direction is to the beach (3.5km) and the hotel offers free bicycles if you would like to cycle over. The staff were always eager to help. Breakfast spread n the varieties offered over the 3 days were pretty good.
review.comment_negative: The bathroom has a bathtub which doubles up as a shower place. The tub has grooves on the surface to prevent slipping. There is a wide step attached to the tub to help one to get into the tub. Would prefer a bathroom that has a shower place.
