review.rating: Nice, friendly hotel; gym needs an upgrade
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
We liked everything except for the gym. The staff are helpful, friendly and will go the extra mile to make you feel welcome. 

The location is just outside the old town but only a short walk away. There are restaurants and cafés nearby.
review.comment_negative:
The gym is small and cramped. The exercise bike is too small for anyone over 172 cm and is old so it should be replaced.

The hotel's bikes are great to have but again, too small for taller people. They should have some that have longer seat posts so that they can be adjusted to fit taller folks.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: We loved everything about this hotel and would go back in a heart beat! We had mixed up our dates and only realised when we got off the plane in Da Nang. Within 10 minutes they picked us up and brought us to the hotel. We got  our room on arrival without any trouble. The room was spacious and clean with a balcony, great aircon and exceptional large bathroom. We tried their spa and it was relaxing and the staff were lovely. We used theirgym which had all your basic equipment and plenty of aircon. The pool and it's area were exceptionally clean. The staff never stopped working and were always at had. We got brilliant reccommendations of what to do. They had bicycles to use for free. We did the tour which included going to the markets, going on basket boats and a cooking class to finish. This is a MUST try! I used the laundry service and the clothes were done so quickly and smelled amazing. The food was lovely. We went for fruit, toast and juice most mornings. All the staff were amazing especially Ms. Sa, Selina, Kim and Dung. We could name them all! When we finished our stay they arranged a taxi to bring us to our next hotel in Da Nang. The best!

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Excellent experience thanks to the staff here. Wonderful hotel and facilities would definitely recommend

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Không gian vừa đủ cho nhóm. Ban công nhỏ, không có view gì đặc sắc.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Wonderful accommodation, great staff who helped us with everything from a motorbike rental to a recommendation of local restaurants.  We received a higher level of accommodation than we ordered, for which we thank you.  Laundry is available. Very comfortable bed! The hotel has a beautiful swimming pool and free bicycles.  It is a short walk to both the center and the city beach.  There is a café nearby where they offer European breakfasts.  Because of Covid the hotel did not offer breakfast but I believe it would be amazing as a whole stay here. No noise woke us up at night.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: fantastic breakfast and spacious rooms

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Not too much traffic around, room was as nice as on the photos, big room(30m2) with  big bathroom,  bed was comfy, furnitures are lovely. Massage ladys were super nice, i fell asleep  during the massage, Price 480.000 d for 90 Minutes Massage, cheaper than in Da Nang. Reception was also helpful.
review.comment_negative: Sound insulation was not so good, we could hear people outside and in the next room.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Great location and facilities. Hotel staff are super helpful and friendly. Accommodate for all the guests requests. Thank you to the staff particularly Kim, Dung and Thuy who were there to help and advise and give good recommendations for places to visit and eat.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: La habitación muy cómoda y con todo lo necesario. El desayuno buenísimo.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Wir hatten einen super schönen Aufenthalt im Golden Holiday. Die Mitarbeiterinnen waren sehr freundlich und flexibel. Insbesondere Kim war sehr hilfreich und Extrawünsche wurden ohne Zögern erfüllt. Wir empfehlen das Hotel definitiv weiter.
review.comment_negative: Die Klimaanlage im Zimmer ließ sich nicht problemlos ausschalten und es roch etwas muffig.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Der Service war vom Empfang über den Aufenthalt bis zum Auschecken perfekt.
Das Personal ist unglaublich freundlich und aufmerksam. Wir haben uns in dem Hotel sehr wohl gefühlt und noch einen Tag verlängert. Das Früstück ist gut, umfangreich und der Frühstückssaal hat eine angenehme Atmosphäre. Wir waren oft im schönen Pool.
Rundum eine gute Erfahrung.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người
review.comment_positive: Everything was excellent and exceptional. Specially the service staff was super good and very friendly, worth to mention Ms Kim Dzung at reception who was very supportive. Hotel made sure our preference for vegetarian options in breakfast is fulfilled. 10/10 for the facilities.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Very friendly & helpful staff. Clean everywhere & very comfortable beds

review.rating: Sehr gutes Hotel zu fairen Preis. Gerne wieder!!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: sehr guter Service, gemütliche und saubere Zimmer. Pool mit gemütlichen Liegen und kleiner Fitness-Raum. Spa- und Ausflugsmöglichkeiten ebenfalls gut und preiswert!

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố

review.rating: Amazing stay and great value for money.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: It's really a great hotel. Amazing breakfast, big rooms, great pool and last but not least very kind and helpful staff.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Todo la piscina y el servicio gratuito de bicicletas es genial!
review.comment_negative:
La mampara de la ducha perdía un poco de agua, pero hemos
Informado y le darán solución.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Værelset var rigtig dejligt og rigtig stort. Badeværelset var stort og sengen var rigtig dejlig. 

Personalet på hotellet var det sødeste pg mest oprigtige vi har oplevet på vores 3 måneders backpackertur. Specielt Ms.Sue som tog sig tid til at forklare om byens seværdigheder og oplevelser vi kunne få i Hoi An. Det er muligt at leje cykler gratis og alt liger inden for cykel afstand. 
Morgenmaden var også rigtig god.

Dette er hotellet hvor vi har fået allermest valuta for pengene uden tvivl.
review.comment_negative: Vi har intet dårligt at sige om hotellet overhovedt, men hvis vi skal nævne noget er det fitness, som har stor betydning for os. Fitness på hotellet er meget lille, hvilket er fuldt forståeligt til prisen. Det ligger et rigtig fint fitness 3 minutter væk på cykel, som koster 50.000 dong pr. person. Derfor havde det ingen betydning for os. Vi elskede hotellet!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: La cama muy cómoda. La habitación es estupenda. El personal muy atento. El desayuno muy completo y variado. La piscina muy agradable y el gym genial.
review.comment_negative:
Quizás los precios de masaje en pareja algo elevados comparado con el precio de otros lugares de la zona. 
La moto que alquilamos era vieja y se recalentaba,  obligándonos a parar hasta que se enfriara. No obstante, lo comunicamos y nos dieron otra mejor.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive:
Super freundliches Personal
An der Rezeption wurde man ausführlichst über mögliche Aktivitäten beraten
Es war alles sehr sauber
Das Frühstück war traumhaft und man hatte eine riesen Auswahl
Tolle Poolanlage
review.comment_negative: Es hat tatsächlich nichts zum aussetzen gegeben

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: Super séjour! Super hôtel! Mention spéciale à l’équipe de l’hôtel qui est vraiment irréprochable!! + le petit déjeuner parfait + les équipements très bien. Nous recommandons cet hôtel à 200%

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: I’ve stayed in 5 different hotels in Viet, but this one was the best one so far. The staff were all so friendly and full of hospitality. Their breakfast was also the best so far too. Thanks!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The hotel was very clean and comfortable, and away from the busy-ness and noise of the old town, which was about a 10/15 minute walk away. Having the tour desk was very convenient, and the staff helped us book a car out to My Son and also a train up to Dong Hoi which was very smooth and easy, and all charged to the room and payable on checkout. We were also greeted with many recommendations for food and activities and information about the city which was really helpful. There were many vegetarian options on the restaurant menu for lunch and dinner. Beds were super comfortable.
review.comment_negative: The breakfast didn't have a great selection for vegetarians. The shower in our room was too short for my partner (he is average height) and he had to crouch down. After a shower, a lot of water would slowly spill onto the toilet floor and over the tiles, which were very slippery when wet, and I slipped and fell onto my knee one morning. This would happen even when fully using the shower curtain. There was also no ventilation in the bathroom. The staff were super friendly and helpful and gave lots of recommendations, but sometimes it was a little pushy.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Es ist ein wirklich tolles Hotel und sehr zu empfehlen. Personal so freundlich und zuvorkommend. Das Frühstück sehr lecker, die Zimmer sehr sauber und komfortabel. Alles war super!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Great staff, crystal clear pool, elegant rooms.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Very comfortable, great value for money and amazing staff!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Our stay was absolutely perfect! The room was super comfortable and clean. The facilities at this hotel are amazing great, we had our bags taken to our room, welcome information, the room price included breakfast which had a wide selection! We used their airport transfer service and booked a tour through them which they were super helpful with! We also used their laundry service which was convenient. 10/10 value for money and with such a friendly service!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người
review.comment_positive:
L’hôtel est bien situé. Les chambres sont spacieuses. Nous avons apprécié le petit déjeuner. Il y a beaucoup de choix. 
Des vélos sont prêtés pour aller découvrir la ville. 
nous recommandons cet hôtel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
L'emplacement  proche du centre-ville est au calme ce qui est vraiment un plus. 
Le personnel est très bien, au petit soin. Le petit déjeuner est extrêmement complet.
Un vrai bonheur.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Nice staff
Good breakfast
Nice pool area
Small gym with treadmill, bench, dumbells
15min walk/ 5min bike to the old town
45min walk/ 15min bike to the beach
review.comment_negative:
All good

We didn’t like Hoi An beach so much, they make you pay to park your bike and they don’t leave you in peace anywhere, but it has nothing to do with the hotel!

review.comment_positive: Servicen och personalen var exceptionell på alla sätt. . Frukosten vacker och bra. Rummen är fina. Vi hade bokat 3 nätter. Stannade ytterligare 3 nätter.

I think this must be free and there is no need to ask to write good comments so they can have a reward from the Hotel manager.  The rooms looks much nicer on the photos.. still nice rooms but not as nice as in the photos.   The Hotel is a bit far away from Hanoi old town... considering the weather which is very warm and humid not to mention the abrasive Sun, we end up “always” paying a taxi to go there. To walk 15 minutes is practically a nightmare.

review.comment_positive: We had a great stay at this hotel, staff was really helpful and friendly. Our room was really big and the beds were super comfy.

review.rating: Perfect stay, wonderful staff really loved our stay
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Everything! As soon as we got there a lovely gentleman at the door helped us with our heavy luggage and we were greeted by Ms Dzang who gave us a lovely introduction into Hoi An with a list of all the things we can do and where to go which is so helpful. Had a delicious welcome drink and were shown to our BEAUTIFUL room, couldn’t have asked for more! The breakfast was delicious, the food to offer (best garlic noodles ever!!!) and it’s in such a good location! Would love to stay again would recommend to all our friends☺️
review.comment_negative: Nothing! Only thing I didn’t like is we didn’t decide to stay longer! Could’ve spent ages here

review.comment_positive:
Khách sạn sạch đẹp.
Nhân viên đón tiếp rất nhiệt tình.
Rất ấn tượng với phòng trong tầm giá tiền.
Ăn sáng buffet cũng rất chu đáo và đầy đủ
Có cho mượn xe đạp nếu bạn có nhu cầu.
Thiết kế nội thất phòng hợp lý, toilet rất rộng là 1 điểm cộng. Giường ngủ rất thoải mái
Phòng có ban công nhưng vẫn rất yên tĩnh, khách sạn thiết kế 2 cửa.
Vị trí rất thuận lợi cho việc di chuyển
Tổng thể rất tốt cho khách sạn này.

propre discret personnel très accueillant
Etablissement avec  une tre bonne ambiance et personnel tres tres serviable

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We would highly recommend Golden Holiday Hotel. The hotel staff were a stand out as they were very helpful and responsive, and had great recommendations for a tailor and cooking class. They also organised our airport pick up and onward transport. The hotel is in a good location approx 1km walk or cycle from the hustle and bustle of the old town.

review.comment_positive: I don't think there is anything specific that I can say I liked. the entire experience was amazing!   The staff is so nice and cooperative. They asked us what can they do to make our experience better and were really open to suggestions!  definitely recommend it!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: For me, the Golden Holiday was totally luxurious. Clean, beautifully laid out and designed rooms, spotless pool and gym facilities. There is great effort taken to maintain a certain quality here — I extended my stay to really take in the tranquil atmosphere. Thanks so much

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Great hotel 10 minutes walk from the old town and a 20 minute cycle from the beach.

The hotel room itself was huge with 2 balconys, dressing room, shower and separate huge bath! Really comfy beds which was huge too. It really feels super luxury. The decor is nicely done.

They provided free bicycles to borrow to travel around or offer to call the eco electric taxi shuttle whenever needed.

Breakfast had a great selection and included western and Vietnamese options buffet style.

The reception desk are super knowledgeable about hoi an and all it has to offer. They arranged a transfer for us from Da Nang who met us off the train for approx £10 which was an hours drive.

Pool was great with really comfy cabana style beds which felt super luxury.

The standard a d value for money at this hotel is exceptional!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
We had a great time, one of the best hotels we have ever been! The staff is very kind and helpful, the breakfast was delicious and there is a big variety of foods. Besides that ther is a great pool area and a gym. 
We can recommend the hotel to 100%!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Best bed and shower we had in Vietnam. Excellent service. Nice location. Everything super smooth. Recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
La amabilidad del personal, la habitación era muy espaciosa y tenía balcón. 
El desayuno era muy completo.
Me di un masaje que fue de 10. Las bicicletas a nuestra disposición fueron geniales para recorrer la zona.
Muy recomendable!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Ausgerechneter, freundlicher Service von Anfang bis zum Ende. Höchste Professionalität und Engagement von allen Mitarbeitern. 
Die Unterkunft sieht sehr modern aus.
review.comment_negative: Das wir leider zu wenig Zeit hatten, wären gern länger geblieben.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Le service impeccable. La propreté des lieux. Les très bons petits déjeuners. L’amabilité du personnel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Het ontbijtbuffet is fantastisch, je kan lekker vers eieren laten bakken in elke stijl, pancakes of pho, er is veel keuze en variatie. De kamer is mega comfortabel en van alle gemakken voorzien. Het personeel is uitermate vriendelijk en wil je overal mee helpen. Het zwembad is precies goed en de grote handdoeken mag je ook meenemen naar het strand. Het hotel legt op 10 minuten lopen van het oude centrum en ongeveer 3km van het strand. Hiervoor kan je gewoon fietsen lenen van het hotel. Bij aankomst krijg je een welkomst drankje en wordt je bagage naar de kamer gebracht. Alles ademt comfort en luxe.

review.room_type: Suite 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: Jeder/e vom Personal war überaus freundlich und hilfsbereit.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Nice room, good price, good view with balcony, big swimming pool and friendly staff. 
The hotel is on the main street, therefore it is easy to go either towards the old town or heading to the beach. 
Free bicycle is available.
review.comment_negative:
Mirror opposite the bed which is unusual -> should be removed.
Too much noise from the other rooms and outsides.
Due to covid, there is no restaurant which is understandable.

review.rating: We enjoy the hotel and Hoi An Old town.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Lovely place to stay. We like the location, very convenient to explore the Ancient Hoi An town. The hotel has many bikes for us to use. They also have bikes with child seats which were very useful as we have two young children. The swimming pool is nice and quiet. The staff is very attentive and they keep checking up on us to make sure that we have a lovely stay. Thanks to the convenient location, I could cycle to the Night Market and go back to the hotel. Thuy, the  receptionist was very kind and nice. She offered us extra drinks when we checked out as one of our children loved their drinks (chanh sa) when we checked in.

review.rating: Really lovely hotel in central Hoi An. Highly recommended.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Central Hoi An. Push bikes available for free. Easy flat ride on a straight down to the beach or into the old town. Taxi into the old town was around £1ish (32 VND). Staff very helpful and friendly. Booked us a few tours and taxis. Rooms lovely and clean. Beds super comfy. Nice sized pool. Superb buffet breakfast and we ate lunch a few times at the hotel too which was reasonably priced and a good selection of food. The photos on booking.com don’t do the hotel justice. We stayed in a family room with a king and a single bed. Highly recommend this hotel if you’re staying in Hoi An.
review.comment_negative: Only a small suggestion for mosquito screens on the bathroom windows but no big deal. We didn’t have a massive issue with them. Would have just felt more comfortable leaving the windows open if they had the screens.

review.comment_positive:
Superbe hôtel avec prestations haut de gamme rapport qualité prix excellent ! La literie est excellente.  

Dzung et Kim vous accueillent avec une gentillesse incomparable.  Elles sont aux petits soins et vous rendrons tous les services dont vous avez besoin. Vous aurez tous les conseilles pour passé un superbe séjour à Hoi an.  Bravo à toute l équipe et un gros coup de cœur pour la massage au Spa.
Nous reviendrons.

review.comment_positive: Nautin kaikesta tässä hotellissa. Henkilökunta oli erittäin auttavaista ja kertoivat kaupungista sekä opastetuista kierroksista ym. kun saavuin hotellille. He myös järjestivät minulle kyydin minibussilla Hue kaupunkiin. Hotellin polkupyörät olivat ilmaiseksi käytettävissä. Aamupalalla oli riittävästi valikoimaa ja maistui hyvältä. Aamupalan jälkeen oli rentouttavaa käydä hieronnassa ja jatkaa siitä päivää. Huone oli siisti ja myös parveke löytyi
review.comment_negative: Polkypyörät olivat aika huonossa kunnossa, joten näihin toivoisin huoltoa.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Vom Ausstattung und vor allem das Service wunderbar und auch alles sehr sauber. Das Zimmer waren nicht sehr groß aber zu zweit Yoga ist dich ausgegangen - Balkon ist auch vorhanden. Wie in Vietnam ja fast üblich ist das Service im Hotel hervorzuheben. Wäsche um 50.000 VND/kg in 24h und auch das Spa haben für Massage und Pediküre genutzt - war auch wunderbar (1h 400.000 bis 500.000 VND). Das Frühstücksbuffet war immer unglaublich toll aufbereitet - an der Foodbar werden Pohsuppe und allerlei Eiergerichte frisch zubereitet. Zusammengefasst: 3 Tage wohlfühlen in einem tollen Hotel zu einem mehr als guten Preis für das tolle, qualitative Angebot

review.rating: The perfect hotel in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: This is possibly the best hotel I’ve ever stayed in. The friendly and welcoming staff were always willing to help with a smile. Moreover, they went out their way to ensure a great stay: when I told them it was my birthday, they surprised me with a birthday cake and sung for me. The breakfast tasted wonderful and included delicious vegetarian options. The excellent facilities and rooms were maintained clean everyday and had a good appearance. The pool area offered a peaceful and lovely place to relax. I strongly recommend this hotel. We even stayed one more night because we like it so much. If you are worried that the location might be too far away from the old town, don't be. With the free bikes provided from the hotel it just took us 5 minutes to reach the old town.

Dung, Kim, Sa, and Selena) were very helpful, cheerful, and flexible (since we extended 3 times but they still manage to help us to keep the same room to relax us from changing rooms all the time :p). Room service and food are nice, rooms are very clean and of a high standard. We are very happy with our stay, thanks for making our vacation so great. Highly recommended this hotel!

The room itself was clean, spacious, and the amenities provided in the room were satisfactory. The breakfast was great with a wide selection. The cooked vietnamese noodles every morning were amazing. It is also easy to get around with the hotel reception helping us to call for a taxi or electric car. Highly recommended.

review.comment_positive: Everyone who worked there seemed genuinely happy to help and they serve good breakfast. a buffet to choose from such as fresh omelettes and pancakes, fruits, warm meals and so many other options. Also we made use of their bicycles which was very convenient for use

review.rating: A Wonderful Hotel in Hoi Anh
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The front desk staff are attentive, knowledgeable and very helpful and friendly. They made our stay in Hoi Anh very easy and fun. They were also able to recommend some very good tours for us. They always asked us how everything was to make sure we were having a good time. Upon our check out they even offered us breakfast boxes for the next leg of our travels.

Buffet breakfast is excellent.

Housekeeping staff are so friendly and helpful.

The hotel has an art deco style. It was very cool. The rooms are very spacious.

The hotel offers complementary bicycles to its guests to take around old town. Highly recommend this. 

Overall we had a great time and felt very taken care of. I hope to come back again. Highly recommend the Golden Holiday.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: very nice hotel with amazing staff. the hotel is modern and clean, it seems like it is newly renovated. the staff were so helpful, from before I arrived organising transfers and a trip, we were a group of 10 so it was great to have help organising in advance. Easy to walk everywhere from the main road, but quiet at night. lovely pool, breakfast and free bicycles. thanks to Thuy, Dzung and Kim for amazing service. we wouldn’t hesitate to stay again or recommend to friends.

review.rating: Amazing Hoi An - Golden Holiday Hotel and Spa

review.comment_positive:
The hotel is well positioned between the beach and the old town. Very easy to get a taxi etc. The hotel also offers free bikes. Really nice pool area. Staff were very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was very good, with a nice variety.
Really enjoyed by stay here, would definitely recommend!

Overall the hotel was nice. There were a couple small things that bothered me. The usage of a bath as a shower is okay, but all the water from the shower was leaking all over the floor in the bathroom. Beciides this we slipped in the bath when we wanted to go out.
When we arrived we felt we like a number by the woman who welcomed us. She was helping 3 persons at once and tried to get us on a tourist trip, what which we didn't like. 
When we checked out the woman offert us money to leave a good review.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
The staff are all incredibly welcoming and helpful. 
They helped us organise tours, gave us free bicycles to take to Hoi An Old Town. 
I liked how clean the bedding and room was upon walking into the room on the first day and how they maintained the cleanliness daily. 

My friends and I were unaccustomed to the heat coming from a much colder climate. We asked them for an additional standing fan as we felt that the A/C wasn’t working properly and they were super accomodating and helped us locate one for our room.
review.comment_negative:
The A/C was placed behind the tv wall and therefore, it blocked a lot of the cool air that was being generated. 
If the A/C was installed on a different wall, then it may be better at keeping the room cool.

review.rating: Perfektes Lage, Leckeres Frühstück, bequeme Betten, sehr nettes Personal
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Einen sehr herzlichen Empfang durch Dung und Thung, war sehr persönlich, wie auch bei der Verabschiedung. wie haben uns gleich sehr wohl gefühlt.
sehr leckeres Frühstück, frische gemachte Pfannkuchen und Rührei oder Omelett. sehr leckere Baguette und sonst auch viel zur Auswahl, immer frisches Obst.
Zimmer sind groß, wir hatten einen Balkon mit zwei Stühlen und einem Tisch. sehr bequemes Bett, wie haben super geschlafen. 
kostenlose Fahrrad stehen zur Verfügung. Roller kann ab 190kd am Tag gemietet werden.
perfekte Lage, ca 15 min mit dem Fahrrad zum Strand. in die Altstadt sind es ca 15-20 min zu Fuß. ansonsten Grab für 30-60k Dong. 
Unbedingt die Umgebung erkunden.
Anfahrt zum Flughafen Da Nang Airport ca 45 min je nach Verkehr.
review.comment_negative: Gab nichts auszusetzen, wie waren so zufrieden, dass wir sogar verlängert haben.

review.comment_positive: staff was friendly and helpful. price is great and the rooms were very clean.

Suite 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Hồ bơi
review.comment_positive:
The comfortable beds, the beautiful trees, flowers and lanterns around the pool and the hotel, the good shower, the help and very quick efforts of the staff to accommodate our needs (particularly Mrs Kim who did all she could to make us happy).
Beautiful view from the 6th floor.
Loads of breakfast options, lovely staff and efficient service.
review.comment_negative:
The noise. The rooms are not soundproof, contrary to what is advertised. That was a big issue for us, as even though we were kindly moved to a quieter room on the highest floor, we could hear the children screaming in the hallways and the pool, as well as the noise from the street and from hardware store across the road where sheet metal was cut all day long.
The area is fairly noisy from the busy road.
Plenty of things were damaged (outlets, A/C, safe, taps, light bulbs and lamps, remotes etc.): the hotel needs to check the room equipments and do repairs were needed.

review.rating: Aangenaam verblijf en zeer vriendelijk personeel
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
De kamer en het zwembad. De kamer was ruim en had een gezellig balkon. Het zwembad is niet binnen, maar buiten dus dat is zeer positief. Er waren genoeg bedjes zodat je kan kiezen of je nu in de zon of niet in de zon wil liggen. Er was een zalig windje en het temperatuur van het water was ook perfect. 

Het personeel was ook zeer behulpzaam. Zij hebben voor ons de volgende activiteiten geregeld; Memories Hoi An show, bamboo bootjes (incl vervoer) en Ba Na Na hills in Da Nang (incl vervoer). De rekening konden we ook mooi opsplitsen hoe we dat wilden (deeltje cash, deeltje met de kaart).

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
The hotel inside is immaculate.  Breakfast is served next to the pool and a great selection and you can have food made to order which was nice. The room is spacious and had a really great bed, and I slept well every night with no noise at all. The room had a balcony that overlooked the pool. The hotel also provides bikes to get to the beach or Hoi An old town. The hotel's location is great as it's away from all the crowds but not too far and it is walkable.

The staff are always there to greet you with a smile and sorted out an issue with the phone very quickly.

review.comment_positive: TOLLES Hotel!!! Ich hatte für 3 Nächte gebucht, hab dann aber auf 5 verlängert. Was soll ich sagen. Tolles Personal, immer hilfsbereit für alles, jeder Wunsch wird erfüllt . Super schönes Interieur, sauber, sehr gutes Frühstück, tolle Massage. Einen besonderen Dank an Ms. Sue, die sich so toll um mich gekümmert hat. Einfach fantastisch

review.rating: Overall, clean AC Rooms, great staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
I recently stayed at Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel, a three-star establishment, and I'd like to share my experience. One of the key advantages of this hotel is its affordable price. If you're on a budget, it offers good value for money.

The rooms at the Hotel were surprisingly spacious and came with the convenience of air conditioning. The size of the rooms was certainly a pleasant surprise, providing ample space for relaxation and comfort during my stay.
review.comment_negative: However, one aspect that fell short was the breakfast options. Unfortunately, the breakfast selection was limited, offering only a modest variety of choices. While the quality of the available options was satisfactory, it would have been nice to have more variety and potentially some healthier alternatives. Nonetheless, considering the affordable price and the comfortable room sizes with air conditioning, the Hotel could still be a decent choice for budget-conscious travelers who don't mind a more basic breakfast offering.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Absolutely wonderful staff. Dung, Kim, Thuy, and Sa are the heart and soul of this place, and their smiles and level of service escalates this hotel's rating to a notch over the perfect 10. Extremely helpful for information, organising tours, and super professional.
The location is perfect if you're looking for a short 10 minute walk to the ancient city. The area is quiet and peaceful, with plenty of food and drink options nearby. They have free bicycles for guest use, so getting to the ancient city is even quicker, but I prefer walking so didn't use the bikes much.
I was upgraded to a room with a balcony, thank you! Good sized room, with perfectly functional and clean facilities and amenities. Great coffee in the room :) 
Stable, high speed wifi.
Good water pressure in the shower.
Comfortable bed.
Good AC.
Nice balcony overlooking the pool.

review.rating: Heaven of peace in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Location, cleanness, kindness of the personnel, quality and variety of the breakfast, value for money decoration.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Eine tolle Unterkunft, kann man gerne wieder hinreisen.
review.comment_negative: Beim Auschecken wurde etwas auf die beste Bewertung gedrängt, das find ich nicht gut!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
the hotel is in a good location. it is a short walk to the old town, but far enough out for it to be quiet and more relaxing.
the hotel has everything you need. the staff were so helpful to us. they helped to plan some of the activities. we felt very welcomed. 
the room was very comfortable, clean and nicely decorated.
review.comment_negative:
we liked everything really.
there could be more tea’s at breakfast but we are British and tend to carry our own anyway.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
This was our absolute favorite stay in Vietnam. Was a bit guilty taking a "down day" in this fabulous country, but had to enjoy the facilities a bit and cool off in the pool during an unusual heatwave.
Staff was genuinely friendly and attentive.
Breakfast was amazing with a fresh variety of both  Asian and western selection
Used their laundry facility -  had the load back in less than 15 hours.
Extended our stay by 1 additional night and they offered the same discounted price that I originally booked at. Nice gesture.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: O hotel disponibiliza bicicletas aos hóspedes, o que facilita a locomoção por toda cidade. O café da manhã é excelente, bem como o quarto, cama, travesseiros e banheiro. Os funcionários são extremamente simpáticos e prestativos.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Have s good trip

review.rating: I strongly suggest my friend to stay here during travel trip in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
- Very kindness staff and warm welcome.
- Location is not far from many attractive place which I can going there by walk.
- Many local restaurant around there.
- The room are clean and cozy.
- The swimming pools look so nice, However I missed it.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: La mejor opción in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Instalaciones, atención y servicio perfectos

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Great hotel, comfy room and bed, walking distance to old town. Breakfast was excellent, and staff were outstanding.
review.comment_negative: Bit close to loud karaoke, but nothing the hotel can do about that. Curtains need black out versions behind the gold colour. Our room faced East and it was a bit too early of a wake-up.

review.rating: Fantastic Hotel, we would definitely recommend
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Fantastic Hotel stay, excellent breakfast and staff very helpful
review.comment_negative: Unfortunately there was a undertaker across the road from the hotel where a national funeral was being held with the same music being played from 7am until the evening 🙁

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The staff is extremely helpfull and up-to-date. Very good!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: The service was excellent; from booking, to arrival, to our stay, and concluding with the check out. The included breakfast was wonderful and we really appreciated the welcoming staff and hospitality.  Thuy helped me arrange transportation from Da Nang to the hotel and was awesome throughout our stay.  Kudos to Thuy and the entire staff!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Hotel has everything you could ask for. The pool was great also! Highlight was definitely the staff. Everyone was very welcoming and accommodating. Staff at reception had all the info you could you ask for and was very helpful with directions and reccomendations.

review.rating: Alles war perfekt, wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Das Zimmer, der Poolbereich, der Service, das Frühstück.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn rất đẹp, phòng rộng, đẹp, thoải mái, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Nhân viên nhiệt tình. Rất đáng để đến ở, sẽ quay lại trong những dịp sau.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: Overall a very nice hotel. Nice staff and Breakfast. Comfortable room.
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Very well presented, Room was huge with a balcony. Nice selection for breakfast. Nice pool area to relax.
review.comment_negative: Quite a long walk into Hoi An, probably 20 minutes.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: Hotel was nice, friendly staff, good breakfast, pool, free bikes. A little out of centre but we enjoyed walking in.
review.comment_negative: Could have been better with local travel arrangements.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: sehr gut

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người
Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Beautiful hotel and amazing stay. 
Staff was very helpful and kind. 
Thank you Ms. Kim, Ms. Thuy,Ms.Suong and Ms.Dzung and Mr.Cuong and Mr. Phone,Mr.Duyen,Ms. And
All were very helpful,kind and pro active.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Great, super, extraordinary. Nice rooms, great breakfast, perfect service by Ms. Thuy and all the staff. All people working at the reception speak really good english.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Very good rooms, clean and big for two. Breakfast was extensive. Hotel staff was very friendly and recommended a lot activities or shops.
Hoi An was about 15 min walking, rental bikes available at the hotel. Beach was 15 min with bike from the hotel. Towels were available to take with you.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: pho挺好吃的

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Besides what you would normally expect from a 4star hotel, I really liked that:
- the place has universal plugs so no adapter needed
- the bathroom and the room are massive
- biggest bed I've ever slept in
- 10-15 minutes walk from main attractions and shops
- staff is friendly and made sure we knew the best spots in town
- excellent breakfast (but flag at check in if you are vegetarian)
- the welcome tea taste amazing
review.comment_negative: This place was great, a nice way to treat yourself if you are staying in Hoi An.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Dành Cho 4 Hoặc 5 Người
review.comment_positive: A beautiful time we enjoyed our stay nothing was trouble.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Dành Cho 4 Hoặc 5 Người
review.comment_positive: We loved the staff, They were so service minded and friendly. The breakd´fast was great. Very nice with the bikes that we could borrow. We went around on the bikes for a whole day. We had spa time as well. Very nice!

review.rating: Incredible staff, and great breakfast and facilities
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Everything was perfect - the staff are the nicest of any hotel we have stayed at throughout Vietnam and some of the kindest in the world. The breakfast is plentiful, the pool and gym are lovely and Hoi an is a beautiful place.

£1 grab ride into town or a 15min walk. Also & £1  grab to the beach. They even let you use the pool and gym and bikes on the day you've checked out, until you have to leave.

The room was a bit noisy from cars on the street (beeping horns is common in Hoi an) - when they asked for suggestions at check out, I mentioned this and they gave me a discount on the room. They really didn't need to do this as we had an incredible stay, but it was a sweet gesture and reflective of the staff kindness in general

Hotel price is absolutely incredible, I would recommend everyone stay here and I will definitely be back

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: La gentillesse du personnel, très souriant et à l’écoute. Madame Kim et Suzy nous ont conseillé pour les tours et les transports. Bonne literie, chambres très propres et confortables. Situation était idéal pour nous; le centre ville est bruyante mais l’hôtel se trouve à 10 minutes à pied et donc  reste calme. On y dort bien.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: First of all the staff were incredibly nice and helpful, from the moment we arrived until we got in a car to the airport. The room was above and beyond our expectations, very spacious and the bathroom was as big some of the rooms we have stayed in previously. The breakfast was great, the bed was super comfortable, what else can I say  10/10

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Alles perfekt. man kann fast jeden Service über das Hotel buchen. Personal sind super freundlich und hilfsbereit

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Vị trí cũng tạm được, không quá xa. Ban công phòng cũng bình thường, không có gì nổi bật.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Le personnel super et votre écoute 
Le resto super
Le petit-déjeuner au top
Les chambres spacieuses et confortables 
Vraiment le meilleur hôtel de mes séjours effectués auparavant.
Le spa super et la piscine impeccable 
Les tours organisés et la possibilité d'avoir les entrées de tour à l'hôtel est un vrai plus...

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Tout était parfait

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: For the very reasonable price you pay, you get an excellent value for money package of services. Ms Thuy the lady supervisory staff of the hotel is ever present to assist you with any help or enquiries. She made our stay a most happy one.
review.comment_negative: Minor stuff. We would be nitpicking.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: I have 2 night staying here everything very good the room and breakfast especially Ms Kim she recommended for us nice tailor is Tuong Tailor verry good thanks all

review.rating: Very pleasant, comfortable and, especially, friendly hotel between the beach and the Old Town. Be su

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Ms. Dzung, Ms. Kim en Ms. Thuy waren super gastvrij. Het hotel zelf zag er super goed uit en de kamer was heerlijk! Het bed lag heel lekker en het zwembad was top. Gelegen tussen de oude stad en het strand was ideaal, zeker gezien we de fietsen gratis mochten lenen.
review.comment_negative: Bij een lage bezetting, is er geen ontbijtbuffet, maar een menu. Dit was overigens wel super lekker!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The room was big and spacious and the crew.
review.comment_negative: Had terrible noise from outside. The Spa could improve as well.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Staff were extremely friendly and helpful, providing assistance with activities and tours. Breakfast was good with lots of options. Our room was very spacious. Location is good, just a short walk/cycle from the old town.
review.comment_negative: Noise/music from outside the hotel was loud at times, our room was vibrating at times. There was no light in shower. Gym is very basic.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
The room was very big and the bathroom even bigger. The room was equipped with all the necessary amenities and it was very comfortable.
The breakfast was amazing and had a very wide choice of food.
The staff was incredibly nice and friendly. Special thanks to Ms Dzung !

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The staffs here are kind and friendly so that we can get more information of hoi an and also vietnam.
review.comment_negative: The hairdryer is too old, and the style of room is too dark.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: Rất hài lòng khi có1 kỳ nghĩ ở đây
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tôi đặt phòng nghỉ 1ngay đây là lần đầu tôi ở khách sạn này .  phòng nghỉ ở đây quá đẹp trên cả tuyệt vời chuẩn 4 sao vừa rẻ vừa đẹp có vieu ban công nhìn ra đường buổi sáng trời mát ngồi uống tách trà trên cả tuyệt vời .nhưng vì mua dịch nên khách sạn o có phúc vụ ăn sáng .phòng đẹp rộng vieu đẹp sạch sẽ nhân viên phục vụ .  lễ tân rất là dễ thương nhiệt tình  biết làm cho khách hài lòng về phục phụ .khi tôi nhận phòng họ ốp phòng cho tôi .phòng rộng hơn lớn hơn nhưng o tính thêm phí nào cả .gia đình toi đi 9 người ai cũng hai lòng .tôi cảm ơn khách sạn Golden Holiday đã cho chúng tôi có chuyến nghĩ dưỡng đáng đồng tiền phòng chất lượng tiền phòng thì quá rẻ có dịp tôi sẽ đến đây ủng hộ .
review.comment_negative: Tất cả trên cả tuyệt vời .o có gì là o thích chuẩn 4sao

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố

review.rating: 가성비 최고의 호텔 그리고 너무너무 친절한 직원들
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Dành Cho 4 Hoặc 5 Người
review.comment_positive:
조식은 다소 종류가 아주 많지는 않지만, 그래도 먹을 것들은 충분하고 과일도, Egg station, Noodle station도 항상 친절하게 제공해주셨어요. 위치도 올드타운에서 아주 멀지 않고, 걸어서도 가능은 합니다. 저희는 거의 택시를 탔지만 ;)
주변에 현지인들이 살고 있는 동네라서 베트남인들의 삶도 가볍게 볼 수 있고 수영장도 아이들과 가볍게 놀기 좋아요.
가성비로는 최고의 호텔이지 않나 생각해요. 또, 호텔의 부대시설의 가격이 모두 저렴하고 아주 좋아요.
review.comment_negative: 딱히 없습니다. 전반적으로 아주 맘에 들었어요.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Nice large room, very clean and comfy. Nice pool area to relax with poolside service.
Not too far to walk in to the old town and also close to the beach by taxi 10 mins or we walked 35 mins. Could use bikes provided by hotel but we chose to walk.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công

review.rating: Quiet & Clean hotel with great staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The hotel was very clean, and our rooms were made up everyday. The staff was very lovely and gave us lots of recommendations and day tours such as a good tailor, restaurants and cooking class. The hotel is an about 10 minutes walk from old town which makes it a little quieter and nice to sleep and with the free bikes it is very easy to get around.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: Lovely little stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The staff were friendly and welcoming.
The Room was spacious with a comfortable bed.
The fresh fruit on buffet at breakfast is delicious with yoghurt. 
The location very convenient and it's quite possible to walk to old town as we did every day. Walking is not for everyone,  but there are plenty of other transport options such as grab or taxis if you don't like walking.
The pool looked nice and though the gym is small it has enough for a quick strength workout.
review.comment_negative:
The shower in the bathroom is very low if you are tall.
Breakfast buffet has plenty of options, but it's not exactly my cup of tea. Brocolli,  though not on my first choice for breakfast, was overcooked. Pancakes under cooked so if you like to try, ask them to cook it more.

Dinner on our fist night was nice enough, but perhaps stick to vietnamese food. Salad was nice, pizza okay but not great. Service, however, was great. Can't fault the staff at all.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Eigentlich alles.
review.comment_negative: Der Verkehr war auf unserer Seite des Hotels früh zu hören. Nicht extrem laut, aber konstant da. Viel Gehupe in Vietnam. Meine Freundin hat es nicht gestört.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The hotel was very clean, comfortable with friendly staff. The pool area is very nice with a selection of sun loungers and sun beds. The breakfast has a good selection of both Asian and Western food. The hotel is located a 10 minute walk from the main tourist areas in Hoi An in a quieter area. The hotel also offers information on tours and best places to get clothes made and tailored. We would be very happy to book another stay here.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Najlepsza, najmilsza i najbardziej pomocna obsługa,  dziękujemy❤️
Pyszne urozmaicone śniadania, codziennie coś innego.
Darmowe rowery do dyspozycjo gości.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên cũng được, không quá nhiệt tình nhưng làm đủ việc. Phòng có ban công, tạm chấp nhận được.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_negative: The gym equipment could do with being updated

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người
review.comment_positive: Very convenient to be here. Calling a taxi or shuttle bus is very easy. The important thing is that I can use the hotel's bicycle for free. Thank to Ms. Dung, Kim, Thuy for supporting our trip.
review.comment_negative: The elevator is small, difficult to move when traveling in groups

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
We loved the location of this hotel; a walk to the start of the old town so very convenient without the crowding.
Free bikes got you anywhere with ease as well.
The staff were delightful and the cleaning was comprehensive. Everything sparkled and our room and balcony were mopped daily.
The breakfast choice is excellent and the desk staff are really helpful with recommendations and arranging tours. 
The facial at the spa was a wonderful experience and couldn’t have been better.
When we arrived we had a week’s worth of washing. We dropped it on our way to breakfast, went out after breakfast and returned to our cleaned room and folded washing returned to us - this is the best $12AUD I have ever spent!

review.rating: Gorgeous hotel with exceptional customer service
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Best hotel we've stayed in. It was my partner's birthday and I had messaged ahead asking to have a bottle of bubbles put in our room when we arrived. The staff went above and beyond to decorate the room with balloons and banners and even provided a cake and candle, it was such a lovely gesture. Throughout our stay the staff were all incredibly helpful and attentive, particularly Ms.Sue and her team at reception - lots of recommendations for where to eat, tailors and places to visit. Lovely pool with large towels provided. The gym is small but fine for a basic workout. Free bike rental is a bonus as Hoi An is very cycle-able.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The staff, especially Ms Dzung, was very helpful and accommodating; they made my stay there very welcoming.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Positive:
- Room had everything what you need and with a well set up
- staff was overall friendly
- Breakfast had a nice wide variation
- restaurant was ok with a medium large menue list
- price of 33 US$ for one night include breakfast is affordable
- location good

Additional comments:
- Positive: The receptionist took my objective complaints very well and told me she will inform the management.
- The hotel is older and from behind outside it looks not very well maintenanced. In the bathroom there is an issue with lime on the tiles from the water
- I still would give 4.5 star rating so there is no 4.5 star I round up to 5 star.
review.comment_negative:
Recomondation to the management:
- The check in process must be faster and easier. Don't let the customer work and let him fill a form online to scan a QR code. Customer doesn't want work during his vacation.
- Don't let the receptionist read a full document in front of the customer with the hotel activities and opening times which he will forget after 5 minutes. Put the document into his room on the desk. At least the receptionist must give the joyce to the customer to listen or to read this document by himself.
- After measuring the room size including the bath room the size was around 25m2. On Bookin.com you post 30m2. You must change this mistake because of some customers already complaint about it.

review.rating: We had a winderful time at this lovely boutique hotel with fantastic service.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The staff were amazing & really looked after us. We could not fault the service.
Rooms were lovely and very clean.
We loved the pool area after days out sight-seeing. 
We ended up at staying an extra night & we would definitely stay here again.

review.rating: Great place around the corner of the old town with very nice staff and very clean and comfortable rooms and pool area.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: The staff was exceptionally nice and the breakfast was perfect. The rooms were clean and the pool area is very comfortable to relax, the gym is right next to it which is nice if you want to use it.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Perfect in every way! Clean room, comfortable bed. The room was in excellent order with many facilities.

review.rating: Great overall, with minor inconveniences, but felt pressured to write a good review
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The room was very spacious, the bed was incredibly big and the hotel had a nice pool and gym! Their spa is also great, we had massage and nails done and it was amazing and at a very good price. Breakfast was also great, with egg station, noodle station and many fruits, breads and everything you need. They also received us really well when we arrived, giving us a surprise for our anniversary!
review.comment_negative:
In our room, the shower was structured in a way that the water was always splashing in the whole bathroom, so it was always very wet, which was a bit uncomfortable.
Also, the location was 15 min walk from the city center, which is close but there are some closer options. Besides, it was very noisy in our room, so we would wake up many times throughout the night because of the motorbikes and other things happening outside.
On the checkout, a lady at the reception was also very inconveniently asking what grade I would give on booking, giving me a paper to write down the grade I would give, and asking me to open booking to make the review in front of her. I was very uncomfortable with this situation, and I think this is a really bad and unprofessional posture.

review.rating: Best stay at Hoi An. Definitely coming back here again.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The stay at this place was outstanding. Sue was a nice host, she made sure she gave us the full information before checking in so we are aware of the hotel as well as she gave us the day trip plans that we could plan. She was very welcoming. The breakfast provided here was yummy and delicious. The pool was taken care well. The rooms were kept clean without us informing them everyday. They provide us the free bicycle to round the city. And informed about the weather conditions to the place we were going to, so we could wear the clothes accordingly. I’d definitely recommend to stay at the property which will make it so memorable.

review.rating: Hyggelig og behagelig opphold på Golden Holiday!👍🏽
review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Hotellet ligger i et stille området som var behagelig. Reine rom, komfortable senger. Personalet er utrolig hyggelige og behjelpelige! Grei frokost.
review.comment_negative: Litt langt i fra sentrum. Bassengområdet mistet solen i 12 tiden i disse dager. Treningsrommet var veldig varmt å trene på og aircon virket ikke optimalt, kanskje et gammelt apparat? Croissant på frokostbuffét smakte papp.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: The hotel is smart, very clean, has great breakfasts and nice pool, plus the staff were exceptionally helpful with organising trips and taxis all at good rates too.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

would recommend 110%

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Staff was so nice, location is good, room was good, pool was good.... Everything!
I'm Japanese and cleaness is very important for me, which was so clean I could stay very comfortable.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel with lovely staff. We loved our stay

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: We had a very pleasant stay, thank you! The room was exceptionally clean and nicely furnished. The staff was friendly and the breakfast had a large and delicious selection. We liked it very much and would definitely recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Rooms were a lovely size and the staff were fantastic. The pool is great too. Wonderful location

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Belle endroit et à 15min du centre à pied!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Excellent value
review.comment_negative: The only downside was that the staff was pushy about checking that reviews would be good.

review.rating: Value for the money, great service with large rooms!
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
I don't like giving a full score because I believe there is always room for improvement. The hotel is located in a small town and is great value for the price. 
Service - 10++
When it comes to service for the staff, I would give them an even higher score if possible. The staff was helpful and pleasing. They did their best to accommodate us and guided us through the town. Even in a 5 star hotel you wouldn't be able to have lunch at noon and receive after hour spa treatment (the staff even offered us free treatments for our long stay!). The staff even got us fruit after midnight when all the restaurants in town were closed. Laundry at the hotel is cheap and affordable. The hotel had bikes and motorbikes to rent which makes their location also a 10++.  Rooms were large and spacious and our room came with a large bathtub. 10
review.comment_negative:
There are a lot of improvements that can be made to the hotel. The place is a little older than the picture shows and its so large that it get dusty easily. The place and cleaning staff can be much better as some stuff wasn't cleaned properly. For example, when we arrived at the hotel the trash can in our room still had garbage left from the pervious guest such as toothbrush, bottles and other stuff. The towels were white and one towel had a noticeable stain. Lastly, our bed post had a noticeable layer of dust.
Cleanliness - 7 :(

If you don't plan on biking or using the motorbike, it might be a little difficult for you to get around town. Most of the action happen near the old town and that area is about 1.7km away and can be a difficult walk especially in the heat. 
Walkability - 6-7 ( totally doable, but don't recommend) 
The hotel staff was always eager and friendly about calling a taxis for us, making the trip easier.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Ở Tầng Hầm
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên làm việc theo đúng quy trình. Hồ bơi không lớn lắm.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Service war perfekt. Das Zimmer sehr groß, schön und sauber. Mitarbeiterinnen sehr zuvorkommend. Der Fahrradverleih ist gratis was wir viel genutzt haben. 
Frühstücksbuffet vielfältig und super. 
Auch das spa Angebot war toll. Alles in allem das beste Hotel, dass wir auf unserer Vietnam Reise hatten.
review.comment_negative: Wir können uns über nichts beklagen. Alles war super.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ

Buena situación, buena habitación, y muy buen desayuno buffet.
Gran amabilidad del personal de recepción en especial Ms. Thuy, atenta a cualquier problema que pueda surgir y siempre lo soluciona.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: Very helpful staff. Excellent breakfast and lots to choose from. Very clean and welcoming. Staff go above and beyond. Made great use of the free bikes and plentiful!

review.rating: Lovely hotel in beautiful Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: breakfast, helpful staff,  free bike hire.

review.rating: Tolles Hotel mit super Frühstücksbuffet. Top top top!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Schönes Hotel mit sehr freundlichem Service, Wahnsinns-Frühstücksbuffet, bestes in drei Wochen Vietnam. Pool haben wir erst am Abreisetag entdeckt, Fahrräder gibt's kostenlos zu Leihen. Top Empfehlung!!!!
review.comment_negative: Gibt's nichts außer dass beim ersten Empfang im Hotel für unser Gefühl zu sehr Werbung für einen bestimmten Tailor-Shop gemacht wurde. Finde ich nun nicht so toll, außer ich frage danach.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
This was one of the best hotels we stayed in in Vietnam. The place is really nice, the room was spacious and the bathroom huge. They have a really nice swimming pool with lounge chairs and beds, great place to chill after a day in the heat.
Breakfast was excellent and diferente every day.
The hotel is near the old town and they have bicycles for guests for free. We used them to go through the rise fields to the beach.
Staff was extremely friendly and helpful.
If we will go to Hoi An again we would definitely stay here.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
It’s a bit of walk into the centre of the action, but that’s not a bad thing.
Rooms were comfortable and the staff very helpful.
Breakfast was a bit disappointing but they seemed to be still affected with covid restrictions. The bar selection was also a bit limited.

review.rating: Relaxing weekend getaway in a romantic hotel in perhaps the most romantic city in Vietnam!
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: I liked the room space, the super friendly staff, and the vacation feeling the hotel gives.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Muy buena ubicación, a 10-15 minutos andando de la zona antigua de Hoi An, pero zona tranquila para poder descansar de noche.
El hotel deja bicicletas sin coste alguno! Vienen genial para poder conocer los arrozales, las playas...toda la zona es muy llana, perfecta para usar las bicis.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: El hotel es excelente, la acogida y el servicio que recibimos de parte de Dzung fue muy correcto y quedamos muy satisfechos. Igualmente el desayuno muy interesante con platos locales.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Excellent service and friendly and helpful staff.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Zeer vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel. Toplocatie, rustig en toch bij het centrum. Beste ontbijtbuffet tot nu toe in Vietnam. Gewoon super. Ten zeerste aan te raden.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Zeer leuk hotel. Prijs kwaliteit top. Lekker ontbijt. Gratis fietsen. Sfeervolle kamers

review.rating: Good hotel 1km outside of old town
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Very clean, good breakfast, helpful staff
review.comment_negative:
Two things I did not like about the property. The fact that we were not showed that we could order cooked food at breakfast while other guests were made aware about this. We only realised this on the last day. 

Second, the staff was great until the check out when they basically tried to guilt trap us with “we would like a 10 as we would like to get bonus and also go on holiday with family”. Hence the reason of why I’m giving 9. Otherwise would have been a 10.

review.rating: Loved it here, sad to leave.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing, bed is so comfortable. room very spacious, and pool and gym area are great.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast isn’t amazing, but does the job.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: My room was clean, very comfortable, and the staff was amazing (especially Ms. Thuy). They went above and beyond to help make my stay enjoyable. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Hoi An!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Half way between old town and an bang beach . Bed super comfortable and breakfast was amazing

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Très bel hôtel avec un accueil particulièrement soigné et agréable. 
Personnel aux petits soins, toujours souriant. 
Souhait d'avoir une chambre sur cour (vue sur piscine) respecté. 
Petit déjeuner varié et de qualité. 
Des soins de massage sur place très agréables. 
Bref, un excellent séjour !
review.comment_negative:
Un petit peu trop de bruit car des travaux devant l'hôtel et autour de la piscine. Mais ceci n'était que passager. 
Le personnel s'en est excusé et nous avons apprécié leur geste.

review.rating: Highly recommend for your stay in Hoi An !!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: Great service and amazing location. Only 20 mins walk into the main area or a 20 mins bike ride to the beach. Free bike rentals, buffet brekkie and clean rooms were all amazing !!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Really nice rooms and excellent service. They make it a point to make sure you enjoy your stay here.✨

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: Es waren wunderbare 3 Nächte, immer gern wieder.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Die Lage des Hotels sowie die Ausstattung waren super. Besonders hat uns das sehr gut ausgestattete Frühstück und das freundliche Personal gefallen. Es waren wirklich alle sehr aufgeschlossen, nett und hilfsbereit. Großes Lob an die Rezeption, Küchenteam und Putzkräfte.

Die Dame an der Rezeption hat uns viele Tipps zu Sehenswürdigkeiten und Schneidereien gegeben. 

Preis-Leistung war in diesem Hotel spitze. Für das Geld - unschlagbar.
review.comment_negative: Das Hotel trägt dafür keine Schuld, aber die Laute Musik in Umkreis des Hotels hat Nachmittag bis zum Abend sehr gestört, gerade dann, wenn man sich am Pool ausruhen wollte. Wir waren vielleicht zu einem ungünstigen Zeitpunkt dort. 2 Hochzeiten hintereinander an 2 Tagen. Aber spätestens um 22 Uhr war Ruhe, so konnte man sich Nachts gut ausruhen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố

review.rating: Cosy, Comfy and Value for money
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The property is very well organised , the staff is extremely polite and well behaved 
The staff is excellent and it is good value for money
The breakfast buffet and the spa is really nice 
There’s a cute little pool and a bar
review.comment_negative: The place is 1.4 kms from the ancient town , so you should be prepared to walk a bit or wait for erratic cabs

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Dzung the receptionist was absolutely brillant, she was so informative and helped us find the best travel trips. Her knowledge really helped us get to grips with all the best spots around Hoi An.
Cong the doorman/security was very pleasant and helpful, he ensured we did not have to lift a finger with regards to our baggage and the doors. 
Kam & Kieu and Sa were so lovely and helped us with everything and anything that we needed including taxis, drinks and much more. They booked and sorted our private taxi to Hue. 
The location was superb, very central to everything.
review.comment_negative: I can’t think of anything that I didn’t like about the property.

review.rating: Very happy in general, highly recommend
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The staff, breakfast selection and the pool area
review.comment_negative: The cleaners knocking on the door at half past 8 in a morning asking to clean the room. The cleaners should also change the bedding if you are staying longer than 3 nights, I think they just made the bed everyday, and we stayed 7 nights

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Suite 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: Good hotel, comfortable beds. 10min walk to the old city and could easily bike to the beach.
review.comment_negative: On check out I felt quite pushed around what rating I was to give the hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Ms Sue was so helpful. Every morning greeted guests at breakfast. Exceptional service

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The service was amazing, especially from Kim!. Very worth it for the price. We loved everything, can't think of anything bad.

review.rating: Overall we were happy with our stay here and would recommend it for other travelers visiting hoi an.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The staff was welcoming and friendly. The location of the hotel is good and the breakfast was delicious with many made to order options.
review.comment_negative: On one evening there was noise from a karaoke party which was nearby. It only lasted a couple of hours but I can imagine that the noise can be an annoyance for visitors.

review.rating: Ein sehr angenehmer Aufenthalt in einem schönen Hotel, das einem alle Wünsche erfüllt!
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel hat uns mit seinem außergewöhnlich bemühten Personal beeindruckt. Über das Hotel buchten wir sowohl Cooking Class, Massage, Laundry Service und schließlich einen Shuttle zurück nach Da Nang. Dies war preislich alles in Ordnung und top organisiert, auch unser Gepäck konnten wir am Abreisetag noch bis spät am Abend im Hotel lassen. Uns wurde sogar angeboten, am Abreisetag die Poolanlage etc. zu nutzen. 
Wir wurden auf ein Zimmer mit Poolblick upgegradet, das lediglich den Nachteil hatte, dass gegenüber ein Restaurant mit 24/7 lauter Musik war. Insgesamt war das Zimmer aber sehr schön und groß mit einem großen Badezimmer mit Badewanne. Auch das Frühstück erfüllt alle Wünsche. 
Das Hotel verleiht gratis Fahrräder, mit denen man den etwa 3 km entfernten An Bang Beach besuchen kann. Es liegt nicht direkt in der Altstadt, allerdings ist diese zu Fuß bequem zu erreichen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố

Breakfast had so much variety and you can even order additional pancakes or eggs.

review.comment_negative:
shower water would splash all over the floor (could be hazardous due to wet and slippery floors). 
no bar, only beer. 
no milk alternatives.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.comment_negative: Pool closed a little early, at 9pm. But that is how most of the places operate as well

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Wonderful stay in this hotel, loved it here! The staff were amazing - so friendly and helpful! They helped us to book our tours and recommended restaurants. Room was spacious and very clean. Comfortable beds. Nice pool with beds in shade or sun. Delicious breakfast with fresh egg station to cook on request. Lovely spa facilities. 15 minute walk to the busiest part of town, so perfect if you want to be a little away from the town. Bikes were available from the hotel to cycle in in five minutes. Would highly recommend anyone to stay here when visiting Hoi An!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Das Zimmer war sehr grosszügig und sauber. Das Personal war sehr freundlich. Das Frühstück war super. Man konnte im Hotel gratis Fahrräder ausleihen und damit die Umgebung erkunden.
