review.rating: Très bel hôtel à Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tout ! La gentillesse du personnel, la chambre spacieuse, l’emplacement (prêt de vélo pour aller dans le centre ville en 5 minutes ou 15 minutes à pied), bon petit déjeuner, massage agréable. Nous recommandons fortement !

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: everything was perfect

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: Fantastic staff who helped with my onward connection. Always willing to help and very friendly
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Very helpful and friendly staff, good breakfast and free use of bikes during stay.very comfortable bed

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: Booked for 3 nights extended for 5 more. Everything was lovely about this small hotel. The rooms are nicely decorated and the beds are so comfortable. The pool is clean with lots of loungers. A relaxing place to hang out morning till late. The staff is amazing. They greet you by name and handle every request with a smile. I especially loved Ms Sue and Ms Dzeng at the front desk! The hotel is so customer service based that they even contacted me personally prior to check in to see if i had any special requests. Definitely stay, you won’t be disappointed
review.comment_negative: Can’t think of a thing. Any minor issue that came up was handled promptly

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: From the moment we checked in we felt appreciated and warmly welcomed. The staff were so sweet and helpful, they gave us lots of tips on what to do/see, which tailors to use etc. Our room was very comfortable and spacious, such good value! We enjoyed the pool and gym, and absolutely love the fact that they lend out free bicycles! Best way to get around Hoi An! Breakfast was very good and varied. They had something for everyone. I especially enjoyed starting the day with noodle soup! I might swap my usual Scandinavian breakfast for this when I return home. Hotel is close to the town, about 5 min bicycle ride, and not too far from the beach. The ride out to the beach is beautiful too, you go through a rice field where you can see water buffalows and cows :) If you decide to go to the beach borrowing beach towels is no problem. We had an early morning departure, so they  packed breakfast to go for us. We loved every minute of our stay! Would definitely stay there again if we go back. Thank you so much! <3

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên rất tuyệt vời, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, free xe đạp đi khắp phố cổ, rất gần phố cổ. Mình nhận được sự phục vụ rất tận tâm của chị Thuỷ, chị Dung, anh Kim, anh Lâm.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Das Hotel ist sehr komfortabel und modern ausgestattet. Wir haben uns total wohl gefühlt. Das Personal war unglaublich freundlich und hilfsbereit. Sie haben uns proaktiv Tips für Hoi An gegeben und standen bei Fragen immer zur Verfügung. Hervorzuheben ist auch das Frühstück: sehr gute Auswahl aus vietnamesischen als auch europäischem Essen. Die Lage ist etwas außerhalb der Altstadt. Diese ist aber innerhalb von 15 Gehminuten zu erreichen. Wir haben uns schwer getan sowohl Hoi An als auch das Hotel zu verlassen und würden es uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người

review.rating: A charming hotel in Hoi an

review.rating: Amazing hotel with great staff and pool. Perfect location for visiting and going to the beach

review.comment_positive: Great facilities. Very nice room with balcony. Great staff. Great breakfast. Great pool. Location is great if you want to visit Hoi An and sometimes go to the beach. The hotel lends bikes for free
review.comment_negative: Nothing. Location is however not in downtown Hoi An (approx. 15-minute walk or 5 minutes by bike). The hotel lends bikes for free though

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

The staff were outstanding; co-operative, forthcoming and always willing to help. I would recommend the hotel to anyone going to Hoi An

review.comment_positive: We were upgraded to a suite at the time of booking itself. The rooms were nice and big. The staff were exceptional. We loved this hotel, it was very homely.
review.comment_negative: I think, the walls can be painted to a brighter colour. The toilets look a bit dull because of the colour of the walls.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: friendly staff & helpful and  comfortable stay
review.comment_negative: a bit noisy because of the traffic junction but it’s Vietnam !! part of the motorbikes culture:)

review.rating: A very pleasant and relaxing stay in a superb boutique hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: This was one of the very best hotels I have ever stayed in. Everything was clean and worked properly, the beds and pillows were comfy. Of particular note the staff were universally friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet was great too, not as much choice as a a big 5 star hotel of course, but the food was well presented and kept warm and fresh. It was about 15 or 20 minutes walk to the old town or a dollar or so in a taxi. The hotel is in a quiet, leafy area.
review.comment_negative: We didn't use the pool, spa treatments or travel services so can't comment on those.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: This hotel was 5 minutes away by bicycle to the old town and attractions. The hotel provides bicycle which is appreciated. The room was big enough though the washroom seemed quite narrow and inconvenient to use. The breakfast was good and outdoor breakfast space was beautiful. I was surprised to know they charge additional 3% when you pay by credit card but mentioning that, they considered me not to pay that 3% to the bill.
review.comment_negative: The first impression about this hotel I had is it is over rated!!! As for me, I booked this hotel seeing their rating. I stayed in many hotels in Vietnam where I got more cordial treatment from the staffs compared to here. They were more lenient to the American/ European or Australian guests rather than a  southeast Asian traveller like me. This is not acceptable cause we all are the guests here and paying no less than the other parts of the world. A better and equal treatment and service is expected honestly. Then I found out that they insisted on giving the best review and score which is too intrusive and uncomfortable.. That should not be the case as it is the travellers freedom to express exactly the way they felt rather than being imposed by them.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Sehr freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal.
Sehr sauberes Zimmer. Leckeres und vielfältiges Frühstücksbuffet mit frischem Obst, Eierspeisen, Müsli, Brot und vietnamesischen Speisen.

review.rating: Thank you to Ms Thuy and Ms Kim for taking such great care of me!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The room was gorgeous, very spacious and great value for money. The hotel itself is in a great location, just a 20 minute walk or quick cycle away from the hustle and bustle of the old town. It has a lovely pool and the breakfast was great, not to mention the staff are the loveliest and really care about you. Thank you to Ms Thuy and Ms Kim especially.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel with lovely and helpful staff. In the price of the room, bikes were included which turned out to be the best way to get around. There is also a small grocery store nearby.

review.rating: Excellent service with great value for money and convenience.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
We chose this hotel because of its location between the beach and old town. The hotel is really nice and comfortable. The decor is great and the rooms are comfortable.
The breakfast was delicious and very reasonable. They even offered us additional food at no extra cost because of the light option we chose. They also gave us complimentary fruit.
The service is impeccable. All staff are so friendly and helpful and made us feel so welcome and taken care of. Staff were always willing to assist wherever possible. 
The staff at the front desk also organized a good priced car to take us to Da Nang when our driver was a no-show.
They also upgraded or room, free of charge at check-in. Really appreciated!
We would like to thank the various staff that we had interactions with: Ms. Lieu, Ms. Anh, Ms. Kim, Ms. SA, Ms. Thuy, Mr. Duyen and Ms. Tam.
Thank you so much! We will return...

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: all great and staff adorable ❤️

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Die Mitarbeiter sind sehr hilfsbereit und zuvorkommend. Zimmer und Hotel Bereich sind sauber und einladend. Die Lage perfekt ruhig und genau in der Mitte zwischen Strand und Altstadt. Keine Kompromisse notwendig.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: They helped me a lot. They organise transfer from the airport, to My Son. The breakfast is wonderful. They give free bikes it makes very easy to explore the very nice old city.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Staff estremamente gentile, ci hanno trattato davvero benissimo. Colazione tra le migliori fatte in Vietnam. Posizione dell'hotel perfetta sia per centro città che per la spiaggia. Servizio biciclette gratuito. Abbiamo fatto due massaggi alla spa ed è stato molto rilassante.
review.comment_negative: La struttura è un po' datata e andrebbe rimodernata.

review.rating: A very friendly stay that is tremendous value for money!
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: We booked this one night before arriving and the staff were super quick at organising an airport pick up for us. Upon arrival they were very helpful with highlighting key places of interest in the area and making us feel very welcome. The location is a little out of the centre, but with the free bikes, it was an enjoyable 5 minute bike ride. The gym was adequate for a hotel gym and the pool was nice. The room was very large, with a nice balcony and the included breakfast was decent. Taking into consideration the cost, however, everything was actually outstanding. Great value for money.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Beautiful property. The staff were all kind and welcoming. Breakfast was great and rooms are very luxurious.

- Lage: gut zehn Minuten vom historischen Zentrum entfernt
review.comment_negative: - Strassenlärm ab ca 6.30h (Zimmer hintenraus dürften wohl besser sein)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:

The staff are amazing, the breakfast was great with different a la carte options each morning, the facilities are great, room is great, and location is fantastic too, just a short ride to the old city!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công

- nice big, comfy rooms, daily cleaning

review.comment_negative:
- nothing to complain, but if I had a wish they could invest more into the Gym.
- booking tours, motorbike and taxi/transportation was quite pricey, but that’s normal. Book somewhere else or pay for the comfort.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên phục vụ rất tận tình. Phòng đẹp. Mình đến đây rất nhiều lần nhưng không bao giờ thất vọng về nơi đây.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Firstly the staff, from check in to check out they were amazing. This was the best service we ever received in many years of travelling. Before check in we were contacted to see if we needed anything and they arranged for us to be picked up from the airport which was better than trying to arrange a taxi on arrival. we were given a welcome drink and some information on check in and we booked the basket boat tour which was great. the pool area is really nice, there are free bikes to use which are great for exploring Hoi an old town. The breakfast was also spectacular and we were given a takeaway breakfast on check out as we had to check out early. all in all a wonderful experience.

review.comment_positive: From the moment we entered Golden Holiday, we knew it was special. Rarely does a hotel sit down and explain everything you need to know before your stay, but that's exactly what Ms Dzung did. And we'll always remember the delicious lemony drink they greeted us with upon arrival, and various other times. Ms Kim, Sa, Salena and Thuy were gracious hosts, helping make sure every detail was perfect. Together with Ms Dzung they personalized the experience for us. The room was beautifully appointed with many of the comforts of home. Thank you so much for your hospitality!

review.comment_positive: Miss Kim and Win was fantastic. The friendliest and most kind receptionists. Our stay was lovely, food and breakfast was fantastic. But the best part was the receptionists, after a blunder on our end, miss Win organised and sorted the mistake and made a trip to mi son incredibly less stressful than we had managed it. Miss Kim was incredibly welcoming, warm and a fantastic help, also loved chatting with both of them. If you are coming to Hoi An, please consider Golden holiday. One for the books.

review.rating: Cozy and relaxing stay in Hoi An!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
First of all, we definitely love Hoi An and we would recommend to spend at least 3 nights (2 full days) in this city!
The hotel has a great location, a few steps from the city center. Room was spacious and clean, we also took advantage of a convenient laundry service. 
Breakfast buffet offered many nice choices and there was the possibility to order freshly made scrambled eggs and pancakes. The staff at the reception have been helpful and kind.
Free bikes available, even if we preferred to walk we think that Hoi An is also suitable for bikes compared to other crowded cities in the country.
Definitely recommended and high value for money!
review.comment_negative:
It’s not really a drawback, but the swimming pool is external and we couldn’t use it because it was heavily raining :(
Gym could be improved, but there is a nice treadmill and weights and I definitely enjoyed a run before breakfast.

review.comment_positive: The customer service was excellent. Ms Dung made us feel very welcome giving us all the information we needed for our stay and recommendations on what to do in Hoi An.  Miss Kim and Mr Duyen also were very kind and helpful. They generously offered us a free upgrade on our room as well. The location is great. 10mins outside of the old town. Rooms are lovely and well maintained and cleaned daily. Super comfy beds

review.rating: Perfekt! Mit Abstand beste Unterkunft während unserer Reise, jederzeit immer wieder gerne!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Kurz vorab: Mit Abstand bestes Hotel während unserer Südostasienreise! 
Es hat wirklich alles gepasst (und das bewertet mit hohen Standards): 
- super freundliches und hilfsbereites aber überhaupt nicht aufdringliches Personal (vielen Dank an Ms. Thao und Ms. Thuy für die super Tips)
- tolle, moderne, liebevoll ausgewählte und saubere Ausstattung inkl. schönem Pool-Bereich
- super leckeres und vielfältiges Frühstück mit sowohl lokalem als auch westlichen Angebot
- tolle Lage zwischen Altstadt (ca. 15min zu Fuß, 5min mit kostenlos leihbaren Fahrrad) und Strand (ca. 10min mit Fahrrad)
- vielfältiges und entspannendes Spa-Angebot zu fairen Preisen 
- und all das zu einem fairen Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis

Scooter werd geregeld, trips waren binnen secondes geboekt en dankzij een goede tip een mooi maatpak in de stad gescoord. Ontbijt was genoeg en zwembad einde van de middag fijn om even in te duiken. review.comment_positive: We had an absolute wonderful stay at Golden Holiday Hotel and Spa. Just 1km from the City Centre Ancient town. The room was very spacious and well decorated with a large bathroom. The breakfast spread was also very good. The staff are very helpful and courteous and takes care of what you need. They help you with the all kinds of tours in Hoi An to explore the city, recommends resturants and cafes, provides free bicycles to explore. The spa was also very relaxing and rejuvenating. Definitely recommend if you are staying in Hoi An.

review.rating: Great place to getaway from the hustle and bustle of busy cities.

review.comment_positive: Located a short ride to Hoi An, Hoi An Golden Holiday and Spa is in a fantastic position, to enjoy both the town and beach. Rooms were brilliant, pool was refreshing and breakfast buffet was amazing. The staff were excellent also, recommendations on places to visit and assistance with trips to old town.
review.comment_negative: The refrigerator in our room wasn't very cold. The staff did replace it however replacement wasn't any better.

review.comment_positive:
מקום טוב להעביר בו נופש בעיר הו-יאן, צוות המלון סייע בכל מה שנדרש. ארוחת הבוקר הייתה טובה. 
צריך לקחת בחשבון שהמלון נמצא כ-15 ד מהעיר העתיקה , וכ-4 קילומטר מחוף היום. 

לשיקולכם ;)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Great quiet location, about 3 min taxi/Grab ride to the old town or ~20-30 min walk. Lots of cafes and restaurants nearby. Good breakfast spread with buffet and made to order options. Staff at the front desk went above and beyond to help us arrange tours (cooking class + coconut forest boat ride) as well as discounted tickets to the Hoi An Memories show (highly recommend!). We even arranged our airport pickups to/from Da Nang through them at a great price (even cheaper than Grab) - very punctual and helpful driver too. Laundry service was same day turnaround as well. Great stay with my family

review.comment_positive:
This hotel was the best we have stayed in during our travels around SE Asia. 
The room was well equipped with a very large bed, tv with English film channels, big bathroom with a deep bath and plenty of hot water.
The small balcony overlooked the street but it wasn't noisy. 
The breakfast was excellent. Lots of choice for all.
We booked a trip whilst at the hotel which was really good fun.
We also indulged I  a couples massage, body scrub and facial.  Extremely professional. 
The staff are very attentive, professional and smart. 
The pool was an added bonus.
The location was 15 minutes from the old town. Walk in  a straight line and you can't miss it.
The hotel also has push bikes you can use for free.

review.rating: Overrall the service provided made the experience 100 times better and I could not be happier with my stay here.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: I loved the design of the hotel and rooms, matched Hoi An ancient town.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Wir hatten 2 Zimmer für uns und die Eltern meines Freundes gebucht. Als wir ankamen, haben wir netterweise ein kostenloses Zimmer Upgrade bekommen. Alles war sehr sauber und komfortabel. Nachdem die Eltern meines Freundes abgereist sind, haben wir nochmal 3 Tage verlängert. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hat uns bei den Buchungen von Transfers für unsere weitere Reise geholfen und ebenfalls Empfehlungen für Schneider gegeben (ohne Druck, wirklich reine Empfehlungen), bei denen wir auch etwas haben schneidern lassen und sehr zufrieden sind. 

Das Frühstück ist das Beste, was wir auf unserer bisherigen Reise hatten. Man kann kostenlos Fahrräder ausleihen, mit denen man in 5 Minuten in der Stadt ist. Einige Bewertungen „bemängeln“ zwar die Lage, für uns war es aber perfekt, da wir vorab nicht abschätzen konnten, wie sehr die Altstadt wegen der starken Regenfälle überflutet sein wird. Alles in allem ein super schönes Hotel, dass wir auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen würden!
review.comment_negative: Einige Wände hatten einen leichten Wasserschaden, die Wände an sich waren aber trocken. Es hat uns aber nicht gestört.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Staff was very nice! They gave us lots of good recommendations. Hotel spa is also very nice and morning buffet served good food! would recommend!

review.rating: We loved the stay here and you all do an amazing job to keep this hotel running plus making everyone’s stay so enjoyable
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: we loved pretty much everything! All the staff and I mean all the staff were so accomodating, helpful, lovely in nature and always had a smile on their faces! They helped with everything and anything that we needed from recommendations, laundry, booking cars and tours! The breakfast was amazing, great variety to choose from the buffet plus you could cook to order as well, our room was so spacious and always clean everyday. Everything we needed was in walking or biking distance, old town is about 15 minute walk and it was a great stroll even in the rain, nothing a grab couldn’t deal to if needed! Special mention to the ladies at reception, Ms Dzhang who checked us out and Ms Kim who checked us in but also an amazing lady who was always on the Nightshift - she was always so helpful! We didn’t get to swim in the pool but it was very picturesque and always clean! overall, I would stay here again in a heartbeat!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: I had a wonderful and relaxing stay at the Golden Holiday. After 6 weeks of backpacking Southeast Asia, staying here felt like a luxurious treat! The staff are incredibly welcoming and helpful, the breakfast was ample, the rooms are spacious, and the beds were SO COMFORTABLE. The price was extremely reasonable for the value and I ended up extending an additional night. The hotel is about a 15-20 minute walk to the old town, which I didn’t mind at all since it was pretty quiet and gave me an opportunity to explore other areas of Hoi An. I would definitely return and encourage anyone looking for a lovely holiday getaway to book here.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Das Hotel ist sehr gut ausgestattet, es gibt ein reichhaltiges Frühstück, freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal. Am wichtigsten ist uns die Sauberkeit, das war super. Optimal ist auch der Fahrradverleih, damit war die im Vergleich zu anderen Hotels etwas "weitere" Entfernung zum Zentrum kein Problem. Es sind ca. 5-10Min mit dem Rad in die Altstadt und es macht Spaß herumzufahren! Wir würden das Golden Holiday wieder buchen.
review.comment_negative: In der gesamten Stadt wird man ungefragt in Richtung "Tailoring" gedrängt und auch hier war das etwas spürbar. Es war nicht zu aufdringlich, aber es nervt trotzdem ein bisschen, dass man immer wieder mit dem Thema konfrontiert wird und dadurch den Eindruck gewinnt, alle sehen Touristen rein als Geschäft, das man möglichst in allen Facetten ausnutzen muss. Das haben wir so in keiner anderen Stadt Vietnams erlebt. Es ist aber nur ein kleiner Kritikpunkt, wir würden trotzdem jederzeit wieder kommen. Die Schneiderempfehlung des Hotels würden wir nicht unbedingt noch einmal nutzen, aber vielleicht liegt es auch an uns, dass wir diese Erfahrung als sehr stressig und druckbelastet empfunden haben.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Clean and Big rooms, perfect breakfast

review.rating: Et okay hotel til rimelig pris
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Ved morgenmaden kunne man vælge forskellige typer tilberedning af æg og det var lækkert. Især omelet. Lækkert stort værelse med to balkoner.
Lækker pool og område med toiletter. Virkelig dejligt at man kunne leje cykler!!
review.comment_negative:
Morgenmaden var ikke god. Det var kedeligt og ikke særlig mange valg. Det smagte ikke af noget og bacon og pølse var ikke godt.
Lækkert værelse vi havde, bortset fra bruseren i badeværelset. Alt alt for lille og der kom ikke særlig meget vand ud af den. Det er begrænset hvem der kan stå i badekarret og bruge bruseren, fordi der er så lavt til loftet.
Fitness rum er fint nok, intet prangende

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người

review.comment_positive: The staff are incredible. The morning breakfast buffet is good. The spa is good.
review.comment_negative: We really wish the spa had a hot tub to warm up your muscles.

review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân, bảo vệ chu đáo, nhiệt tình. Gần phố cổ, đi lại thuận tiện. Phòng sạch sẽ.
review.comment_negative: Chăn ga còn tồn mùi nước giặt, nên khắc phục,

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: nice location staff were friendly. Pool is nice and gets plenty of shade if preferred. Old town is a short walk. Room was large and beds were comfortable.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: If you still looking for a place in Hoi An, don’t waste time and book this hotel. The staff is genuinely kind, adorable! they are all so helpful, so nice, I fell in love with them! you will feel spoiled by them, they treated us in the best possible way. They also look very happy to work here which is a pleasure to see. Also the room was the best we had in Vietnam and we travelled already 20 days. The hotel is spotlessly clear, fresh linen, very comfy bed, and hot shower with a lot of pressure (don’t take this for granted in Vietnam hotels). Very good value for money. We took 3 tours through this hotel and we found them to be perfect, very well organised, very knowledgeable guides. The breakfast is delicious and for all tastes, they have fresh croissants every morning, I could jr believe my eyes! they arranged early check in for us and they set up the room in a romantic way as it was our honeymoon, lovely staff with big hearts! Also, I can read in the reviews people complaining as it is “far” from Old town, it’s not! just 10 mins easy walk and all straight! I can’t wait to come back! thank you for everything!
review.comment_negative: Nothing because this hotel is perfect!

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Todo, trato excelente, buenas instalaciones, la suite tenía muy buen tamaño y el desayuno espectacular. La ubicación no está en el centro pero se puedo hacer andando en 15 minutos y sino un taxi por 30 cents de Euro.

review.comment_positive: Best stay ever of my trip in Vietnam. We were upgraded to a Suite, the room was nice and spacious. Hotel was in great location in the town of Hoi An with easy access to ancient town. Staff went extra miles to assist us during the stay. They helped us to get tickets for Memories of Hoi An show (which was so worthy to watch). Make sure you borrow a bike from the hotel then go for a ride in the old town, it's the best way to enjoy the town then book massage to relax afterwards. Will definitely recommend this accommodation

We had a very cosy! n relaxing stay thanks to their grrest SPA n Massage. 
The breakfast provided was yummylicious and sumptuous! Great start of the day.
Walking distance to Ancient Town if u like walking or can take a grab car too. I would say grab is very cheap n affordable in Hoi An.
Have recommended my friends to stay here !
We will be back very soon!

review.comment_positive:
This is the second time I have stayed at this hotel. It is a great hotel with great staff. A big thank you to MS Sue at reception, and Mr. Ha, they are both so friendly and helpful. 
This hotel is great value for money. the rooms and the whole hotel are clean, the rooms are some of the biggest I have stayed in, while in Vietnam. I can't beleive this hotel is only rated 4 stars. The hotel is in a nice quite area of Hoi An and a taxi ride to the old town is only a couple of dollars.
review.comment_negative: There is nothing that I dislike about this hotel.

The breakfast was magnificent and full of varieties and change the menu everyday.  The location is perfect between beach and old town. Everything was perfect.

review.comment_negative: La seule chose qui était un peu décevante était le repas du soir qui n'était pas au niveau de l'hôtel.

review.comment_positive: love the staff and the hotel itself is pretty good ! loved the free bikes

review.rating: Very nice hotel with great service
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Spacious room, spa, free bicycle, motorbike service and great concierge service! Well located outside of the city center crowd.
review.comment_negative: Can be super noisy in the corridors (early in the morning), gym a bit old, bar closing really early.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người
review.comment_positive: My second time staying here and it's been very pleasant with the support from hotel staff. It's not very close to the old town but you can rent the bikes for free or order shuttle bus with cheap price. The family room was spacious enough for our family of 6 adults and 2 kids.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: The staff were very helpful and friendly, gave us lots of information. We were given a free room upgrade which was a great surprise, the room was very spacious, end of corridor so less noisy - room 406. The bikes were free to use and were in good shape. Breakfast options were good, they have a hot food counter so you can order eggs etc.
review.comment_negative: It was just a little bit further out than expected (even after looking at the reviews and Google maps!), which was probably due to the heat - 20 mins walk in 35 degrees feels longer!

review.rating: A must stay in Hoi An!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Everything! Ms Dzung was the most incredible host and was attentive and kind. The beds were so comfortable, the breakfast was delicious and they were helpful with any request we could possibly need! Hotel in a quiet area but close enough walk for everything you want to see!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Staff were amazing, so kind, attentive, friendly. Ms.Kim and Ms.Sue were exceptional organising tours for us and took such good care of us. The breakfast was the best we've had in Vietnam! Brilliant place to stay.
review.comment_negative: That we couldn't stay even longer.

review.rating: Nice clean hotel with very friendly staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: I had a very nice stay at the Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa. The front desk staff among Dung, Kim and Thuy was happy to give good recommendations for activities, tailor shops and anything else concerning my stay. Laundry service was quick as well. There‘s plenty of options to choose from for breakfast and Anh and the other kitchen staff provided very friendly service and the food was fresh and delicious. The lobby boys like Duyên were always around to help with luggage, parking the bike and so on. The hotel was very clean and the beds were comfortable. I’d choose this place again for another visit in Hoi An.
review.comment_negative: Parking for the motorbike was only available in front of the hotel - no parking garage or parking inside. Not a big deal since they have 24h reception, security cameras and Hoi An is a safe city, but I still wanted to mention it.

review.rating: Great hotel near Hoi An Old Town.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người
review.comment_positive: The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful right from check-in. The breakfast was a buffet one day, which was nice, and ordered from a menu the other days, but I liked this as we could still choose what we wanted, and there was less wastage! The pool was nice, clean but very cold, although that's nice when it's pushing 30 degrees out. The rooms were clean and comfortable, and the showers spacious and had plenty of hot water. Overall, a really good place to stay. We also booked a coconut boat tour through the hotel, which was really lovely and very reasonably priced.
review.comment_negative: The rooms were a little noisy with other hotel room doors banging, but that didn't really bother us too much. Nothing else much to complain about; the hotel did a great job.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Personal sehr freundlich und hat immer dafür gesorgt das es uns an nichts fehlt! Bei Nachfrage wie wir geschlafen haben und wir anmerkten das wir die Roller Nachts auf der Straße deutlich hörten wurde uns ohne Anfrage direkt ein anderes Zimmer angeboten. Zimmer sehr groß und komfortabel. Reichhaltiges Frühstück. Mit dem Roller in 2 Minuten in Oldtown und in 10 Minuten am Strand. Zu Fuß oder mit den kostenlosen Fahrrädern auch möglich.
Wir haben sogar um 2 Nächte verlängert.
Pool mit Liegen.
review.comment_negative:
Die Geräte im Fitnessraum könnten eine Ölung gebrauchen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: A very enjoyable no hassle holiday at this hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Friendly and efficient staff and always on hand to help with your queries. Hotel bikes were good and we used every day. Essential in Hoi an. Our rooms were great. We stayed 7 days, went to Nha Trang for another 7 day then back to this hotel for another 6 days as we liked it so much. I particularly liked the location and hotel swimming pool. The hotel is in a very good location, very easy to take a bike ride in many directions  ie; Ancient town, An Bang beach, Cua Dai via the rice paddies etc. The hotel pool is reasonably large and is on the shady side of the hotel in the afternoons when you need the shade the most. 
We like this hotel so much that we are already planning for a 4 week stay in our 2024 winter (NZ).

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The staff is really nice and helpful. It’s close to the beach and to the old city, you can cycle to both, using their free bikes. Very pleasant breakfast - I ate so much! Restaurant has good prices too :)

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
I loved the property for cleanliness, breakfast and hotel staff. Even though it’s located outside of old town hotel offer free bike rental and Grab ride between hotel and town is very affordable. 
I loved spacious suit and big bathtub. The hotel staff are very friendly and kind. They will go extra mile to make customers happy. Highly recommend this hotel!

thật sự mình có trải nghiệm cực kì tốt ở đây. từ bày trí đến cách các bạn lễ tân . rất chu đáo và nhiệt tình. 
mình sẽ ghé vào dịp sau❤️

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The staff at this hotel are fantastic. On arrival Miss Sue gave us the run down of what we could see and do in and around Hoi An complete with map and a list of recommendations. Had a really lovely afternoon enjoying the pool and cocktails, and the laundry service was great.
The room itself was a good size, comfy bed and pillows. 
I would recommend Golden to my family and friends.

review.comment_positive: Cozy hotel set in a green scenery, within walking distance from the city centre. Nice pool and a great selection for bfast. The staff was very accomodating, made very good recommandation for food, for silk tailor, organized trips for us. When we departed a day earlier, they were kind enough to reimburse us the money for that day. All in all, we had a great stay there.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic staff, they were friendly and helpful 
and happy to talk and chat. 

The pool area was amazing, it had shade and plenty of space and was very  tidy with nice thick pool towels.

Rooms were clean and comfortable, we had aircon and a fan in our room which was so good with the summer temps! 

The bikes were well kept and maintained and easy to access.

The staff were very helpful with suggestions for places to visit and assisting with organising activities and private cars for us.

Location was great, short bike/ walk to ancient town and not to far to bike to the beach.

Overall a really pleasant comfortable stay!

review.rating: Excellent stay at the hotel. We loved it and had a wonderful experience
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
The Property - It is located close to Old city, almost 1.5km away and beach too is nearby, approx 3km.
So location is very good unless you want to stay right in the middle of old town. Best part is that the hotel offers bicycles for free. So if you are a keen cyclist, the city will be your oyster! So was to cover. 
The Service - Staff was extremely nice and courteous. The staff at reception took good care and were helpful in giving all information required. They spent atleast 15min at the time of check in to explain about the places in city and things to do. There was so much warmth … I loved it. If I come back ever. I will definitely stay here. The food was also good at their restaurant.
review.comment_negative: Maybe they could have kept bigger water bottles in the rooms. Two 250ml are hardly sufficient for two people.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: It was an amazing stay at the hotel! The staff was very nice, the room was beautiful, the breakfast was delicious. I will come back with pleasure.

review.rating: Comfortable lodging, walkable to anything you probably want to visit, and the very helpful staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive:
Great hotel!  The staff was very kind to me and the accommodations were outstanding!  I had included the daily breakfast to my reservation and it was delicious.  The buffet had a large selection and it changed daily so there is definitely something for everyone.
My room was spacious, comfortable, and the staff was helpful with any issue I asked of them.  They also have bicycles you can borrow so you can visit the beach or ride into town.
And definitely take advantage of the spa services that are offered!  Absolutely wonderful!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: Insbesondere hat mir/uns gefallen, wie aufmerksam und hilfsbereit die beiden Rezeptions-Mitarbeiterinnen des Hotels sich um meine/unsere Belange gekümmert haben. Ich bin der Meinung, dass sie sehr viel mehr getan haben, als sie gemusst hätten. Einfach: Großartiges Personal!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: It was close to the old town. I liked the modest gym and the breakfast was good. The staff were professional and helpful.
review.comment_negative: The noise from the street was always present as my room was at the front and it's on a busy road. There are rooms on the other side so they would no doubt be quieter.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: everything is perfect: location, staff and the room. Definitely I will stay here for next trip and recommend my friends and relatives when they visit Hoi An Ancient.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel liegt so, dass man wunderbar zu Fuss durch die Stadt in die Altstadt laufen kann und viel sieht.
Die Zimmer sind geräumig und schön eingerichtet, gute Klimaanlage und sehr sauber.
Das Frühstück ist super, mein Favorit waren die Banana-Pancakes und die frische Maracuja! Die Auswahl an verschiedenen Speisen - europäisch und vietnamesisch- ist groß, alles sehr lecker, das Personal sehr aufmerksam und nett.
Schöner Pool im Innenhof, besonders in der Dämmerung schön, wenn die bunten Laternen an den Bäumen angehen.
Das beste an dem Hotel aber ist das bezaubende Personal, man fühlt sich sofort sehr aufgehoben und umsorgt. Besonders Ms Dzung hat uns mit vielen hilfreichen Tips rund um die Stadt Hoi An und Ausflüge in die Region - z.B. nach My Son oder die Kaiserstadt  Hué versorgt. Man hat dadurch fast ein eingebautes Reisebüro!

review.rating: 5 star customer service and wondeful stay in Hoi An!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: I loved everything about the Golden Holiday! outstanding over the top customer service! I was messaged before arriving directly to help with a ride from the airport that was cheaper than Grab, I was welcomed by Selena who sat me down with a map and explained everything there was to do in the town which was so nice and comforting! i was given a beautiful upgraded suite with super comfortable king bed, nice linens, warm strong water pressure shower, bathtub and bright big windows. The Hotel is a perfect location for going to the beach or into old town and I loved the complimentary bikes to get around! Breakfast was delicious with a good variety. they also have a restaurant if you need a pizza late at night and there is also a spa downstairs. The pool is beautiful. The staff made my trip so enjoyable. They are SO helpful and will help make your trip amazing. being a solo traveler, Miss KIm even helped me plan my trip and booked my upcoming stay in HaNoi and helped reserve my halong bay overnight.cruise. Miss Kim also helped book an amazing motorcycle trip to Hue from Hoi an! Selena, miss Kim, ms Dzung, ms THUY, & Sa, thank you so much for welcoming me in Vietnam and thanks for always smiling and making my trip unforgettable and easy and fun!! I loved my stay at Golden Holiday! Highly recommend!
review.comment_negative: Everything was wonderful. No complaints. Maybe a little noise from street or restaurants down the road but it went away by like 10/11pm at night.

review.rating: Come to Hoi An for the Cao Lao, stay at Golden to feel welcome
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
The staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful. We’ve been in hotels all over the world, and this is one of the most exceptional welcomes we’ve ever experienced (including instant, detailed answers on WhatsApp). 

In addition, we enjoyed the free bicycles, laundry, done by the next day, suggestions for what to do, and help organising a private driver to Hue.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Everything right from welcome to check out absolute faultless, would recommend all to stay. Special thanks to Huye and sue for personal attention
review.comment_negative: Just a point for management...kindly include few more  dishes for vegetarian tourist...still impeccable service

review.rating: Wonderful place to stay in Hoi An

review.comment_positive: Dịch vụ tốt, nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Phòng thoáng, đẹp.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Ms Sue at the reception was exceptionally thorough and kind, she took the time to sit with us when we check in and provided a run through of the sites and sees within the Hoi An district. She provided recommendations and advice on the prices and made sure we were aware of intricate things like timings. Thank you Sue.

The hotel massage was great too, the location they have is a separate area below the hotel, which was decorated well, air condition and smelled great, better than normal massage parlours in the area which are ppls homes

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: All good, great hotal, 100% recomended

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The service personal was great, especially ms dhuong and ms sue helped us a lot with booking tickets, drivers and flights.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Bei der Ankunft ist uns als erstes aufgefallen, dass das Personal sehr freundlich war. Die Dame an der Rezeption hat sich viel Zeit für uns genommen und uns alles erklärt, eben so Tipps für Ausflüge und Aktivitäten gegeben. Es wurden auch Empfehlungen für Schneider und Restaurants ausgesprochen, allerdings immer ohne Zwang bzw ohne Aufforderung, lediglich nett gemeinte Empfehlungen. Preis für Massage und auch Motorroller waren im normalen Bereich. Fahrräder konnten jederzeit kostenlos ausgeliehen werden. Das Frühstück war hervorragend. Zur Abreise wurde uns ein Fahrer angeboten, der uns nach Da Nang brachte, dies konnten wir unter Grab Preis mit Karte direkt im Hotel zahlen.

review.room_type: Suite 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: Tout était parfait

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Amazing breakfast with made to order element in addition to buffet. Lots of choice. Nice pool, very large bed and bathtub. Lovely in room robes, I even bought one for my mother as a gift. Staff is very kind and reactive. Excellent quality for the price.
review.comment_negative: The comforter is very thick and warm but maybe a bit much for the climate even with the A/C. This is just a personal preference perhaps.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Dieses Hotel hat das beste Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis, das wir je erleben durften. 

Für einen deutsch sozialisierten Menschen fast schon zu freundliches Personal, ruhige und gemütliche Zimmer, ein schöner Pool und gutes Frühstück. 

Leistungen wie der Fahrradverleih, der Wäscheservice und der Transport zum Flughafen verliefen absolut reibungslos. 

Vielen Dank für dieses tolle Erlebnis.

review.rating: Great value for money and lovely staff

review.comment_positive: Staff were very friendly and helpful. Loved the pool and relaxing atmosphere. The food served by the restaurant was great with a lot of options. I had the best massage I have ever experienced.
review.comment_negative: Fridge smelt bad and made our food smell bad. Dirty flip flops from a previous guest still in the bathroom and there was an open water outlet dripping next to the toilet.

All the staff is very hepful, specially Dzung!

Die Unterkunft liegt perfekt zwischen der Altstadt und dem Strand. Man kann sich hier umsonst Fahrräder leihen und direkt los fahren. Zum Strand sind es ca 15 min mit dem Rad.
Das Personal ist super freundlich und das Zimmer war sauber. Wir haben viele Tipps bekommen und haben uns wohl gefühlt.

이름이 정확히 기억이 안나지만... Kim, Thuy, Diling 이 직원들은 정말 정말 친절하고 유익한 정보를 알려주었습니다.

review.rating: The very best place you can stay in Hoi An with implacable service and hospitality.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Everybody in the hotel is VERY nice and helpful!!! We are so impressed with the level of hospitality and how they take care of us. The hotel location is closed enough to the old town but far enough from all the chaotic roads. Breakfast is plentiful. They recommend several tours for us and we absolutely loved the tours they recommended. It was perfect for our short time in Hoi An. I’m so impressed with people the most and how kind everyone is. We cannot wait to come back to Vietnam again! Thank you for your hospitality!!!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: sehr zentral gelegenes Hotel, stylisches Ambiente, ein Pool im Innenhof lädt zum verweilen ein, man fühlst sich rundum wohl, da das Personal sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend ist.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: everything was good about this hotel, staff was good, location was great

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: I had a wonderful experience during my stay at this hotel. The staff was incredibly friendly and accommodating, making me feel right at home from the moment I arrived. The room was clean, comfortable, and well-appointed, providing a relaxing atmosphere for my stay. The hotel’s amenities, such as the pool and fitness center, were top-notch and added to the overall enjoyment of my trip. The location was also convenient, with easy access to restaurants and attractions in the area. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable stay during their travels.

review.rating: Loved Hoi A Golden Holiday - breakfast was delicious and plentiful. Coffee was good and staff amazing. I will stay there
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The room was spacious and well equipped. The hotel itself is very nice and the staff is attentive and helpful. Enjoyed the free bikes, the pool area was beautiful. I also enjoyed a wonderful message.
review.comment_negative: Everything is great - the walk to the central area was not my favorite aspect. But it is easy and cheap to get a taxi.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: Excellent service, location, breakfast and rooms.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Excellent service from staff. Our room is big with a balcony, has everything we needed for the stay. We originally booked for 2 nights but decided to stay one more night, and the hotel helped to upgrade us to a bigger room for free. Breakfast is good with a lot of Vietnamese and Western choices. We could also use the bikes for free to visit the old town and the beach. All in all a great choice and value for money if you visit Hoi An.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect at this hotel. The beds very comfy and had a great pool view. The breakfast selection was also the best I've had since being in Vietnam for two weeks. The staff were also very polite and very helpful. I would recommend this hotel highly.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: the room was big and clean, good aircon and comfy bed. I got a free upgrade for my room which was lovely. it’s a bit further away from the old town so in the heat was not the best to walk down but completely manageable. the buffer breakfast wasn’t my favourite - would be nice to have more fruit and choice but also understandable since they’re not at full capacity after covid. and the omelette station was really good! had a massage there too which was really good and got some of my clothes washed with the laundry service.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Läget är helt Ok, tar ca 20 min att promenera ner till nattmarknaden och gamla stan. Väldigt fint och trevlig personal. De hjälpte oss med bokning av sovbuss till nästa destination.
review.comment_negative: Lite kommunikationsproblem. Vi frågade 2 st om hur långt tid vår bussresa skulle ta och när vi blev hämtade från hotellet. Inget stämde och vi fick vänta en hel del plus att vi kom en dag senare till nästa hotell. De är väldigt hjälpsamma men trippelkolla tider och dyl.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Cũng được cho một chuyến đi gia đình ngắn ngày. Vị trí không quá xa trung tâm.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ

Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Great facilities - the pool especially. Gym was great too, although the treadmill didn’t work. Spacious and clean room. Free bike use from the hotel was very handy, although the bikes could use some TLC. The staff were kind enough to let us use the room again after checking out (it was still before 12pm), when our bus was running late.
review.comment_negative:
Wasn’t too happy that the staff tried to downgrade our room when we checked in, but for the same price, so be weary of this. We managed to keep the better room after insisting we keep the room that we actually booked (a larger room with a balcony). 
Also, although not associated with the hotel, be careful not to use the travel agent directly opposite the hotel. We had a terrible experience booking our bus journey with them, check the Google reviews for the place.

review.rating: Beautiful Hotel with Exellent Rooms! Definitley book if visiting Hoi An!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: This was an amazing place to stay! Very nice rooms. Awesome location. Breakfast was a wonderful buffet style with something for everyone in my family. Staff were super nice and helpful. Recommended some show to see and places to visit where we had the most amazing experiences. Definitely book this hotel if you are visiting Hoi An. Very clean and wonderful amenities!
review.comment_negative: Everything was excellent. We wouldn't change a thing!

review.rating: Must stay when in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: They were so welcoming and made our stay very comfortable! When we told them about our aircon not working, they worked fast to investigate the issue and upgraded our room straight away. The location of this hotel is close to the old quarter and is close by to many coffee shops and street vendors! We really enjoyed our stay here and will definitely be back in the future. Would like to thank the staff for such an amazing stay!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: This hotel exceeded my expectations for the price that we paid.  The staff were all so helpful, room was immaculate and the breakfast was the best we had during our trip.  Excellent value for.money and would not hesitate to stay here again if I visit Hoi An
review.comment_negative: The noise from the road as the hotel is on a busy junction.  It wouldn't stop me from staying here again but I would  choose a pool view next time.

only think I would fault was being heavily pressured to give 5 star rating

review.comment_positive: Amazing staff, they are so helpful and kind.  Food is lovely.  Beautiful pool area.  Great location - 2 mins in a taxi or a 20min walk, located outside of the old town which can completely flood so if you’re unsure what the weather will be like when you arrive at least you know this hotel will be dry! Would definitely stay here again.  Great value for money.

review.comment_positive: Nhân viên từ của khách sạn thân thiện thiệt tình và rất chu đáo , đặt biệt khăn lau hay áo trong phòng sạch sẽ thơm

review.rating: Fantastic, comfy, excellent quality, air on amazing!! Staff wonderful
review.room_type: Suite 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Hồ bơi
review.comment_positive:
I’ve stayed all over the world in many hotels. This was 
Booked as part of a holiday in Thailand where we came to Vietnam hoi an for 3 nights! For the price and star rating I didn’t expect it to be as good as it was beds where very comfy mattress blankets ect all good quality very nice sleep. The room was very large and the air conditioning excellent again which was a big surprise every time I opened my bedroom door to go in a blast of cool air would hit me. I had amazing recommendations from the staff to make the most of my short break in hoi an which made it such an adventure the free bicycles where awesome and got us around every where!
I had issues with my airline and I couldn’t believe the lengths that sa, Kim, and kieu went to help me also giving me local knowledge to avoid anything possible that would be a tourist trap. I always leave reviews for the benefit of the consumer and even though this is a great review it’s honest and to let you know for the money I paid I am blown away with what I got and the location was fantastic!!!

review.rating: Bon Hôtel avec un excellent rapport qualité prix

review.rating: A great experience with Golden Holiday. We felt welcomed and enjoyed our stay.

review.comment_positive: The staff at this hotel are simply amazing. They were always trying to help us have the best stay possible and willing to help with any of our needs. Things didn't all go to plan, but the staff reacted well to all situations. They offered us a free breakfast even though the hotel didn't include it, they helped us change rooms, they helped us with booking transportation, they helped us with our laundry, and they have bike rentals.
review.comment_negative: The location is a not walkable distance from the ancient town.

+Very friendly and helpful staff, particularly Ms. Dzung who was informative about the local area and attentive in making sure our stay was a good one.

+Room was beyond our expectations; the suite was huge, comfortable, clean, and nicely furnished.

+Location was only a 10-15 minute walk from the main part of Old Town, and free bicycles were available.

review.room_type: Suite 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: I cannot recommend it enough! Wish we could have stayed more. The facilities are great: nice swimming pool, tasty breakfast, huge room all equipped, free bikes and they also arranged motorbike renting for us. It is only 5 minites away by bike from the center and it is a nice and easy ride. But the best part was the staff: Ms. DZUNG was amazing. She is so professional, dedicated, kind and helpful. We felt at home. She made sure we enjoyed our stay and did not miss anything. Her tips were very helpful and she arranged everything for us. She is definitely the best! A 10/10

The room was clean and spacious, the pool was refresing and the breakfast was nice as well. A definite recommendation! Also the laundry service was quick and nice.

The laundry service and room service are super good. All excellent! Highly recommended.
review.comment_negative: The only thing I would change would be that the elevator does not have A/C and makes the "ride" take forever. But nothing serious.

review.comment_positive: Hôtel très joli, confortable et bien situé. Tout le personnel est très accueillant et serviable (mention spéciale pour Dzung très efficace et serviable). Le prêt de vélo gratuit très pratique pour aller à la mer ou se balader. Vous pouvez aller à la vieille ville en marchant mais si vous préférez en vélo c’est très rapide. Lit très confortable, chambre spacieuse, excellent petit déjeuner. Si nous devions revenir à Hoi An nous choisirions à nouveau cet hôtel !

review.rating: Wonderful stay at Golden holiday hotel and spa…surely enhanced my stay at lovely Hoi An!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: Exceptional hotel in Hoi An ! I stayed here for 4 nights and it was a really nice and pleasant stay. Charming, cosy and convenient. Staff is super friendly and always wanting to help with a smile. Ms Thuy at the reception is amazing…took great care of me from the time of check in to check out. Room decor is beautiful and the balcony adds quite a bit of charm. Breakfast is very nice too. Bicycles can be rented for free. Spa was great too. All in all, great value for money !
review.comment_negative: Nothing really which is not to like! Perhaps at the breakfast if they add some coffee options like Latte, Cappuccino etc, that will make it perfect !

Le petit déjeuner est très bon et copieux, les chambres sont grandes et confortables. Il y a même une piscine ! Quant au rapport qualité-prix il est simplement top.
 Encore merci pour ce séjour !

review.rating: An excellent choice of place to stay. I will definitely be recommending it to my friends

review.comment_positive: Wonderful staff and a lovely little hotel. Excellent location half way between the beach and old town. Free bicycle use was great. Breakfast was excellent with a wide variety of choice.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: The rooms, facilities and breakfast were amazing. The staff were super friendly and really helpful. I will definitely stay again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The room was very big and clean! Also the breakfast was really nice with a huge variety! The personnel was really kind and helpful! The bikes were a bit outdated but were free! I recommend the hotel!
review.comment_negative: We would have given a 10 stars review if the hotel haven't pushed us to give a 10 points review while we were waiting for our taxi 9 o clock in he morning on the lobby, something that was very uncomfortable for us. Most probably its the managers pushing and not the personnel itself! Please stop doing that!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Sehr sauberes Hotel, wir wurden super herzlich empfangen, man hat sich sehr viel Zeit genommen um uns die Stadt zu erklären und haben gute Tipps und Empfehlungen bekommen, die wir auch genutzt haben.
Ein Fahrrad ausleihen war hier kostenlos und das Ausleihen eines Rollers hat 150.000 VDN gekostet und erfolgte problemlos. Wir haben unsere Wäsche zum fairen Preis innerhalb eines halben Tages waschen lassen und sie hat noch nie so gut gerochen :) Man hatte viel Auswahl beim Frühstück - rundum ein sehr gelungener Aufenthalt.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Miss sue was amazing!! She greated us on arrival explained all activities gave great advice. Bedroom was lovely and big so comfortable, bicycles available from the hotel, in a nice area close to the old town. Pool was lovely and breakfast was 10/10!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Todo estaba muy bien muy amables en especial Kim de recepción

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
La atención del personal es estupenda, se preocupan mucho porque estés cómodo, y te ayudan en todas las dudas que puedas tener.nos ayudaron a organizar un tour privado que ha sido genial.
El desayuno es delicioso, y las habitaciones muy muy cómodas.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The hotel is well organized and the staff are friendly and helpful. In the outdoor area there is an excellent swimming pool with sunbeds and umbrellas.  Upon check-in we were offered a room upgrade, which we loved!  The room was big, the bed huge and comfortable, the bathroom clean and a the shower was nice too. Breakfast was very good.  The hotel is a 15m walk from the old town.  Overall, our experience here was very pleasant. Highly recommended!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Super freundliches Personal, dass uns sogar die Weiter Reise organisiert hat inkl. unkomplizierter Flugbuchung 👌
Sauberer Pool, leckeres Frühstück, kostenfreie Fahrräder, Wäscheservice. Man erhält ganz viele Tipps und wird immer mit einem Lächeln begrüßt. Wir waren wunschlos glücklich. Top😊👍

Stayed at the golden hotels for 3 days!
Wonderful place,  just a 5 min bike ride from the old town!(they have complimentary bikes). The place is very well maintained and our host Kim was very friendly and helpful, she helped us book a bus to our next destination, as all the tickets online were sold out!
Will come back here 💯 %!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Ms. Dzung is a gem. Super warm person and attentive to details. She made the whole experience extra nice!
review.comment_negative: Kinda noisy around the hotel tbh, but nothing too bad…

review.comment_positive: A nossa experiência foi maravilhosa. Assim que chegámos conhecemos a Ms. Dzung, que nos ajudou a conhecer os vários pontos de interesse da cidade e a marcar várias tours para os dias. Ela é maravilhosa. Chegámos antes do horário de check in e como o nosso quarto ainda não estava disponível, disponibilizaram-nos outro quarto melhor do que aquele que tinhamos pedido. O quarto com varanda era enorme e maravilhoso. O pequeno almoço era excelente.

review.rating: hotel de 4* a precio de 3* y servicio de 5*
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Habitación amplia, sólo llegar, vinieron a recibirnos en la puerta. llovía a cántaros y nos ayudaron aparcándonos la moto y con las maletas. Las recepcionistas Dzung i Kim un encanto. nos ayudaron y recomendaron sitios que ver. Nos prepararon la habitación pra nuestro Honeymoon trip de forma fabulosa. por la noche llovió una barbaridad. llegamos al hotel y aunque era fuera de horas de cocina nos ofrecieron cenar ahí. por otro lado, el desayuno el mejor que hemos comido en nuestras 3 semanas por Vietnam. te dan a elegir entre la carta y te lo sirven cuando llegas. Un servicio ejemplar.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: Amazing hotel with the best staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: We absolutely loved our stay at Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa. In particular, we were so impressed with the service provided by the lovely staff (Ms Kim, Sa, Selina and Dung). The staff were all so sweet and very helpful when it came to giving recommendations about food or activities. We booked two tours through the hotel and really enjoyed both. The facilities were great (especially the free bikes which we used the entire time) and the rooms were very clean and comfortable as well. We highly recommend this hotel!

review.rating: Schönes kleines Hotel fussläufig zur Innenstadt
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Schönes kleines Hotel, fußläufig zum Stadtzentrum. Sehr freundliches Personal, hilfsbereit und gibt Tipps. Das Frühstück ist sehr reichhaltig sowohl für Europäer als auch Asiaten und andere Nationen. 
Alles ist sauber. Es gibt einen kleinen Pool mit Liegen und zwei Daybeds. Man kann da auch sitzen und einen kleinen Snack zu sich nehmen.
Insgesamt für einen kurzen Aufenthalt alles optimal auch im Bezug zum Preis.
review.comment_negative: Wir hatten ein Zimmer zur Straße. Da die Balkontür nicht ganz dicht war, war es ab ca. 6.00 Uhr laut wegen des Straßenlärms

review.comment_positive: Hotel położony w bardzo dobrej lokalizacji, do centrum około 20 min. pieszo, 5 minut rowerem. Do plaży około 3,5 km. Rowerem około 20 minut. Śniadania bardzo dobre. Obsługa miła i pomocna. Pokoje czyste posiadające wszystkie udogodnienia.

Tout

review.rating: Wij hebben een heerlijk verblijf gehad

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Great location and very friendly staff. Also very helpful with organising places to eat and any tours we wanted to do!

review.rating: Hotel charmant avec un super personnel
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Personnel vraiment top, très attentionné et avec un très bon sens du service.
La chambre était très belle, bien propre et grande. Et la literie parfaite.
Petit déjeuner parfait avec un buffet delicieux (fruits frais, plats salés, plats sucrés, boissons à volonté.. )
Joli cadre pour la piscine même si nous n'avons pas pu en profiter car il pleuvait.
Petite salle de sport mais très propre avec vue sur la piscine.
L'hôtel propose des vélos, à 5 min de la vieille ville et une quinzaine de minutes à pied.
Je recommande fortement, rapport qualité prix indéniable et accueil génial.
C'était un séjour parfait !
review.comment_negative: L'hôtel est en bord de route, on entend très légèrement les bruits de voiture depuis la chambre.

review.rating: Highlight of our trip to Vietnam.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The room was clean, spacious, and the bed was comfortable. All people who worked there were friendly and willing to help were needed. You get a bicycle so venturing out to old town or the beach is a must. If we go back to Vietnam this is were we would stay again. Lastly, we finally had some good breakfast again. we traveled around a lot and found that the definition of breakfast is a bit different in Vietnam.
review.comment_negative: The gym was a bit outdated and there weren’t any yoga mats. But we still managed to work out so it was good enough.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: A great hotel within walking distance to old town

review.rating: Fijn hotel tussen de stad en het strand in.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Schoon en ruim hotel. De kamer is helemaal prima en voldoet aan de eisen wat zij aanbieden.
Fietsen kun je gratis lenen en daardoor handig de stad verkennen en anders naar het strand fietsen. Beiden zijn voor ieder toegankelijk en makkelijk af te leggen!
Ontbijt is uitgebreid en je kan verse eieren en pannenkoeken bestellen.
Zwembad en Gym zijn oké. Zwembad ligt in de middag wel in de schaduw.

Bij het uitchecken vroegen ze ons om een goede beoordeling te schrijven. Ondanks dat zij het vroegen zouden we het toch wel geven. We boekten zelf een een nacht bij, vanwege de fijne kamer, de fijne ligging en de stad Hoi an!

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Location was good. Staff took great interest and remembered your name. Free bike rental.
review.comment_negative:
-Staff are very keen to know where are you going, what shops you are going to and if you have bought anything. Very pushy to sell you items and insist on visiting shops they recommend.
-Breakfast could have been better. Every morning a member of staff came down to you for a chat - what your plans were for the day. A nice touch perhaps for the 1st breakfast but after the 3rd morning there was no need to come down for the same conversation. If your not a morning person you would like to eat in peace. 
-Swimming pool was being renovated so could not use
- Our room was freshly painted when we arrived, touch ups as not all walls were painted. Strong smell of paint and paint was still wet when we arrived. Also there was a strong musty smell in the bathroom. 
-Air conditioner was directly in front of the bed so it was blasting at your face all night. We did turn it off but the room got too hot so you needed the air conditioning on.
-Our room over looked another hotel, you had to keep all curtains closed for privacy otherwise people could see clearly into your bedroom.
-It was great to use the bikes, however maintenance needed, the brakes weren’t the best.

review.rating: Best place to stay in Hoi An. Everything about this place is great!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người
review.comment_positive: The staff was beyond accommodating, helpful and cheerful. The buffet breakfast was amazing every morning, fresh fruit, bread, made to order eggs, and so much more! The staff booked us a coconut boat tour and recommended the best restaurants for us in the Old Town. Tuong tailor was recommended by Ms Sue and they were perfect, we had the best clothes made by the best staff! Ms Sue and her staff went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. The spa was amazing and conveniently located down stairs, we got the full body and foot massage! The pool outside is very nice and has lots of sun beds. They also had free bikes to ride around the city or to the beach. Perfect location as well! I highly recommend staying here. This was our second stay here and we will definitely be back!

review.rating: Great stay within walking distance of Hoi An Old Town.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Recommended by a friend, this was a lovely little hotel. Very, very welcoming staff even before we arrived, we received a whats app to see if we needed anything extra, or a driver from the airport, which cost less than a Grab. Everyone was friendly and wanted to chat and look after us. Lots of knowledge of area and excursions and happy to book for you.

We stayed in a triple room, which was very comfortable. Someone came to fix the safe as it wasn't working. The pool was small but nice, and there was a small amount of shade. The pool beds were comfortable, and pool toilets were very clean, 
and I loved the fluffy, large pool towels.

The massage was enjoyable (spa onsite), and I received a free cocktail afterwards. 

Breakfast had some variety, breads, pastries, some hot cooked food and an egg station. The fruit was great and plentiful. Usual coffee, tea, and fruit juices, as well as salad choices.

It was a 15-minute walk from the Old Town, and we borrowed (free) bicycles sometimes to ride around. 

Thanks, Kim, for great customer service. We will stay again when we visit Hoi An.
review.comment_negative: Quite a noisy spa (other guests). Bathroom sometimes smelt of drains.

review.rating: Ms Kim was wonderful! She answered all of our questions upon arrival and gave us great suggestions during our stay. The

Ms. Dzung hat uns viele Tipps gegeben und hilft bei der Planung für Ausflüge. Der Pool ist groß und das Gym bietet genug Auswahl an Geräten. Neben dem Buffet gibt es die Möglichkeit Omelette und Suppe zubereiten zu lassen. Ich bin sehr begeistert und komme definitiv wieder vorbei!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Loved it! The staff were so welcoming (prior to us arriving via WhatsApp as well as upon arrival and throughout our stay). They made my mum’s 60th birthday special and added a very personal touch and even sang happy birthday. The room was very clean and the facilities were great. They recognised we were only there for a short stay and had a list of recommendations ready for us for when we arrived so we could make the most of our stay. The free bicycles were also an added bonus, it was in a great location - a short, straight, flat walk or bike ride to the old town. The pool facilities were good and the breakfast was lovely. The staff were so lovely, they even came out to wave us goodbye as we were leaving. Would definitely recommend this hotel to all; I will definitely be staying at this hotel on my next visit to Hoi An and have already recommended it to my family and friends.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Great hospitality and helped us out a lot with recommendations, hiring bikes and airport transfers. The hotel also offer free bicycle hire, a great way to get around town. 

Very friendly staff and great facilities.

review.comment_negative:
un peu bruyant le soir, salle de fitness un peu vieillotte., petit déjeuner limité en choix
Première fois que ça m’arrive : le staff réception très sympa sur le séjour s’est montré très insistant afin qu’on leur mette une note de 10 sur Booking. la manager nous a remis une couche et le message est  tres clair : «  si vous ne mettez pas une note de 10, merci de ne pas mettre de note, meme un 9 »
assez hallucinant, on est en fin de tour du monde d’un an et cela ne m’est jamais arrivé. cela explique sans doute la  ote de 9,6 excessivement bonne. c’est dommage car l’hôtel est rees bien mais le procédé est assez malhonnête…

review.comment_positive:
Piękny kameralny obiekt w najładniejszym mieście Wietnamu. Przemiła obsługa, wszyscy byli bardzo uśmiechnięci, profesjonalni i pomocni, zarówno na recepcji, na śniadaniu jak i w SPA (w dobrej cenie i na dobrym poziomie!)
Bardzo dobre śniadanie , chociaż przy pełnym obłożeniu jest trochę tłoczno i trzeba czekać na wolny stolik jednak obsługa znów robiła wszystko co można. Duże i komfortowe pokoje, z najbardziej wygodnymi łóżkami na jakimi spaliśmy podczas naszej kilkutygodniowej podróży po Wietnamie. Hoi An jest cudowne, szczególnie noca - zalujemy ze zostalismy tam tylko 2 noce!
