review.rating: Enjoyable stay with a great value for money.
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: The staff was really nice, specially Dung, Thuy and Anh. very helpful and friendly people. they helped us with restaurant recommendations which turned out to be great and also helped with finding a good deal on custom made leather shoes and bags. the breakfast was really nice and filling and everyone, literally everyone in the hotel is nice and smiling and very helpful.
review.comment_negative: The gym needs better AC, and new equipments as the ones there are old. we had a big room but the AC is small compared to the room size. it’s not that important for us but the shower in the toilet needs a higher water pressure. so overall, all these things can be improved easily as it’s just physical things, but please don’t change the people. they are the best.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Desayuno espectacular.

review.rating: Hoi An immer eine Reise wert
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Die Zimmer sind gut ausgestattet und vergleichsweise ruhig. Das Frühstück ist sehr reichhaltig. Das Personal im Hotel ist sehr hilfreich beim Buchen von Aktivitäten in Hoi An. Das Hotel eigene Spa und die Massagen sind ebenfalls zu Empfehlen. Das Hotel verfügt über einen Pool für eine Abkühlung am Nachmittag. Das Hotel verleiht Fahrräder, sodass man die Gegend um Hoi An auch auf eigene Faust erkunden kann. Die Altstadt von Hoi An ist in jedem Fall einen Besuch wert.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
A really great stay at Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa.

The staff (especially reception staff) are brilliant and made our stay that much more enjoyable. when we arrived we were given a welcome drink and once we had checked into our room, they gave us a great list of recommendations. Not only that, they were happy to assist with any further questions and were quick to respond by WhatsApp.

The rooms were made up daily and fresh towels given. the laundry service was returned to the room within half a day.

The buffet breakfast was good and eggs (in any style) are made to order.

Though we didn’t use the pool, it looked clean and well kept. The gym, though small, had everything needed for a decent cardio/weight workout.

The hotel is around a 10 minute walk from the old town towards the river. The hotel also offers free bicycles to get around as well.
review.comment_negative:
Due to the weather, we had to dine at the hotel for dinner one night. The food quality wasn’t up to the standards of others places in Hoi An.

However, when checking out, we were asked by the reception staff if we had any feedback and when we highlighted this, they thanked us for the feedback and gave us money off our dinner bill. The way that handled it was outstanding.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Beautiful spacious room. Great value for money. Very hospitable staff and decent breakfast options. Comfortable bed. Lovely bathroom. Lovely swimming pool. Restaurant available for food requests all day. Clean room. Location 15 min walk from old town, bikes available if wanted. Make sure windows are closed fully before sleep as some noise from the road. Pretty tiles. Laundry service is a plus.
review.comment_negative: All fantastic would definitely stay again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Location was good. And the staff is really helpful.

review.rating: Awesome place to stay in Hoi An!!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We stayed here for 5 nights and loved it!!! The location of this hotel is perfect if you plan to visit old town and Au Nang The rooms are spacious with comfortable beds. Our favourite part of our stay was the pool. It was so nice to come back after walking in the heat and go for a swim! They have comfortable sun beds to relax in and a full service restaurant/bar. The staff work hard to make sure guests enjoy their stay. They are very kind and eager to provide recommendations on local shops and restaurants.
review.comment_negative: The rooms are a little dated. Shower head pressure could be better.

review.rating: Amazing hotel with brilliant and friendly staff
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: From the minute we checked in until the moment we checked out we were looked after so well. The check in process was so smooth, the reception staff would sit down with you to go through all details carefully with you, along with a welcome drink on arrival it was a lovely touch. The room was extremely spacious with a lovely pool view. In a great location with access to everything. Breakfast each morning was brilliant with a great variety of food. All staff members were so helpful and extremely friendly. We had spa treatments on our first day, and they were amazing. Our stay was during Tet, so it was a great atmosphere around the place and a great time to stay here. Overall, an amazing stay, very impressed with the hotel.

review.rating: Fantastic stay and nice staff! Had a amazing time - love the small extra touched like the ginger tea!

review.comment_positive:
Perfect location - between old town and the beach. Hotel provides bicycles free of charge which we made great use out of to cycle in and out of town and to the beach. The lady who checked us in at reception was so helpful and provided us with lots of information about tours, tailors and places to eat etc.
Breakfast had a good selection of eggs, breads, fruits, hot food and salads which was great.
Room was fabulous, so spacious and the bed was really comfy.
TV had Netflix which was a great surprise in the evening as we wanted to relax and unwind during our travels.
Good Laundry Service
Gym was basic but had enough for a short workout during travelling with a smith machine, treadmill and free weights. The room it is in is quite small though,

review.comment_positive: We were here for 3 nights on our honeymoon whilst travelling through Vietnam. Firstly, the location was awesome, very close to the bus stop and walking distance to the markets and restaurants. On arrival, we were greeted with a refreshing drink and Ms Dzung was amazing by ensuring we had a comfortable stay. She showed us all the places to visit, foods to try and organised for our room to be decorated specially for our honeymoon. The facilities were amazing and the daily breakfast was awesome too. Thank you so much for everything. We look forward to staying again when we come back 😊

review.comment_positive:
The hotel is good value for money and the rooms are huge. The best thing about the hotel are the wonderful reception staff who all went out of their way to be helpful, it’s also the only hotel we’ve stayed in where the taxi they booked to the airport was cheaper that a Grab. 
Its about 20 mins walk to the centre of town and there’s free bike hire, it’s also about 3.5km to the beach. 
It’s on a large road but you couldn’t really hear the traffic noise from the room.
review.comment_negative:
The air condition unit was quite old but worked ok. 
The cups they provide in the room are useless which is weird as the ones they have downstairs are normal.

review.comment_positive:
The hotel is in a quiet and safe-feeling location within 10-20 minutes of all the attractions. The beds were so comfortable, and the service is some of the best service we have ever received. The staff are so attentive and helpful in all situations (when needing a tailor, pharmacy, trips to Cham Island) and also recommended some excellent vegetarian restaurants for us. We were only booked for 2 nights, but ended up staying for 3, because we felt so well looked after. 
The hotel also supplies two water bottles /day, and mineral water at breakfast where you can fill up your bottles. 
We ran into a couple of issues on our stay and the hotel helped us with both.

review.comment_positive: Phòng nghỉ rộng rãi, thiết kế đẹp, sạch sẽ và tiện nghi, có bể bơi tuy nhỏ và nông nhưng đáp ứng nhu cầu của trẻ em. Ks có dịch vụ xe đạp miễn phí. Nhân viên nhiệt tình và rất thân thiện.

review.rating: Perfecte service op een fijne locatie
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Prachtig luxe hotel in de kleurrijke stad Hoi An. Bij aankomst in het hotel werden we ontvangen door het uiterst vriendelijke personeel, dat uitgebreid met je meedenkt en tips geeft voor kleermakers en mogelijke excursies tijdens je verblijf. Het ontbijt was heerlijk en zeer gevarieerd. Het zwembad was prima met verschillende ligbedjes en cabana’s. Ook is er een kleine gym aanwezig. Een groot pluspunt vonden wij de gratis fietsverhuur; binnen no time fiets je naar de old town. Te voet is dit overigens ook prima te doen, maar als je meerdere keren naar een kleermaker moet, spring je makkelijk even op de fiets. Ook de route naar het strand is zeer goed te fietsen. De locatie vormt dan ook een goede uitvalsbasis voor zowel stad als strand en biedt een stukje rust tussen de kleurrijke, soms hectische straten van Hoi An.

review.comment_positive:
前台服務人員非常客氣服務很好，英文溝通沒有問題。
飯店位置雖離市區一小段距離因此也比較安靜，而且可以免費借腳踏車到處逛逛，搭乘Grab摩托車也只要14000d（約台幣19元）就可以到老城區或夜市。早餐有現點現做服務太令人驚訝，其他檯面上擺的東西倒是很普通。
review.comment_negative: 淋浴間熱水非常非常的慢，而且水量很小無法非常舒服的洗澡，除此之外這個價錢也沒有什麼好嫌棄了。

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: Ein exzellentes Hotel, nur 5 Minuten mit dem Fahrrad in die Altstadt und 15 Minuten zum Strand. Die Fahrräder werden kostenlos zu Verfügung gestellt! Das Frühstück ist ausgezeichnet. Die Zimmer sind sehr geräumig und sehr sauber. Das gesamte Team des Hotel war sehr, sehr freundlich und hat sich immer um alle Anliegen gekümmert. Top Hotel, sehr zu empfehlen!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
We booked all our excursions at the reception, we enjoyed both of them. We also booked drivers to and from the airport for additional charge, both of them were great and professional. 
The light in the bathroom is very low and dim both in the bathtub and where the mirror is so be aware of that if you have a bad vision or if you’re planning to do something such as makeup etc. 
The staff is very friendly and helpful, especially Sue because she told us about common scamming practices that the locals use in the city centre, we appreciate her tips very much! Also the recommendation for restaurants was good. Since Hoi An is overcrowded with tourists, you have to be very careful. 
We used the laundry service which is a little pricey. 
There will be added 3% of the total amount if you pay with card. 
I felt pressure to leave a good feedback and I don’t like feeling pressure in life in general. 
The room was very clean and there was daily room service. 
Clean and fresh towels. 
Clean swimming pool. 
A small lovely gym with some basic equipment. 
We did not enjoy the street view too much and toilet was right where the window is so we needed to open and close the blinds constantly.
The electricity sockets in the room were a bit old. 
Fantastic breakfast, the best we had during our whole trip.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel, very large room, excellent breakfast selection, lovely staff.
review.comment_negative: Only, very slight, downside was location - about a 20 minute walk to the riverfront area.

review.comment_positive:
The whole experience right from stay to hospitality was good. Everyone was very welcoming. They also help with travel packages for day tours.

I would recommend this hotel to anyone travelling to Hoi An.

review.rating: Không thoải mái, không sứng với giá tiền và số sao của khách sạn
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên nhiệt tình.
review.comment_negative:
1. Google maps lệch địa chỉ phải đi tìm.
2. Không có chỗ đậu xe oto, mà đậu dưới lòng đường không có người trông coi
3. Phòng ẩm mốc có mùi hôi rất khó chịu
4. Toilet và phòng tắm mùi khí ga hôi nồng.
5. Phòng ánh sáng yếu, bật hết đèn vẫn mờ mờ ảo ảo
6. Phòng bé
7. Phòng spa là dạng phòng tập thể không có sự riêng tư, che chắn bằng rèn vải kéo tay nhưng không kéo kín hoàn toàn (tuy nhiên nv spa kỹ năng tốt)
8. Ăn sáng quá ít món k đa dạng. Món ăn cũng không ngon. (Có món thạch có dấu hiệu bị ôi thiu... có hình bên dưới)

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
El buffet muy rico y variado. Cuentan con menú a ña carta.
El personal es excelente, siempre dispuesto a ayudar y a gestionar cualquier servicio turístico. La gestión es inmejorable y además son muy amables y atentos. Ofrecen bicicletas para moverse por la ciudad de manera gratuita.
Es el mejor hotel donde nos hemos alojado en nuestra estancia en Vietnam.
Las camas son muy amplias y cómodas. Nos subieron a una categoría superior de habitación sin coste alguno.
Se puede ir andando al centro en 15 minutos y la playa está a 7 minutos en coche/taxi. Nos dejaron las toallas de la piscina para ir a la playa. También gestionan alquiler de motos.

review.comment_positive:
FOOD- Breakfast spread was good. Despite a large number of guests their service was faster than the rate at which we could eat.
LOCATION- Ideally located on higher grounds and wide roads, away from hustle bustle of old town yet well within reach. 
ROOM- Very spacious, neat and clean linen. Bathroom was as big as a bedroom. Absolute value for money.
SERVICE- The attitude and behaviour of staff was superb. Special thanks to team that took care of us- Kim, Trang, Sa and Dzung. They suggested various tour options and seamlessly facilitated them too.

review.rating: ALBERGO ACCOGLIENTE, CI TORNEREI, ANZI LO CONSIGLIERò AGLI AMICI CHE SI RECHERANNO AD HOI AN.
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: L'albergo offre il massimo confort. La colazione è tra le più buone e varie che io abbia mai fatto in giro per il mondo. Non manca nulla, dolce, salato, frutta fresca ottima, yogurt fatti in casa, c'è talmente tanto che non saprei da dove iniziare. Personale disponibile che viene incontro alle richieste degli ospiti (eravamo con una coppia di amici che hanno chiesto gli venisse cambiata la camera e sono stati accontentati immediatamente). La piscina ha fatto la differenza visto il caldo soffocante che abbiamo trovato a Hoi An, è pulita, riscaldata, con idromassaggio e nonostante l'albergo fosse pieno non l'abbiamo mai trovata affollata, vengono anche forniti i teli dall'albergo.
review.comment_negative: L'albergo è a circa 1 km e 400 metri dal centro storico che non è una tragedia ma quando sei stanco per aver camminato molto fa la differenza anche se ho scoperto l'esistenza di city cars che con 50.000 dong (circa 2 euro) ti portano nel centro storico. Le camere sono un pochino datate nell'arredo ma restano comunque molto confortevoli. Al momento del pagamento avvenuto con carta di credito mi è stato addebitato sul totale un ulteriore 3% proprio a causa dell'utilizzo della carta di credito. Non ho naturalmente obiettato ma ho segnalato a booking che non ritenevo la cosa corretta poiché non segnalata né dalla struttura né da booking. Devo però dire, ad onor del vero, che la struttura si è scusata per l'errore e mi ha prontamente rimborsato la differenza non dovuta.

review.room_type: Suite 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Hồ bơi
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
We absolutely loved our stay. From the second we arrived every member of staff made us feel welcomed and went above and beyond for us, making our stay in this lovely hotel so very special. We initially only booked for one night but we were so impressed by the hotel, our room, the staff and the general vibe of the hotel we extended our stay- we really didn’t want to leave! 

The description and facilities of the hotel listing matches up and everything is in perfect working order, including the gym and the pool. 

The room was cleaned to an amazing standard and the lobby, dining area, pool and gym were always spotless. 

There are free bikes to use at the hotel which we loved and took them to Old Town and discovered the local area. The staff are on hand 24/7 to help out and even have a WhatsApp if you need their assistance whilst out etc. If you need anything the staff are happy to help.

Ms. Kim was super helpful and gave us so many recommendations on local cuisine, activities and shows and also assisted in booking us tickets. 

We loved how the breakfast was freshly made and the staff kindly accommodated my allergies. There are several local options and amazing fresh fruit too.

We will definitely be back and we recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Hoi An - you will receive the best hospitality experience!! If we could give a higher rating than 10/10 we absolutely would.

review.rating: Best hotel we've stayed at so far!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
We loved our stay here. The pool area and gym were really nice. The gym is quite small but it was amazing having access to a treadmill and weight rack to get some morning workouts in. The pool and the deck area  lovely. 

The rooms are spacious and really clean. 10/10 great value for money. The staff was friendly, attentive and amazing especially Dun, Da, Selena and Kim :) <3

The hotel also has a ton of bikes to rent which was a really fun addition. We took bikes nearly everyday to cycle to the beach and into old town for dinner.

review.rating: Perfect elegant and cozy to visit HoiAn.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Impressive hotel, elegant m, modern, clean, great international and local breakfast with a lot of opportunities. Friendly and professional staff help me to book a couple of day trips, and a cooking class. 
It’s 10minutes to bike to the beach, An Bang, and 15 minutes walking to the city center. 
Maybe the best quality price/ratio ever.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố

review.rating: Great hotel with the best staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: What an amazing hotel! We had an upgraded room, which was incredibly spacious, comfortable, clean, and well decorated. It had everything we needed. It's well located, just a bit outside of Hoi An's Old Quarter, and not far from the beach. They also offer free bicycles to use during your stay. The pool area was very nice, and well maintained. The staff was definitely the best highlight, especially Dzung, who was incredibly friendly, and helped us and facilitated our trip. Thuy, Kim, Kaeu were also very caring and attentive to us. We really would like to thank them, as they are very professional and so nice with their guests. We hope we can come back one day.
review.comment_negative: Nothing! It can sometimes get noisy at time because of nearby loud restaurants, which isn't the hotel's fault.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Every thing about this hotel was excellent. From the receptionist Thuy to the comfort of the room and the breakfast. All the staff were very helpful and professional with a lovely manner. I had an excellent Massage and facial from Lan in the hotel spa. We borrowed bikes from the hotel and had a lovely day exploring the area and beaches. I would highly recommend this hotel.

review.comment_positive:
Staff were exceptional! 
Hotel has stunning decor in my opinion.  Lovely pool.  Good location - 5 minute bike ride to town.  Very comfortable hotel and will definitely stay here again.
Breakfast was great - try the pancake (actually a crepe) - was delicious.  
BTW: It’s worth eating at the restaurant if you’re too tired to go out.  The Vietnamese dishes we had were authentic, fresh and as good as any in Hoi An.

review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel hat eine super Lage. Es liegt zwischen Strand und Altstadt. Bis zur Altstadt ist es ein ca. 10 Minütiger Fußweg. Bis zum Strand fährt man ca. 10 Minuten mit dem Fahrrad. Fahrräder können im Hotel kostenlos geliehen werden (es handelt sich natürlich um keine Profiräder...). 

Das Frühstück ist gut. Jeder sollte hier etwas finden, das schmeckt. Ein kleiner Pool und ein kleines Fitnesstudio sind auch vorhanden. Unser Zimmer war absolut sauber!!

review.comment_positive: The staff were excellent - very friendly and helpful. The break fast was a buffet style with many otions. The pool is small but sufficient for a quick dip and relax. The hotel has free bikes to travel around but the lication is close to the town to walk also - which is what we did. he reception team were very helpful with local advice and the suggested trips were ecellent - particularly the cooking one.We will certainly be back here for our next Hoi An trip.

It’s about a 15 min walk into centre of town, and the free use of bicycles was SO fun and made everything super quick and convenient. 10/10!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Schönes Hotel in guter, zentraler Lage genau zwischen Altstadt und Strand. Die Zimmer sind geräumig, die Betten bequem. Es gibt eine sehr gute Ausstattung auf den Zimmern (kleiner Getränkekühler, Wasserkocher (wichtig fürs zB. Zähneputzen), Haartrockner, Schirme). Perfekt war auch, dass es kostenlose Fahrräder (einfache Eingang-Stadträder, waren für alle in der Familie einfach zu fahren und waren vom Zustand oK.) gibt. Mit den Rädern kommt man gut an den Strand. Das Frühstück war auch sehr gut und reichlich. Das komplette Personal war extrem freundlich und zuvorkommend.
review.comment_negative: So richtig „nicht gefallen“ nichts. Das Hotel ist nicht mehr neu, was man an der einen oder anderen Stelle sieht. Das Personal hält es aber sehr gut in Schuss.

review.comment_positive:
breakfast is very good.  Room is spacious with 4 beds to sleep 4 people.  That was really awesome!.
restaurant menu (pizza, fried noodles with seafood) were very mediocre.
It is better to have less on the menu but quality food.
Also a 3% charge for using a credit card was waived, that was great!
review.comment_negative:
Please provide better coffee for breakfast and conditioners.
No need to leave out tooth brushes, combs, toothpaste, razor blades.  Most travelers already packed these items.
But they should be available free of charge upon demands.
No iron in the room, had to come to the first floor to iron.

review.comment_positive: Great facilities - use of pool and gym and free bikes. Lovely buffet breakfast. Comfortable clean room with huge bathroom. Would stay here again - good value for money.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Wir waren als Teil unserer Flitterwochen hier und haben ein kostenloses Zimmer-Upgrade erhalten. Die Unterkunft ist allgemein top, die Betten sind die besten, die wir bisher in Asien hatten. Personal ist sehr nett und hat viele gute Tipps, Frühstück für asiatische Verhältnisse auch top (gibt auch europäische Möglichkeiten). Wäscheservice ist auch sehr gut. Alle weissen Kleidungsstücke sind weiss geblieben. Gute Lage und kostenlose Fahrräder.

review.comment_positive: Very big and clean room and bathroom, staff is very friendly, the breakfast is great, you can book plenty of tours and transportation here.

Thanks to the whole team

Personnel aux petits soins, petit déjeuner au top, super rapport qualité prix . A 3min à pied du centre ce qui permet de passer des nuits bien tranquilles dans un lit tres très confort. Prêt de vélos pour aller à la plage ou alentours. Piscine et transats… tout pour se relaxer 
Allez y les yeux fermés

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Estuvimos dos días en Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa y fue todo un acierto. 
El personal es muy amable, el desayuno excelente. 
Tienen bicis, que te las dejan para moverte por la ciudad (el centro está literalmente a 5 min en bici). 
Nos organizaron también el transporte para el aeropuerto y unos billetes para un espectáculo (sin añadir precio por la gestión). 
La piscina está genial.

review.comment_positive: Perfect hotel with perfect location. They have free bikes that I took to go to the center. The best is their staff. Ms. Kim Kim and her colleagues were exceptional. No other hotel concierge sat with me during check-in to explain what to see, where to get authentic local food, how to get around. She would check on me every morning to see if I am comfortable and well taken care. If I were to go back to Hoi An, it will be at Golden resort and because of her and her staff.
review.comment_negative: The breakfast was simple but authentic. I tasted Quang noodles for the first here and it is an amazing dish.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công

review.comment_positive: We really enjoyed our time at this property. The rooms are clean, modern and quite large. Staff are incredibly friendly and helpful with lots of local recommendations and able to book many day trips. The breakfast was the best we have had in Vietnam with fresh to order eggs and pancakes and lots of western and Asian buffet options. Location is good, a short walk or bike ride from the old town and on much quieter streets. We would definitely return!

review.rating: Não é a melhor localização para ficar em Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Reservámos 2 quartos, os quartos no geral eram agradáveis e bonitos, mas um deles era bastante superior ao outro.
A welcome drink é maravilhosa.
As funcionárias são muito simpáticas (chega a ser excessivo, às vezes).
review.comment_negative:
A localização - já sabia que não seria no centro (até porque não há quase hotéis no centro antigo), contudo, o caminho desde o hotel até ao centro não é muito agradável (os prédios não são bonitos e há muitas baratas) e acaba por ser mais longe do que esperava (uns bons 25 minutos a pé).
Infelizmente a área da piscina fica quase todo o dia à sombra, tornando-se pouco agradável.
Uma das casas de banho precisava de actualizações urgentes, tendo inclusive buracos na zona da banheira, muito escura.
Insistência das funcionárias no final muito para que fizesse uma review de 10, foi algo desagradável.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Wir hatten einen angenehmen Aufenthalt. Die Zimmer sind sauber und schön eingerichtet. Das Buffet ist  hervorragend. Besonders die Salatvielfalt. Toll war auch, dass bis zum Ende des Buffets um 9.30 Uhr nachgelegt wurde. Beim längerem Verweilen, wurde seitens des Personals nicht der Eindruck vermittelt, dass man das Essen und somit den Aufenthalt beenden sollte. Es fühlte sich sehr freundlich und entspannt an. Das Servicepersonal ist sehr aufmerksam und freundlich. Es gibt einen Wäscheservice innerhalb eines Tages. Der Poolbereich ist sauber. Es gab ausreichend Außenduschen und Toiletten in der Nähe. 
Fazit: Das Hotel, somit das gesamte Personal, war bestrebt uns einen angenehmen Aufenthalt zu verschaffen. Was Ihnen auch gelungen ist. Viele Dank dafür.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Cho 6 Người
review.comment_positive:
It was great! The staff was very nice and helpful (specially Sue, she’s an expert on tours and good restaurants). The hotel and room is beautiful and has everything you need. The breakfast has a good variety and the hotel is well located (20 minutes walking to the old town). We also had a Thai massage and we loved it! The girls were very nice and stronger than we thought (but if you want to have every part of the body in the right place, book this massage). If we come back to Hoi An, we will definitely stay at Golden Holiday again. Feels like home. Perfect to rest and relax. 

————- Spanish now: ——

Fue grandioso! El personal fue muy amable y servicial (especialmente Sue, ella es una experta en tours y buenos restaurantes). El hotel y la habitación son hermosos y tienen todo lo que necesitas. El desayuno tiene buena variedad y el hotel está bien situado (a 20 minutos caminando del la ciudad antigua). ¡También tuvimos un masaje tailandés y nos encantó! Las chicas fueron muy amables y más fuertes de lo que pensábamos (pero si quieres tener cada parte del cuerpo en el lugar correcto, reserva este masaje). Si volvemos a Hoi An, definitivamente nos hospedaremos nuevamente en Golden Holiday. Se siente como en casa. Perfecto para descansar y relajarse.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Golden Holiday offers a number of positives: large rooms,  solid facilities, and an exceptionally friendly staff. plus, it was great value for the money.
review.comment_negative: While the facilities are good, the property is a little out from center and it is definitely showing signs of wear and tear—stained furniture and the like. The breakfast is plentiful in quantity, but hit and miss in terms of quality.

review.rating: El sitio perfecto para unos días de descanso
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: La amabilidad recibida, siempre buscaban mejorar. Tengo problemas cn el gluten y me hicieron tortitas con harina de arroz en vez de trigo. Tuvimos un pequeño problema y nos hicieron descuento en la factura total. Tenían bicis gratis para desplazarte por ls ciudad. Teníamos reserva para 2 noches y nos quedamos 4. La habitación era amplia y cómoda. Teníamos un balcón donde secar los bikinis y la piscina era una maravilla. También nos ayudaron a reservar rl avión de da nang y el transfer al aeropuerto.
review.comment_negative: Por poner alguna pega, ya que estuvimos muy a gusto, faltó recomendar algún restaurante y tiendas locales.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Amazing value for money, best 3 star hotel we have been to and the best hotel we stayed at for our two weeks in Vietnam. The laundry service was great and convenient, the spa was really nice and the massage good, the pool and the gym were nice to have but the gym is nothing crazy though, the breakfast was really good and the banana pancakes superb, it was very convenient to have free bikes (even though they were a bit old and broke down a bit 🤪)
review.comment_negative:
I would not recommend eating at the hotel outside of breakfast, the food was average and the service slow and not great. 

Also it was a dissapointment to get a sob story about how hard Covid was for hoi an and the hotel when we were checking out (purpose of asking for a 5 star review). For a moment I thought about not reviewing at all or giving a lower rating because of this.

review.comment_positive: We loved the location, walkable to old quarter but far enough to live the local life. We had a toddler and found one outdoor and one indoor playgrounds within 5 min. The breakfast buffet is wide and changes daily. The staff really works on keeping their high score. Our room was big as expected and comfortable. A crib was also provided.

The breakfast was good! Plenty of options and they had an egg and pancake station which added value to it. The staff were very helpful and helped us with any questions we had. review.comment_positive:
Every single staff member was polite, friendly and very helpful. From the welcome on arrival with all the detailed information about the hotel to the activities in Hoi An.
The location is excellent and all activities can be done on foot. The hotel rents bicycles, so we had the opportunity to see activities in the vicinity and further afield. We also used massages and it was wonderful relaxation.
Breakfast was fantastic.
Since I'm writing a review only after returning home and we stayed in 10 hotels in Vietnam, in our opinion this was the best hotel we've visited, and that's mainly thanks to the staff, who do to their guests "what they see in their eyes". and that is the highest value for us.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Cảm ơn Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa. Chúng tôi đã có trải nghiệm thú vị tại Hội An và rất hài lòng khi lưu trú ở khách sạn đầy đủ tiện nghi với phòng ốc sạch đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện mà giá rẻ bất ngờ. Đây là điểm lưu trú xuất sắc nhất trong số 5 khách sạn gia đình chúng tôi chọn trong dịp Tết 2022 này. Hãy đến và trải nghiệm-bạn sẽ hài lòng như chúng tôi!

Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful time at the Hoi An.Golden Holiday Hotel and Spa. Our room 206 was absolutely stunning!! We stayed for 3 nights. A large room with a sitting area and a separate bathroom and dressing area + the balcony overlooking the main road. The staff was so kind and happy, Ms Sue made sure we had everything we needed each day and was very happy to help with anything we needed such as tours, massage, using the free bikes, airport transfer and laundry! (use it in early February as still rather humid and nothing really dries in the room, also it is actually really good value for money at extra speed, we had our laundry done and dry in 2 hours). The hotel is about 1km away from the main pedestrian street towards the main lantern bridge (which was actually great as main town is really laud). We did walk to the town few times but we also took the Grab (UK Uber) back on few occasions for £1- £1.50 per ride which is amazing. The beach is nice and only 15 min bike ride in the oposite direction to the town passing the rice fields on a way, the bike parking is literally 40 metres from the beach and it will cost 30 pence a day. The preparations for the TET has made everything look so much more beautiful and magical with the flowers and trees and lanterns. We had a breakfast there each morning which was great, yet we had a yummy pho soup every day for breakfast so not judging other food too much. I would absolutely recommend the place and would 100% stay in the hotel again, no doubt about that! This is the best hotel we have stayed in during our holiday in Vietnam so we will give it 5 ***** thank you so much :)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The hotel and staff are wonderful. 
The bed and bathroom were massive and so comfortable. 
The pool area is beautiful and the loungers are great.
The buffet breakfast was a highlight - so much variety and being able to order eggs the way you like them, pancakes and soup on top of all the other delicious food and drink available was amazing. 
The location is perfect as it is between the beach and old town - you can easily bike to either as we did each day. 
The gym is basic but good, we had couple of good workouts. 
I’d highly recommend this hotel and would happily stay here again!

review.rating: The best hotel stay we had in South East Asia!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: We loved our stay at the Golden Holiday Hotel and Spa! We have spent three months travelling South East Asia and this was without a doubt the best hotel we stayed in during our whole trip! The staff were so attentive and helpful from the start. They helped us book tours and organise a car to the airport after checking out. They also checked on us regularly to make sure everything was okay. The hotel itself was beautiful. It was so clean and staff were constantly working to keep it clean at all times. Our room was huge with a lovely balcony. The bed was very big and so comfortable. The AC worked very well in the room too. The bathroom was spacious and had a great shower. The pool was a great addition to be able to relax by after a day of exploring! The gym is small but was totally sufficient for our workouts. Breakfast was also the best we have come across on our travels. There was so much variety and choice - it was delicious!
review.comment_negative:
The wifi sometimes slows down late at night, but it wasn't a big deal!
The elevators can also sometimes take a minute or two to arrive, but again, that was no issue.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
We had a great stay at Golden Holiday Hotel and Spa. 

From the moment I booked until checkout, the hotel reception/admin were very prompt with communication.

When we arrived, they upgraded our room for free and were very friendly an engaging during breakfast and before we would head out for our day’s activities.

The bedroom and bathroom were both spacious and equipped with a soft bed, a mini fridge, air-conditioning, good lighting and a bathtub.

The staff and reception were very accommodating and efficient with our requests. One afternoon, our bathroom sink wasn’t draining, so we told the reception, and when we came back later that evening, it was fixed.

The breakfast spread was pretty balanced, from fruit, dairy products, grains and cereal, to breads, meat, vegetables, rice, noodles and eggs you can order.

The Spa also offers massages. My husband got one and it was pretty good. 9/10.

The facilities were also good. They had a small gym good for just a few people, and when I went, I always had the gym to myself. The gym has one treadmill, one stationary bike, dumbbells, a barbell and a weight bench that could be used for leg presses. It also had air-conditioning.

Beside the gym was a small- to medium-sized pool with outdoor showers and lounge chairs.

The hotel also has free bikes you can use to get around Hoi An, which made getting around extremely convenient. It dropped travel time from 45 minutes walking to 15 minutes biking to get to An Bang beach, and from 15 minutes walking to 5-8 minutes biking to get to the old town.
review.comment_negative: The only critique I have would be that sometimes the staff would be a little too friendly and engaging at breakfast, when at times I would prefer to enjoy a little more solitude. Despite this, we definitely felt very well cared for throughout our stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
What a wonderful Hotel!!!
My wife and I stayed here for 6 nights and had an amazing time. Cannot fault anything about it. The staff were so welcoming and helpful, not just the customer service team but the restaurant staff, cleaners, and porters. They could not do enough for you. Incredible service.
The rooms were beautifully clean with the most comfortable bed I have had in a hotel for a while.
Delicious breakfast every morning.
Location was perfect. Just over 1km into Old town, perfect for a walk. About 3kms to the beach, we used their complimentary bikes for a scenic ride past the rice fields.
We used the hotel spa for probably the best massage we had in Hoi An and was so reasonably priced as well.
All in all, highly highly recommend for anyone travelling to Hoi An.
Thank you to the Golden Holiday team for such a memorable stay!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: מלון קצת יותר מרוחק מההמולה והצפיפות של העיר העתיקה  הוי אן (יתרון בעינינו). מציע חדרים סופר נוחים ומפנקים. המיטה הכי נוחה בשבועיים בויאטנם ! שודרגנו לסויטה שהיתה בה גם מקלחת עצומה ומפוארת עם אמבטיה (המלון היחיד בויאטנם שהיינו בו עם אמבטיה). צוות המלון יוצא מגדרו כדי לתת שירות ולעזור בכל דבר שנדרש. קים מצוותשיקות הלקוחות יצקה איתנו קשר עוד לפני שהגענו לשאול למה אנו זקוקים וסידרה לנו הסעה משדה התעופה. לאורך השהות שלנו פשוט הרגשנו שאנחנו חשובים להם ושמים לב לצרכים שלנו. ניתן לקחת אופניים בחינם מהמלון וכך הגענו להרבה מקומות בקלות ובמהירות. יש במלון ספא ונהנינו גם מטיפול מסאג.
review.comment_negative: אין לנו שום טענה. השירות והמתקנים יוצאים מן הכלל.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân làm việc cũng nhanh nhẹn. Ban công phòng là nơi duy nhất tạm được.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: The staff was beyond amazing, helpful and cheerful. They offered us a lot of info and support. You also get a free bike. The rooms were huge and super comfortable. The breakfast was full of options and the area is super quite ! Loved the hotel

review.comment_negative: No negatives however I think the check out process could be smoother, I found it a little uncomfortable being put on the spot to rate the hotel and be asked to write the review there and then, it would still be 10/10 but I don’t think asking to review while you are still in the hotel is a great end as you are leaving.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: Top Hotel zwischen Altstadt und Strand

review.comment_positive: Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt und würden wieder hier buchen. Das Zimmer war groß und schön, das Personal super nett und das Frühstück top. Die Lage zwischen Altstadt und Strand (näher an der Altstadt) war für uns optimal, weil wir gut zu Fuß zur Altstadt konnten und zum Strand gut mit dem Fahrrad (vom Hotel gratis gestellt).

review.comment_positive: Golden Holiday Hotel was a perfect stay, the hotel and rooms are beautiful and very clean, the breakfast was delicious and had a great variety of option, most of all the staff are all wonderful and were very helpful helping us organise everything we wanted to do and had helpful tips about Hoi An.

And finally convenient location, 10 minutes walking to the old town. A little gem in the heart of Hoi An

review.rating: The highlight of our trip to Vietnam
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: We had the best time at Golden Holiday hotel! From the moment we arrived to the moment we left, the service was impeccable. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful especially with our baby. We were allowed to feed her in the restaurant on multiple occasions and the highchair they provided was always kept nice and clean which is not always the case with baby equipment! They also organised transport to a from the airport and to the coconut boats which we really appreciated. The location was a bonus! A short walk from the old town and close to the beautiful An Bang beach.

Just a little bit away from the craziness of the old district. This was a beautiful hotel with a fantastic swimming pool which we used a lot. The staff recommendations were spot on, and the breakfast was by far the best we had in Vietnam.

Comfy bed, nice rooms, quiet. Perfect hotel really.

review.rating: Would stay at Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa again when in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi Có Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Our stay at Golden Holiday Hotel and Spa was fantastic. We couldn’t fault it. It has a great boutique feel about it.
We chose the Suite which was super roomy and gave us space to spread out a bit.
The buffet breakfast was really very good and offered lots to choose from, as well as the option of choosing cooked to order as well. I’m Gluten Free, so took my own bread and was able to have my choice of eggs cooked each day.
All staff were most obliging and very accommodating, able to assist with any enquiry and offer sightseeing suggestions, as well as organise them for you at very reasonable rates.
We were closer to the ancient town than we realised when we booked. A straight walk into town, only about a km. Very easy walk. We also took advantage of the free bikes on a couple of occasions and rode them in which was great fun.
Highly recommend this hotel if your looking for a hotel that offers the lot in Hoi An.

review.comment_positive: L’accueil était exceptionnel. Mention spéciale à Dzung qui nous a aidé à planifier notre séjour. Je recommande cet Hôtel sans hésitation.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Schönes sauberes Hotel! Service wird hier groß geschrieben und die Dienstleistungen werden vom Personal auf einem hohen Niveau durchgeführt. Das Hotel ist uns z.B. am Frühstücksbuffet sehr entgegen gekommen, damit wir das bekommen, was wir uns wünschten.

review.rating: Le meilleur hôtel de notre mois au Vietnam - réservez sans hesiter!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: C’était un séjour exceptionnel, et de loin le meilleur hôtel dans lequel nous avons séjourné pendant notre voyage d’un mois au Vietnam. Le service à la clientèle a été au-delà de nos attentes - le personnel est toujours souriant et disponible. Ils ont accepté de nous offrir un déjeuner tardif à plus d’une reprise et ont surpris mon conjoint lors de son anniversaire en lui offrant un gâteau! Les installations comme la piscine et le gym sont géniales. Les chambres sont confortables et grandes. Il s’agit d’un hôtel de taille raisonnable, donc on sent que le service est de type boutique hôtel avec tous les avantages d’un plus grand hôtel. Merci encore à tout le personnel et pour ceux qui lisez cet avis, réservez sans hésiter!

review.comment_positive: It was very relaxing also in a very good location just away from the hustle and bustle of Hoi An river and the old town. The staff were amazing especially Ms Dzung and Ms Sue! Great sense of humour and made our stay even better, that we extended an extra 2 nights! Would highly recommend, breakfast buffet was also great, the beds were super comfortable as well!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Every single staff member was polite, friendly and extremely helpful. Kim greeted us on arrival and gave us so much information about Hoi An. She even went as far as saving recommended locations to our phone and also provided details of a tailor we were very happy with. The breakfast is fantastic and changed slightly on a daily basis. We checked out early in the morning before breakfast and the staff had kindly boxed up a meal for us. Fantastic hotel, couldn't rate it more highly.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Hotel  molto accogliente e pulito. Stante molto spaziose. Poco distante dal centro. Biciclette disponibili gratuitamente. Su tutto evidenzio la gentilezza e la disponibilità di tutto lo staff, davvero eccezionale, composto dalle signore Kim, Sa, Selena, Dzung e dal ragazzo all’ingresso che si occupa delle biciclette e degli scooter, di cui non ricordo il nome. La speciale accoglienza da parte di Ms Kim inizia ancora prima del soggiorno, con messaggio di benvenuto tramite whatsapp e disponibilità ad eventuali richieste (abbiamo infatti concordato il transfer dall’aeroporto a prezzo conveniente).

Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Every aspect of our stay was perfect. The rooms are spacious and clean, and the facilities are great. Lovely pool area and great gym. The hotel is in a great location, about a 5 minute cycle from the hustle and bustle of Hoi An old town - the hotel even has free bike rental. Great breakfast also. 

Huge thank you to the staff, everyone was so friendly, attentive, and helpful. Special thanks to Dung, Sa, Selina, and Duyen, who made our trip that much better!

review.comment_positive: Great hotel just outside the old town, which is a 10 minute walk. The facilities were fantastic and the room was very spacious and clean.

review.rating: Place to stay in Hoi-An, ich würde die Unterkunft weiter empfehlen und jederzeit wieder buchen.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis ist unglaublich. Die Zimmer sind groß und schick modern. Das Badezimmer ist mit einer großen Dusche ausgestattet. Die Innenstadt ist zu Fuß in circa 10 Minuten zu erreichen, es besteht die Möglichkeit gute Fahrräder im im Hotel zu leihen (coole Aktivität mit dem Fahrrad durch die Stadt). Das Frühstück ist auffallend reichhaltig und schön angerichtet. Des weiteren verfügt das Hotel über einen schönen Pool mit Liegemöglichkeiten und einem ausreichenden Fitnessraum. Die Angestellten sind jederzeit ansprechbar und hilfsbereit.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: The best hotel in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Both myself and my partner have been travelling over the past few months around south east Asia and this is by far the best hotel that we have stayed in.
The hotel staff are just so helpful, hospitable and friendly which makes for a very easy and comfortable experience.  
The hotel itself is so clean and the rooms are so comfortable and spacious. 
The hotel facilities like the pool, sun beds,  gym,
Spa and resteraunt are in excellent condition. 
We stayed over the Christmas period for 1 week and extended our stay because the hotel and staff were so hospitable. 
The breakfast was by far the best breakfast we have had so far and I would recommend including this in your deal as there is an abundance of food and options to suit all. 
I would highly recommend this hotel to anybody staying in Hoi An. 
I would just like to extend our thanks to Kim and the rest of the staff and receptionists for such a welcoming and warm experience. We will be definitely be back.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: The hotel is well kept, clean and furnished with taste. The room was spacious and the beds were comfortable. The staff is phenomenal, helpful, very kind, smiley, and cared to help us with indications on the city. The position is good enough to get to the old town on foot, and the breakfast was excellent. Great value for money, I would highly recommend.

review.rating: Exceptionally comfortable and clean, staff enormously helpful.
